1b1(mdo sde): rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+yA A k+Sha shagad+hAn ma ma yunas/
1b2(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying do zhes bya ba theg pa chen
1b3(mdo sde): ma/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
2a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
2a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na/ gnas thub pa'i drang srong rnams kyi gnas na/ nyan thos chen po
2a3(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das pa'i/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig go/ 'di lta ste/ byang /
2a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i
2b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig lung bstan
2b2(mdo sde): pa'i mthar phyin ma thag tu/ yang de'i tshe na/ nub phyogs na/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po che brgya phrag stong du mas bskor
2b3(mdo sde): cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/ yang nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
2b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gzugs su snang ba thams cad ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma
2b5(mdo sde): gtogs par gang lha dang / mi rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gang sa dang /
3a1(mdo sde): #// me dang / chu dang / rlung rnams kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams
3a2(mdo sde): cad ma lus par spangs par gyur cing / nor bu rin po che snang ngo // lhag ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ nam mkha'
3a3(mdo sde): bzhin du snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to// gang yang sems can der 'dus pa de dag kyang /
3a4(mdo sde): bdag kyang mi mthong ngo // gcig la gcig kyang mi mthong ngo // de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'gags nas/
3a5(mdo sde): yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to// bdag bdag gis lus kyi gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / reg pa yang mi dmigs par
3a6(mdo sde): gyur te/ gong dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par mthong ngo // nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyang mi mthong / skar ma'i gzugs
3b1(mdo sde): dang sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to// sgra dag kyang rna ba'i bu kar grag pa/
3b2(mdo sde): ma gyur to// dri dag kyang sna la zo bar ma gyur to// sems dang sems las byung ba la yang nga dang / bdag gir bya ba da / skye mched drug gi 'du shes mi 'byung
3b3(mdo sde): bar gyur to// yang 'byung ba chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/ phyogs gang dang / gang tu brtags pa de dang de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
3b4(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i mtshan dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs su mthong bar gyur to// rgyang ma nas brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches bskor ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor/
3b5(mdo sde): du rin po che snang ba las/ gzhan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa
3b6(mdo sde): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa srid batha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas/ 'jigs par mi byed/ sdang sra pAr mi byed skrag par mi byed de/ chos thams cad/
3b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir de dag 'jig par mi byed/ spangs par mi byed/
4a1(mdo sde): skrag par mi byed do// gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / lha dag dang / klu dag dang
4a2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dag dang / dri za dag dang lha ma yin dag dang nam mkha' lding dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang /
4a3(mdo sde): bsnyen srul po dang / lus srul po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin 'dus pa de dag thams cad 'jigs par gyur// sngangs par gyur/ skyo bar gyur nas/ tshu rol dang / pha rol
4a4(mdo sde): la rmongs shing / sems 'khrugs nas/ de dag gcig la gcig kyang mi mthong / de na 'di ci zhig/ 'di ci lta bu zhig/ 'di ci'i rang bzhin zhes 'dri ba yang gang yang mi snang ngo // yang /
4a5(mdo sde): de'i tshen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer bu zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te gsol pa/ chos kun
4a6(mdo sde): gyi ni rang bzhin la// gang zag gang dag ma 'tshal pa/ gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur na// dbang po drug la mongs par gyur// phung po gcig na mi mthong zhing // bcugs
4a7(mdo sde): kyi zu la chog brgyad / 'dil ga das pacig ni/ sangs rgyas chos la bcom 'tshal/ bcomaldan 'das kyis 'di dgal// chos kyi bzhin mtshan cing
4b1(mdo sde): ku dus dug rdza sa pa la/ bcod pa rnams sa rgyan 'tsham to// 'dzin mams ga shA / rjong du ma pa'i gnas la gyu /
4b2(mdo sde): chen po yid bzhin no// spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'// nor du rin chen brgya byin thogs/ gang gis rgyang thag nas mthong ba// sems can de dag skal ba ni/ ra
4b3(mdo sde): 'gro shin tu pha rol mchi// ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams// de dag thams cad shes rab che// de ring 'dir ni zang mo'i gtam// mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal
4b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'dir phyin pa'i// sems can dag la dbugs dbyung mdzod// sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir/ 'di ni dnga' bo spyod yul lo//
4b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// gang na kun gzhi thos 'gyur zhing // shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas// de ni ting 'dzin
4b6(mdo sde): spyod yul lo// de ni nam mkha'i snying po yi// byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul te// snang ba med cing spos med pa'i// ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan// lta ba gnyis la gang
4b7(mdo sde): chags pa// phyi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur// rtag dang chang la chags pa ni// pha rol tshu rol shin tu rmongs// lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las// rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa/
5a1(mdo sde): brjod du med par bsgom par gyis/ de ni myur dus thob 'gyur/ kye grogs po dag/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5a2(mdo sde): chen po las thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyi/ dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams
5a3(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin skye zhing 'jig pa shes par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi skye ba/ mi 'gag pa/ mi dmigs pa/ cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du
5a4(mdo sde): byed thams cad bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang rtag pa dang / chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs mi sngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la tshogs
5a5(mdo sde): par dmigs pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na/ de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing / phyin chad kyang chad pa dang / rtag par mi gnas par 'gyur ro zhes
5a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral nas/ 'khor der lpags pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji ltar mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / rtogs pa dang /
5a7(mdo sde): pa bzhin du la khor der mthong bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zug g.yas pa bcangs/ 'jig ces bka' stsal to// nam sa
5b1(mdo sde): snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ri rang dang mtshungs
5b2(mdo sde): ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus rlung dang mtshungs pa/ bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchod
5b3(mdo sde): lta bu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi red dpon lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni gter lta bu/ sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni bum pa bza
5b4(mdo sde): po lta bu/ mun par btsug pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma lta bu/ lam stor ba rnams kyi ni zla ba lta bu/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi ni ri rab lta bu// nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gdungs
5b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi ni sman bcud kyi khu ba dam pa lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de lhung ba rnams kyi ni 'khar ba lta bu/ 'phreng bas 'tsho ba rnams kyi ni me tog lta bu/ sdom pa sbyor pa
5b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni me long lta bu/ ngo tsha ba dang 'dzem pa yongs su spangs pa rnams kyi ni gos lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni zam pa lta bu pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams
5b7(mdo sde): kyi ni gru lta bu/ mtho ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni skas lwa bu/ tshig ngan pa dang skur pas zhen pa rnams kyi ni gdugs lta bu/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni seng ge wA ru/ 6
6a1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi ni chu lta bu/ bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni go cha lta bu/ bslab pa 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni mig 'byed pa lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bru thams
6a2(mdo sde): cad kyi ni sa lta bu/ nad pa rnams kyi ni sman pa lta bu/ bkres pa rnams kyi ni 'bru lta bu/ skom pa rnams kyi ni zla ba'i nor bu lta bu/ dral ba rnams kyi ni ma lta bu/
6a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma'i nor bu lta bu/ byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni shing rta lta bu/ skyes mo tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni rdzing bu lta bu/ byang chub kyi phyog
6a4(mdo sde): la brtson pa rnams kyi ni 'phreng ba lta bu de tshur 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bu de pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu lta bu/ rigs kyi bu des bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni nor du yid
6a5(mdo sde): bzhin lta bu/ rigs kyi bu re dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni kun tu 'tsho ba'i shing dang 'dra ba gcod pa'i phyir/ lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi ni
6a6(mdo sde): mtshon lta bu/ 'jom pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ni rdo rje lta bu/ bdud rnams kyis ni mi zlogs pa/ thabs can rnams kyi ni chos
6a7(mdo sde): grangs ye shes kyi ni 'byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni gnas/ rang rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phreng ba dang mtshungs pa nyan thos thams cad kyi ni gos dang
6b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa/ lha rnams kyi ni mi lta bu/ mi rnams kyi ni lam lta bu/ byol song du gyur pa rnams kyi ni skyabs yi dgas kyi ni rten sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi
6b2(mdo sde): ni mgon/ sbyin gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi ni snod tu gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni shing rta lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de
6b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni blon po lta bu/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo srungs yin te/ rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
6b4(mdo sde): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis ni brgyan/ thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ni ldan/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ sems can
6b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyis/ da khyer 'di ltar lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig/ mchod pa dang / bkur sti
6b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis de la ci nus par rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ran sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
6b7(mdo sde): lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / snod sna tshogs kyis bkur stir gyis shig/ rim gror gyis shig/ bsti stang du gyis shig/ mchod par gyis shig/ lam gyi byi
7a1(mdo sde): dor gyis shig/ brgyan par gyis shig/ bstod pa sna tshogs kyis bstod par gyis shig/ khyed thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan thob pa dang /
7a2(mdo sde): snod du gyur par ring po mi thogs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lhags pa ma lus pa thams cad kun stan las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
7a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te/ snying ni rab tu dga'/ bzhin ni rab tu 'dzum
7a4(mdo sde): mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang / 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i
7a5(mdo sde): dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang
7a6(mdo sde): mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur bstir bya snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos/ mi mjed kyi sang
7b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po che 'dun las byas shing ringang 'brog dang / ri skam dang / phug dang / grog po dang / g.yangs dang / rtswa dang /
7b2(mdo sde): rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / zing ba la sogs pa med la lag mthil ltar mnyam par sprul to// des dpal dri za'i skad du brjod pa'i glu'i dbyings
7b3(mdo sde): dang shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ dri zhim pa dang / ba dab ma dang / me togra dang / 'bras bur ldan par sprul to/ shing rlon dang / rtse dang skam
7b4(mdo sde): shing dang / 'dab ma sa la gnas pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas par sprul to// mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na yang / nad ni rab tu med//
7b5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sems can dag gis kyang zas dang / skom dang / gos
7b6(mdo sde): chos gos dang / rgyan dag thob par gyur to// de'i tshe gang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/
7b7(mdo sde): bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa'i mdangs dam pa rdzogs pa dang ni ldan/ yan lag thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs rdul med pa rab rib dang bral bar snang
8a1(mdo sde): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni mdzes par byas/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni bral/ sems ni rab tu zhi dge ba thams cad la ni sems mos/
8a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la ni sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas 'khor der lhags pa'i sems can de re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na yang / nor bu rin po che thogs par mngon par
8a3(mdo sde): sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che de re re las kyang so so'i tshul gyi 'od gzer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ma lus par snang chen/
8a4(mdo sde): po des khyab par gyur to// nor bu rin po che de las kyang sil snyan sna tshogs byung bar gyur to// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to//
8a5(mdo sde): gos bzang po sna tshogs kyi char dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang / dri sna tshogs kyi char dang / 'phre du sna tshogs kyi char dang /
8a6(mdo sde): gdugs sna tshogs kyi char dang / snod sna tshogs kyi char dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to// lha rdzas kyi gos dang / chos gos dang / gser
8a7(mdo sde): gyi srung ba dang / mu tog gis se ma~M do dang / me chog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la~M dang / ku mud dang bun rig dang / u rag sar dang / tsan dan tshul gyi snying po dang /
8b1(mdo sde): shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi mgo la bu'i phye mas lam mer bkram par mngon par gyur to// lam de'i g.yas g.yon gcig brgya byin gyi khang pa
8b2(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba dang 'dra rin po che'i khang pa yang mngon par sprul te/ khang pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang po'i btsun mo gtso mo dang / sras dang / 'dra ma dag yan lag lnga dang
8b3(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sil spyan sgrogs shing / rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi bo'i ste/ nam mkha' la lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po
8b4(mdo sde): che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs lta bu dpag tshad brgya tsam la rin po che'i dra ba'i skud pa dang / mu tig gis so mo dos brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/ rgyun de las
8b5(mdo sde): kyang lU las 'das pa'i sil sngan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra byung ngo // rtswa dang / shing dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa/
8b6(mdo sde): gang ci yang rung sde/ sa la gnas pa de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil stan las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung ba grag ste/ sgra de gang gi
8b7(mdo sde): rna bar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis
9a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i tshogs chen po de mthongs/ shin tu mtshar nga phyung du byung ba'i chos ra/
9a2(mdo sde): de dag 'di snyams du gyur tAM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa d+mo'i sman hU~M la bur bshams skam mo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan rdzar
9a3(mdo sde): rin po che las byas pa'i me tog padra sdong bu ni dngul le maM ni sarasnying po ni rin po che a mra gar ba/ ze ba ni nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od zer las byas zhing du
9a4(mdo sde): rgyang grags gcig tsam yod pa me tog pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan rnam pa brgya phrag stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bangar ba'i pad+ma byung nas/ pad+ma'i stan de la byang chub
9a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i snying po skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo // de'i spyi bo la yang nor bu rin po che'i dug par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub
9a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i g.yog byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ brgya byini thogs pa'i
9a7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po ches brgyan brgya stong phrag mang po rnams kyang rang rang gi pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan la 'khod par snang ngo // de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
9b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' grags cher rnams
9b2(mdo sde): gang dag sngon du 'ongs pa ni// gus dang ldan pas phyag byas te// phyi nas stan la 'dug byed na// skyes bu dam pa 'di 'ongs nas// tshogs chen dag kyang bstan gyur na/
9b3(mdo sde): ston la phyag kyang ma 'tshang bar// stan la 'dug pa lta bur sdud// sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong /
9b4(mdo sde): rtog pa kun la mi gnas pas// sems can du ni mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'i phyir// da ltar sems ca
9b5(mdo sde): mi mthong ngon// tshogs chen de ni ci phyir bstan// the tsom gyur pa bshad par gsol/ sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pas don/
9b6(mdo sde): dam mi shes te/ sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir// 'di ni dpa' bo'i thabs yin no// don dam gyis ni sdug bsngal ba// de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir// mkhas
9b7(mdo sde): ba kun rdzob bden pa yis// 'di 'dra ba yi tshogs bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi
10a1(mdo sde): rgyal po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhinan/ so sor skye bo byis pa lta bu'i/
10a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes so// yongs su bta/
10a3(mdo sde): pa bzung nas gal te sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur na yang de dag gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig gi spyod yul dang sbyor ba dang rnam par grol ba/
10a4(mdo sde): mi shes te/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi kyang
10a5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes te/ gal te sems can thams cad bse ru dang 'dra ba'i rang sangs rgyas su gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' mi/
10a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / rnam par grol ba dang / don dam pa la bdag par da sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyor ba mi shes so//
10a7(mdo sde): su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te sems can thams cad mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang / de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so sor rig pa thob pa// dpa' ba
10b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / mos pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la brdab pa'i byin gyis brlabs mi shes so// rigs kyi bu byang chung sems dpa'
10b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di yang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob/ so sor rig pa thob/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ bskal pa dpag tu med /
10b3(mdo sde): pa 'das te/ ji ltar da ltar tshogs chen po 'dus pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dag shes nas/ ji ltar 'dir sems can kha cig tshogs chen po 'dir
10b4(mdo sde): 'ong zhing lta ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rigs kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs nas 'dir 'ong zhing nyan thos
10b5(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/ sems can thams
10b6(mdo sde): cad kyang skyo bar byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pas bsgrub pa'i tshogs chen po yang bstan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
10b7(mdo sde): tshogs chen po yang bstan pa bzhin no// gal te rigs kyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i tshogs ston du zin na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mongs par 'gyur/ bslang
11a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad la gnas pa'i bar du yang bslang par gyur pas 'di'i spyod yul dang / sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan par mi nus te/
11a2(mdo sde): de ltar chos zab mo'i yon tan la gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ni thabs shes pa la mkhas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad la gnas so// the tshom med do// ye shes/
11a3(mdo sde): gzhan la rab ma lus pa la mkhas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal po la 'os pa dang 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam ma
11a4(mdo sde): snying po de ni sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar par skye bar ston pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i nang las yongs su thar par byed pa'o// lus
11a5(mdo sde): kyi dug 'byung ba chen po'i nad gso bar byed pa'o// sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog bslar nas/ mtho ris dang thar par gnas
11a6(mdo sde): pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po'i ming rjod par byed/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ dri'i bul/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug
11a7(mdo sde): par byed na/ rigs kyi bu do ni de dag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang / de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel pa ci 'dra ba dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
11b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa ci 'dra ba la yang rtog cing / sems sbyang ba ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'am/ chos la bskyed pa 'am/ dge 'dun la bskyed pa'ang/
11b2(mdo sde): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i rang bzhin nam/ tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin nam/ bsgoms pa'i rang bzhin yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmi lam na'ang rung /
11b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas mngon sum du lam drang po'i thabs kyis ston te/ thabs des lta ba ngan par byed pa smon lam ngan pa'i bsam pa dang /
11b4(mdo sde): skyabs ngan pa dang / ngan par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par byed do// ci nas kyang de'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang / smon lam drang po dang /
11b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang bsten par 'gyur ba dang / myu ra du dri mi zhim pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang sdig pa'i lta ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang / de dag
11b6(mdo sde): gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad smon lam gyi dbang dang / legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 'gyur pa dang / de dag myur du bdag gi sems la
11b7(mdo sde): dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to// gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / gang yang sems
12a1(mdo sde): g.yengs pa dang / gang dag gi mig gi bar chad byas pa dang / lce bcings pa dang gang dag la yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na/ gal
12a2(mdo sde): te de dag gis nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nad med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying zag pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas rjod par
12a3(mdo sde): byed cing a ka ru dang / ta ka rus gdugs nas/ skyes bu dam pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal na/ rigs kyis bu ni de dag rmi lam na bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun du 'dus
12a4(mdo sde): gam brgya byin gyi gzugs sam dpal gyi gzugs samadabyangs can gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs sam/ blon po'i gzugs sam/ dpa' bo'i gzug
12a5(mdo sde): samasman pa'i gzugs sam/ pa'i gzugs sam/ ma'i gzugs sam/ khye'u'i gzugs sam/ bu mo'i gzugs kyis rmi lam na nad pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/
12a6(mdo sde): de'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sman dang yo byad du gyur pa thams cad de bzhin du ston te/ nad pa'i sbyor ba cig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang zhal ta dang /
12a7(mdo sde): longs spyod 'dod pa dang / gang kha ton dang / thos par 'dod pa dang / gang dben par 'dod pa dang / gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab 'dod pa dang /
12b1(mdo sde): gang yang grags par 'dod pa dang / gang bzo sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / gang dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gang gzugs 'dod pa dang / gang nor 'dod pa dang / gang dmapa/
12b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / gang rigs 'dod pa dang / gong bu 'dod pa dang / gang g.yog 'dod pa dang / gang yon tan 'dod pa dang gang sbyin pa 'dod pa dang / gang tshul khrims 'dod
12b3(mdo sde): pa nas/ gang shes rab kyi bar du 'dod pa dang / gang tshigs 'jam po 'dod pa dang / gang sems can rnams dang 'thun par 'dod pa dang / gang sdig pa thams cad las
12b4(mdo sde): thar bar bya bar 'dod pa dang / gang sbyin pa la gzhog par 'dod pa nas/ shes rab la gzhag pa'i bar du 'dod pa dang / tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa
12b5(mdo sde): dang yongs su spyod pa dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang / sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la gzhog par 'dod pa dang / ngang tshul ngan pa dag tshul khrims
12b6(mdo sde): la gzhog par 'dod dang / le lo can dag brtson 'grus la gzhog par 'dod pa na/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni thabs ston par byed do// gang snying rje chen po dang
12b7(mdo sde): ma bral zhing / bdag la lta zhing / sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la/ bdag gi thabs gang gis sems can 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang
13a1(mdo sde): chub la sems gzhag pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas snying rje chen po'i bar la dgod par bya snyam du sems pa
13a2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o// dgon pa'am/ dbye 'am/ bla ga ba med pa las a ka ru dang / ta ka ru dang / kA lA a nu sa ris bdug par
13a3(mdo sde): bya'o// thal mo sbyar te phyogs mtshams kun tu yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ sngags kyi tshogs 'di bzlas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ su mri sha su mri sha/ kA ru NI
13a4(mdo sde): ka tsa ra tsA ra/ bi tsa ra/ san tsa ra kA ru NI ka/ mu ra mu rA/ be ga d+ha ri/ mA mA tse b+h+ra dza/ ma hA kra ru NI ka/ tsin tA ma Ni pU rA ya/ kA ru NI ka/ sarba shA mi sAhA/
13a5(mdo sde): ya ad mAn+d+ha ri s+phu gung spa gung rA ti bo bi kA gung / kA ru NI ka/ pU rA ya tra na ma ma A shwa/ sarba baT tsa ra a sho// ga ti swAhA/ sngags 'di lan du mar bzlas
13a6(mdo sde): te nyal bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ni de la m+bi'i gzugs sam/ ri dgas kyi gzugs sam/ bya'i gzugs sam/ bdag nyid du ston pa 'am/ de'i bsod nams kyi skal
13a7(mdo sde): ba ji lta bu de 'dra ba'i gzugs sam/ tshigs del tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed de/ thabs gcig po des sems can khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag yongs
13b1(mdo sde): su smin par byeng nus so// gang theg sa la mi gnas pa dang / gang zhan thos kyi mes pa la gnas pa dang / gang rang snangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i snyoms
13b2(mdo sde): ngag des thang cig yud tsam dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang / thabs cung zad kyis kyang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la phyir mi ldog par gzhog pa nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang brdung
13b3(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa sna tshogs dang / sa bcu la gzhog pa'i bar du nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nam mkha'i snying po de ni thabs dang / ye sa
13b4(mdo sde): dang snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i tshad ni la las gzung nus kyi/ rigs kyi bu de'i thabs dang / ye shes dang /
13b5(mdo sde): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshad bzung bar ni mi nus te/ de ltar byang chub
13b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu sems can gang g.yo med pa/ sgyu med pa/ yang
13b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i nan tan dang ldan pa/ lta ba drang po dang ldan pa/ gzhan mi smod pa// bdag mi stod pa/ phrag dog dang / ser sna spangs pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ bsam
14a1(mdo sde): pazhug pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di nyid rtse bar byed/ thabs dang / ma gas dag gru da/ gra nas byung ldan / sams/
14a2(mdo sde): can de thabs dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba des de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
14a3(mdo sde): sems skye bar byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang byang chub tu sngo bar byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/
14a4(mdo sde): mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba chen po nges pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ spro ba dang brtul ba chen por 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
14a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan gyi chos dang / brtul ba bsam/
14a6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces/
14a7(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i slad du yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la yid bzhin gi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing / de shin tu lham me/ lhang rer gad
14b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la de ltar ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' char po ma ma/
14b2(mdo sde): snying po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa/ sdug bsngal chen po las thar par byed pa ste/ sems can gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa babyung
14b3(mdo sde): ba ngan song du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par byed pa/ 'jig par byed pa'i sems can de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni sman du gyur pa'o// ma rig pa'i mun
14b4(mdo sde): pa mun nog dang / lta ba ngan pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la ni 'di nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'o// ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags su 'jug pa'o// de dag gi snying la the tsom yid
14b5(mdo sde): pa 'dral bar byed pa'o// gang dag snying gi snod chag par gyur pa/ ltung ba'i dngos por gyur pa/ phas pham pa'i sems can dge ba'i chos thams cad zhig par gyur pa
14b6(mdo sde): ngan song du 'gro ba/ mgon med pa/ rten med pa/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs pa rnams la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di 'khar ba dang mtshungs pa la/ lam ston pa'o//
14b7(mdo sde): sdig pa thams cad dang / dri mo zhim pa thams cad ston par byed pa 'khru bar byed pa'o// 'gro ba ngan pa'i lam las zlog par byed pa'o// shing rta dang mtshungs pa'o//
15a1(mdo sde): mtho ris dang thar pa la 'jog par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can gang dag sems shin tu 'dod par 'jug pa dang gang dag shin tu khre/
15a2(mdo sde): ba dang / gnod sems dang / gnong 'arlab pa dang / se ra snas sems 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag shin tu gti mug gi mun par song ba dang / rgyu med par smra ba
15a3(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten pha rol gyis mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / gang dag nor sogs pas chog mi shes pa dang / gang dag mi dge ba'i chos bcu'i bar du rtag tu shin tu ldan pa'i
15a4(mdo sde): sems can de dag gi ngan song gi sgo gcod par byed pa nas/ shing rta dang mtshungs pa'i bar du yin te/ sems can rnams mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par byed pa'o//
15a5(mdo sde): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par rigs kyi bu 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par bya ba
15a6(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan na/ sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba sprug par bgyid
15a7(mdo sde): cing ngan song du 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang / ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham pa de la rigs kyi bu 'di mtho ris dang thar
15b1(mdo sde): pa'i bde bas tshim par bgyid pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas
15b2(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba'i lung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thangs spyi bo nas dbang bsgyur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par 'gyur
15b3(mdo sde): ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ ngan srong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rgyal thabs spyi bo nas
15b4(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba/ mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba 'phrog par byed dam/ 'phrog tu 'jug par byed pa 'di ni
15b5(mdo sde): ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o// gang yang chos spong bar byed de nyan thos kyi 'byung bar bshad pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung bar bshad pa 'am theg pa chen po'i 'byung
15b6(mdo sde): bar bshad pa spong bar byed/ 'gog par byed/ sbed par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtse ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang nga'i phyir mgo dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos pa
15b7(mdo sde): bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung / bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ de'i gos ngur smrig 'phrog cing khyim par
16a1(mdo sde): byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod par byed dam/ btson rar 'jug par byed/ srog dang dpral bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// ga
16a2(mdo sde): yang rgyal rigs kyi ched du bsams te/ ma'i srog gcod/ pha dang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i srog gcod par byed// dge 'dun 'dus pa dbye bar byed//
16a3(mdo sde): ched du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o sangs rgyas la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin par byed namatshams med pa'i las 'di
16a4(mdo sde): lnga las gang yang rung ba zhig 'byung bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang yang rgyal rigs rgyu med par smra bar gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol la btang snyoms su byed/ mi dge
16a5(mdo sde): ba'i las kyi lam bcu blangs shing 'jug par byed/ gzhan yang sems can mang po dag mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la 'doms par byed/ gzhog par byed/ gnas par byed pa 'di/
16a6(mdo sde): ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang yang rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'di lnga las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rgyal
16a7(mdo sde): rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de thams cad sprug par 'gyur ro// ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i bde
16b1(mdo sde): ba thams cad las pas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni de 'dra ba'i yul mtha' 'khob kyi nang du skye zhing 'jug
16b2(mdo sde): bar ston te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang sbyor lam ston to// gang dang gang
16b3(mdo sde): gis bdag gis skye ba 'byung bar ston pa/ de dang de dag tu rgyal rigs de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas
16b4(mdo sde): bshad pa/ zab mo zab pa'i mdo sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed/ de'i phyir rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang
16b5(mdo sde): bskur ba de sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/ smod par byed/ 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed cing de sbyin pa dang / dul ba
16b6(mdo sde): dang sdom pa dang / brtul ba'i spo ba chen po la gnas shing / mtho risi la rten par 'gyur ro// byams pa blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i yang lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/
16b7(mdo sde): gang yang blon po mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed dam/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'phrogs par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o// gang yang grong 'byed/
17a1(mdo sde): par byed/ gzhongs 'byed pa dang / grong khyer 'byed pa dang / yul 'byed par byed pa 'di na ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang blon po chos spong
17a2(mdo sde): bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung bar bshad pa spong bar byed 'gog par
17a3(mdo sde): byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gang yang blon po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ rab tu byung ba la gartse bar byed na/ bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung bsla pa
17a4(mdo sde): mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung / de dag gyi gos ngur smrig 'phrog par byed/ khyim par byed dam/ lus la cha
17a5(mdo sde): pas gcod dam/ brtson rar 'jug par byed ram/ srog gcod par byed pa de ni blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang yang blon pos mtshams med pa lnga las mtshams
17a6(mdo sde): med pa gang yang rung ba'i las byed cing / sogs pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu blon po gang ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po 'di dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung
17a7(mdo sde): pa zhig byung na/ blon po de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyu ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las pas pham par 'gyur/
17b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba la rten par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' num mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul mtha' 'khob gzhan du gnas shing
17b2(mdo sde): skye ba 'byung bar yang ston te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / tshwa lugs dang / spyod lam gyis sems can rnams la chos 'chad la lar ni bu mo'i
17b3(mdo sde): gyi gzugs kyis chos 'chad de/ gang dang gang rig tu sde ba'i thung bar ston pa deng de dag su yang blon pa de 'drab dgal chos 'chad de/ sngon ma byung ba stan par ma zung ba/ khams
17b4(mdo sde): cad mkhyed pas bshad pa/ zab mo zad pa'i mdo sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dga' chad par byed/ ston par byed de/ de'i phyir blon pa de sngon byas pa'i mo dge ba'i
17b5(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/ smod par byed/ las kyi sgrib pa de yang 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed de/ de sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa la
17b6(mdo sde): brtul ba'i nan tan gyis gnas shing mtho ros la rten par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga pa'o// ldog pa zhe na/ srog gcod pa dang /
17b7(mdo sde): byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'jom zhing khrag 'byin par byed pa ste lnga'o// gang nga'i nyan /
18a1(mdo sde): pa ltung ba'i rtsa ba de lnga las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig rlung na/ rtag tu ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
18a2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston cing / la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / sbyor lam gyis 'chad de/ snga ma bzhin
18a3(mdo sde): gyi bar du mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni brgyad de/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis 'azug par gyur
18a4(mdo sde): pa'i theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i las thog ma pa dag ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa thams cad sdug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang / mi dang /
18a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i bde ba las pas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing 'khor ba na yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro//
18a6(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag sngon ngan par spyod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs pa/ rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes nas/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba
18a7(mdo sde): chung ngu dang ldan pa las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan te gnas te/ theg pa chen po'i shin tu zab pa 'di nyan cing / rigs kyi bu de dag blo chung ngu zin gyis kyang /
18b1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de shin tu zab pa stong pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par//
18b2(mdo sde): byed/ lung sbyin par byed/ klog par byed de/ de dag ji ltar thos pa dang / de dag ji ltar kun chub pa bzhin du/ sems can gzhan sngon gyi blo dang 'dra ba dag gi mdun du don dang bcas/ yig 'dru
18b3(mdo sde): dang bcas pas rgya cher dran par byed/ ston par byed pa dang / dka' ba ma byas pa'i byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo de dag thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngangs par 'gyur/ skrag par
18b4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ skrag pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu las ldog cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems smon par 'gyur ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa
18b5(mdo sde): ba dang po ste/ rigs kyi bu ltung ba'i rtsa ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa thams cad sdugs par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba las phas pham par 'gyur//
18b6(mdo sde): de'i byang chub kyi sems bslus shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas na 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho mching rnams chen po khad kyis gzhol ba de bzhin du/ nga
18b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba thog mar shes par bya ste/ byang chu sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rim gyi
19a1(mdo sde): chos bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po yang de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ de'i phyir byang /
19a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de lta bu'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar gyur la/ ngan song gis 'jig skrag nas/ de dag gas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos
19a3(mdo sde): nas/ lhung ba de dag bshags pa'i phyir mthong bar 'dod na// des tho rangs kyi thun la/ a ka ru 'am/ ta ka ru 'am/ bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa'
19a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod par bya'o// de'i skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu des sems can de mthong nas// de lta 'di lta bu'i gzugs su ston te/ la la'i mdun du ni tha/
19a5(mdo sde): mal par 'dug sde chos 'chad do// la la'i mdun du ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis la la'i mdun du ni bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa
19a6(mdo sde): de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar byung ba de dag 'chags su 'jug go// bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i spyod pa zab pa/ zabs mkhas pa yang del ston par byed do// ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod/
19a7(mdo sde): pa dang / gzungs dang / sa'i bar du yang 'jig par byed do// de'i phyir ngan songs thams cad las yongs su thar cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las/
19b1(mdo sde): kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rdo rje bzhin du mthu che zhing / brtul ba bstan par 'gyur/ myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang mngon/
19b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal tengs bdag nyid mdun du mngon sum dum bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa' des skye reng 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe langs te/ skye reng la gsol ba gang ngas
19b3(mdo sde): bya sted 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// skye ring thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa skye reng khyod 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir shar ma thag tu/ bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig/ namam pa'i ste/
19b4(mdo sde): po'i thugs rje chen po la bdag gi tshig gis gsungs te/ ci nas kyang de bdag gi rmi lam du ston cing / de'i slad du bdag lhung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg
19b5(mdo sde): pa chen po las thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig chen po thob par 'gyur bar mdzod cig ces bya ste/ des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya'o// skye ring shar ma thag tu yang byang chub
19b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa lhung ba byung ba de'i rmi lam du ston par byed de/ ye shes kyi thabs chen pos de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang 'chags
19b7(mdo sde): su 'jug go// thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston par byed de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
20a1(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la yang shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
20a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
20a3(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyis/ khyod myur du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed cig dang / de'i phyir khyod myur du 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
20a4(mdo sde): ji ltar sngar bshad pa'i bar du de skad ces zer na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
20a5(mdo sde): las thog ma pa la la zhig la/ kye khyod kyis so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang / tshul khrims dang legs par spyad pas ci zhig bya/ khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ theg pa chen po lhogs shig dang / de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis khyod kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba'i las gang cung zad kyang bsgrubs pa'i
20a7(mdo sde): ngag de'i phyir dag cing rnam par smin par 'gyur ba med do zhes/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin gyi bar du de skad zer na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i
20b1(mdo sde): pa gsum pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa la la zhig lA/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i tam sbyongs shi/
20b2(mdo sde): mnyan cig/ ma glog shig/ gzhan la ma spyon cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam sba bar gyis shig/ khyod ni de'i phyir 'bras bu chen po thob par mi 'gyur ro//
20b3(mdo sde): khyod ni de'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed kyang ma nus kyis/ khyod theg pa chen po'i gtam la dad par gyis shig/ theg pa chen po nyon cig/ khyod theg pa chen po
20b4(mdo sde): lhogs shig/ gzhan la ston cig dang / de'i phyir khyod ngan 'gro dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
20b5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/ gal te de de'i tshig bzhin du byed cing lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu len par byed na/ gnyis ka yang ltung ba'i rtsa bar
20b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog pa pa'i ltung ba rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog sam pa dag lce gnyis par
20b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gzhan du sems la gzhan du smon cing / theg pa chen po 'di yang sgra grags pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir 'dod par byed/
21a1(mdo sde): kha ton byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ 'chad par byed/ pha rol la yang thos pasam ston par byed cing / bdag ni zag pa chen po mayin gyi/ gzhan
21a2(mdo sde): ma yin no zhes de skang zer zhing / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir gzhan la srag rog du byur la/ pha rol gang las nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la/ de
21a3(mdo sde): gyis de dag 'khrug par 'gyur/ de dag gi mi bsngags pa brjod par byed/ smod par byed/ brnyas par byed/ ngan du brjod par byed/ bdag spyod par byed cing / de dag phrag dog gi rgyus /
21a4(mdo sde): mi las bla ma'i chos dang ldan par 'chad par byed de/ de'i phyir dngos po des ltung bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i bde ba las pas ngam par gyur nas/ de'i phyir yang theg pa chen po las lci ba chen po'i ltu
21a5(mdo sde): ba byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na skyes bu la la zhig rin po che'i gling du 'gro 'dod de/ rgya mtsho mching rnams chen por gru las song ba las/ rgya mtsho/
21a6(mdo sde): mching rnams chen por glu nyid zhig par gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa yang theg pa chen po'i rgya mtsho mching rnams brgal bar 'dod pa las/ phrag dog gi phyir
21a7(mdo sde): brdzun smras nas/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag dad pa'i gru zhig cing / shes rab kyi srog dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa phrag dog
21b1(mdo sde): gi phyir brdzun du smras pa'i rkyen gyis ltung bsgrib chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'ini byang chub sems dpa' las rdogs pa'i ltung ba'i rdza ba lnga pa'o// gzhan yang rigs
21b2(mdo sde): kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na las thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa 'am// rab tu chung ba dang zab pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde brdungs dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sa
21b3(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i skyes bu rigs pa chen po dang ldan pa/ tshogs chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul gyi theg pa chen po'i mdo sde daklog par byed/ 'don par byed/ kha don byed/
21b4(mdo sde): bklags nas gzhan la brgya cher ston par byed de/ bdag gis chos 'ang dag rang gi blos rtogs nas/ nga snying rje ba'i phyir de ltar khyed la ston gyis/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos zab mo 'di
21b5(mdo sde): la mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms shig dang / da ltar gyi bzhin du khyod kyang ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra zhing / chos 'di lta bu zab mo zab pa dag mngon par nim byas kyi
21b6(mdo sde): bklags pa tsam gyis bstan to zhes ni mi zer bar rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir bdag 'tshong bar byed de/ de'i rkyen gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
21b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag gi spyan sngar nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur/ ltung ba ci ba byung bar
22a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams theg pa chen pos bzlas par 'gyur te/ de ni de'i nyan thos kyi theg par mi 'gyur na theg pa chen po lan smos klu theg pa rnon po la 'jug
22a2(mdo sde): pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par lta ci smos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon pa chen por so/
22a3(mdo sde): ba las/ bkres pa dang / skoms pa nyen cing ngal bar gyur nas/ de 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du zas kyi phyir 'dug nas nges shing 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa/
22a4(mdo sde): dri dang ldan pa/ ro dang ldan pa bor te/ dug gi shing ro med pa la 'dzegs nas dug gi 'bras bu za'o// zos nas 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ gang zag de yang dpe de dang 'dra bar brjod do//
22a5(mdo sde): de ba sa na mir rnyed pa shin tu dkon pa rnyed nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas te/ theg pa chen la 'jug par 'dod pa la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa'i phyir bdag stong/
22a6(mdo sde): gzhan spyod pa byed pas ltung ba lci ba de 'dra ba 'byung bar gyur nas/ ltung ba'i rtsa bad+ma'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyis shin du smad cing / dran song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ gang zag
22a7(mdo sde): ba ni rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs thams cad kyis mi bsten par bya'o// gang de bsnyen par byed pa ni shes pa thams cad 'das pa dang bcas pa 'i/
22b1(mdo sde): te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba drug pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ong ba'i dus na/ rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun du 'dodan pa'i/
22b2(mdo sde): phyag dar pa'am/ blon po'i phyag dar ba 'am/ dpa' bo'i phyag dar pa'am/ sman pa'i phyag dar ba thun pa/ mkhas pas bsnyems pa/ nor che ba longs spyod che ba dag 'byung /
22b3(mdo sde): de dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po rnam pa mang po dag byed par snang ste/ de dag gtong bas rgyags shing dregs nas/ snyems pa dang rgyags pas rgyal rigs dag kyang 'byed pa
22b4(mdo sde): byed/ dge sbyong dag kyang rgyal rigs dang 'byed cing / de dag rgyal rigs la gnas/ dge sbyong dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed do// nor gyi chad pas 'phrog par byed pas/ gno
22b5(mdo sde): pa de'i phyir dge slong de dag gis gang zag gi yang rung / dge 'dun gyi yang rung / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi yang rung / mchod rten gyi yang rung ste/ phrogs nas de dag la skyes
22b6(mdo sde): su 'brul bar byed/ phyag dar pa de dag kyang rgyal rigs la 'bul bar byed de/ de gnyis ka lhung ba'i rtsa ba'i 'gyur ro// 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bdun pa'o// gzhan yang
22b7(mdo sde): rgyal rigs kyi phragang rab de dge sbyongang bcas te/ nyes par 'gyur/ chos de lta bu dag kyang chos ma yin par 'jigs/ chos ma yin pa ni chos su 'dogs te/ chos spangs mdo lnga
23a1(mdo sde): dang 'dul ba'i bslab pa la miH/ ston pa nag po dang / ston pa chen po la mir+Na/ rnams pa dang / sgyid rje chen po dang / shes rab rol tu phyin pa'i barmAn
23a2(mdo sde): pa dang / thabs kyi bslab pa dang / gang yang mdo sde gzhan dag las bslab pa bshad pa de yang spangs nas/ dge sbyong dag gtse ba'i phyir/ de 'dra ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i bya ba 'cha'
23a3(mdo sde): pabar byed de/ bya bar bya ba de dag gis dge slong dag gtse bar 'gyur/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la sbyor ba'i yid la byed pa gtong bar 'gyur/ bsam gtan pa de dag gnod sems mang bar 'gyur/
23a4(mdo sde): bsade'i phyir dge slong dag gi nyon mongs pa ma zhi ba zhi bar mi byed/ srab mor mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe dge slong dag bsam pa nyams par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ spyod pa
23a5(mdo sde): nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams pa 'gyur te/ de'i phyir lhod par 'gyur/ phal cher lhod par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma yin na dge sbyong du yid dam 'tshal
23a6(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa ma yin na tshangs par spyod par yi dam 'cha' zhing bong bu dang mtshungs pa dang / chos shin tu bsal bar 'chad par 'gyur te/ de dag la rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu btu
23a7(mdo sde): sti byas pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de dag gis dge slong spongs pa la brtson pa rnams kyi mi bsngags pa khyis la brjod pa dang / rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pa
23b1(mdo sde): de yang dge slong spong ba la brtson pa de dag la zhe sdang zhing 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gang de na dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi ngan pa'i dang / longs spyod du byung de kha ton la brtson pa'i
23b2(mdo sde): dge slong la 'dul bar byas pas/ de gnyi ga ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong bsam gtan pa ni zhing dam pa yin gyi/ kha ton pa dang zhal ta la gnas pa ni/
23b3(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir te/ dge slong bsam gtan pa dge ni ting nge 'dzin dang / bzungs dang / bzod pa dang sa dag la snod du gyur pa/ sbyin gnas dam pa/ snod dam par gyur pa/ 'jig
23b4(mdo sde): rten gyi snang bar byed pa/ lam ston par byed pa/ las kyi zhing dang nyon mongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la gan
23b5(mdo sde): par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ni tshogs ma byung ba/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan/
23b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ lung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang me'i bde ba thams cad las pas/
23b7(mdo sde): pham par 'gyurabyang chub kyi sems kyis bslus par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni/ de lta bu dag gi yul du skye zhing 'byung bar/
24a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis/ lA lar ni bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam nas/ byol song /
24a2(mdo sde): gi mtshan ma dang / spyod lam gyi bar du gzugs sna tshogs ston te/ rgya cher ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba bzhin klog par bya ste/ de dang de dag tu sems can de dang de dag la ji/
24a3(mdo sde): ltar 'thun pa bzhin du chos 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa'i mdo sde dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / sa 'chad pa te/ de'i/
24a4(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa thabs mi shes pa ltung ba byung ba dag ngo tsha bar byed/ ltung ba des 'jigs par byed/ snang bar byed/ skrag par byed/ ltung ba de dag 'chags par byed//
24a5(mdo sde): gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed/ spong bar byed do// gal te sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ mthong bar 'dod cing / ngan song du ltung bas
24a6(mdo sde): 'jigs te/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba bshags par 'dod na/ gal ted dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing / de'i ming nas brjodan/ rigs kyi bu de dag go skal
24a7(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can de'i 'dun du thamal pa'i tshul du 'jug pa 'am/ zam po'i gzugs nas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' las thogs pa de'i mdur/
24b1(mdo sde): du 'dug ste/ lhung ba'i rtsa ba de ji ltar byung ba 'chags su 'jug go// de'i thabs mkhas pa zab mo dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la spyod pa yang ston/ sa dwangs dag tu yang ting ba rji/
24b2(mdo sde): dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la gzhog par byed de/ rim gyis lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis gzhog par byed do// de nas de dag ngan song gi 'jigs pa chen po las shin
24b3(mdo sde): tu thar par byed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gzhog par byed do// de ltar de glog dang mtshungs pa dang / pha rol tu phyir pa drug gi spyod pa la mthun
24b4(mdo sde): zhing brtul bar 'gyur ro// de bas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te de dag la mngon sum du bdag ston par mi byed na/ gang de la
24b5(mdo sde): gsol bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las thob ma pa nyes pa dang bcas pas tho rangs kyi thun la langs te/ kha shar phyogs su bstan te 'dug la/ lha'i bu skya reng la gsol ba gdab par bya ba
24b6(mdo sde): 'di skad du brjod do// skya reng skya reng thugs rje chen po can/ skal ba chen po can khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu/ bdag la thugs rjes dag par mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' num mkha'i
24b7(mdo sde): snying po thugs rje chen po can la bdag gi tshogs gis ston te/ bdag gi rmi lam du yang de ston par 'gyur zhing / bdag gis thabs de ltung ba bshags par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen
25a1(mdo sde): pol babs dang ye shes thob par mdzod cig ces smras nas/ des de'i tshe ma la duganyid log par bya ste/ skya reng 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dang/
25a2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmi lam na/ tha mal par mdun du 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'chags su 'jug/ ye shes dang thabs
25a3(mdo sde): pos thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po la shi/
25a4(mdo sde): tu brtan por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
25a5(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs dang / shes rab kyang de la ston to// de bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni shin tu dpa' ba las byung
25a6(mdo sde): ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la 'dug par snang ngo // de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po ni yon tan bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan no// /
25a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi ngu bzhin yang sems can gang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos sam/ gzugs 'drir 'jug gam/ de la mchod pa byed dam/ rim gro byed/ bsti stang byed/
25b1(mdo sde): byed/ mchod pa byed cing / metog dang / dri dang / phreng pa dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rtul mtshan dang / bdun rnam pa dum dag gis bkur sti byed/ phrag 'tshal bar byed/
25b2(mdo sde): gi srog kyang de la 'bul bar byed na/ sems can de dag ni mes dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chus ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gi 'chi bar mi byed de/ de dag tshe zad pa ma gtogs par
25b3(mdo sde): mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang de de dag gi srog 'phrog par mi nus/ dus ma yin par mi 'chi/ rang pu can du mi 'gyur/ bkres pa dang / skom pas dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rgyal
25b4(mdo sde): po'i chad pas chad par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de dag mig gis gzugs mi mthong / rna bas sgra mi thos/ snas dri mo tshor// lhas
25b5(mdo sde): ro mi myong / lus kyi reg mi shes shing / da dung du dbugs phra mo 'byung ba dang 'jug par byed/ da dung du de'i lus la tshe dang / rbod dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe
25b6(mdo sde): rag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po tha mal par ston par byed de/ sems can gang sngon bram zel gus par gyur pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa la ni/ rigs kyi bu de zam rdo'i
25b7(mdo sde): gzugs su ston to// gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus de dag la ni/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bar du ston pa nas/ gang mthu bo che la gus pa dang / gang dbang phyug chen po la gus pa dang /
26a1(mdo sde): brgya byin la gus pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba la gus pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gnas bsrung po dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ngal bsos
26a2(mdo sde): po la gus pa dang / gang dag lha dang / ri dang / shing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka sna tshogs la gus pa'i bar du/ gang dang gang gi skyabs su song ba'i sems can de dag la/
26a3(mdo sde): lta de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun du bstan nas/ gang gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba bzhin du de'i gzugs kyis 'di skad ces smra'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag la/ gang dag shes/
26a4(mdo sde): rab kyis mthong ba/ 'khor ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba na ni de kun shes/ sems can de dag gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas/ mtho sa la rten
26a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag spangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs bstan nas 'di skad ces smra'o//
26a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yin/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba// ye shes de la myur du reg/ sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyas yid
26a7(mdo sde): la byed pa'i sgras dga' zhing rangs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa med pa/ yongs su dag pa/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'tsho ba gzhes pa
26b1(mdo sde): chos kyang ston pa der skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun la klog par bya'o// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis miH/
26b2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan no// gang yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs pa sems kyis shin tu dbang du bya ba 'dod na/ des tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal te/
26b3(mdo sde): mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces brjod do// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen
26b4(mdo sde): brnyes pa/ bdag la dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor srol ciga'adi lta ste/ u mu ran khre/ pad+ma kAn+ti le/ sa mudra a ba ta ren nA yan ya/ ma hA kA ru ni ka/ a rub
26b5(mdo sde): dzamar+tha smi ti/ a r+d+ha ma bas+tha ti/ badz+ra mar+tha sI ti/ ko&skr-i ti/ a nu ma mr-i ti/ bud d+ha koN smr-i ti swA hA/ de la dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa sbyin par byed do// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi bka
26b6(mdo sde): yang rung nyan thos kyis bshad pa yang rung ste/ gtsug lag sna tshogs klog par 'dod na/ des khrus byas te/ skya reng 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o//
26b7(mdo sde): mchod pa ci rus kyis bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya'o// 'di skad kyang brjod por bya'o// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ mkhas pa chen po sems can thams
27a1(mdo sde): cad kyin ga ngasam gyis mi khyab pa/ rigs kyi dranam mkha'i snying po gang cag gi mchog/ dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin byin la 'byo dag la grol cig 'di lta ste/ a ni la dza~M//
27a2(mdo sde): bi shan tu sha dzA bi ya ba na dza/ bi pa kri su ma/ pa ta la dz+nyA si/ sman sha ra be/ shA s+t+ra kar ne/ hum hu ma ma hA ka ru NI ka swa hA/ gang rgya mtsho mching rnam chen por 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang khung du
27a3(mdo sde): 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang bcud dam pa spyod 'dod par gyur pa dang / gang brtson rar bcug pa dang / gang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang / gang mi mdza' ba dang phrad pa dang / gang dag mes 'jigs pa
27a4(mdo sde): dang chu dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / byad sdom dang / stag dang / seng ge dang / dug drag po dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can gyis 'jigs par bgyi pa dang / gang dam du bcings pa
27a5(mdo sde): / gang chad pas bcad pa dang / gang gsod pa la thug pa dang / gnad kyis bta pa dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gang dag chos go swA dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal sran dang /
27a6(mdo sde): ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang / yo byad kyis phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i mang nas brjod cing / mchod pa ci nus kyis byed la/ sems can thams cad la byams
27a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis gnog cing / 'di gad du yang smra ste// dgangs shig dgongs shig/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ grags po chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'gro ba'i don bzhed pa thug /
27b1(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa bdag la gzigs shig/ bdag 'di lta bu las rab tu thar pa mdzod cig/ skal bsno la cig/ mthu chen po bdag ni sdug bsngal gyi nyam thag po / shin tu dngul lo//
27b2(mdo sde): bdag ni khyod la gnas nas/ zhi ba dang bde ba dang tshe rabs gzhan du thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po gzugs tha mal pa nas/ bu mo gzugs
27b3(mdo sde): kyi bar gyis sems can de dag gi mdur du 'dug ste/ dbugs 'byor par byed do// gang dag ci las 'jigs pa de dag de las rab tu thar bar byed do// gang dag dbul bgos med pa dang / gang
27b4(mdo sde): dag yo byad kyis brel ba'i bar du de dag la de la de ltar bas dpa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bar dur 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i bu la la 'ag gnas men
27b5(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba thob par sems pa de/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la/ mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa la sogs te/ bram ze'i gnas chen
27b6(mdo sde): po dang / khyim bdag gi gnas cher po dang / bzo gnas chen po dang / zos pa'i gnas chen po dang / sgom pa'i gnas chen po dang / gang mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa/
27b7(mdo sde): de dag gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ma thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/ khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ tho rangs kyi thur la/ byang chub sems
28a1(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la skyabs su song nas/ gsol ba gdab pa 'di skad du rjod par byed/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la skal/
28a2(mdo sde): stsol cig/ bsam pa dang / sems pa thams cad dang / bsam pa yid bzhin rab tu rdzogs par mdzod cig/ gang sems shing gang poso pa zugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis mdzod cig ces rjo/
28a3(mdo sde): na// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas skad de thos nas/ sems can de dag la bdag ci rigs par
28a4(mdo sde): ston te/ de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan no// rno rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po
28a5(mdo sde): dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho mtshang rnam chen po'i theg pa ni la la zhig gis tshad bzung bar nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' stong po thabs dang ye shes
28a6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa dang / thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshad ni bzung mi nus so// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad kyi tshad ni la las bzung
28a7(mdo sde): rus kyi// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul par byed pa ni tshing bzung ma nus te/ la lar nisam
28b1(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul bar byed do// la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs su byed cing / sems cad dzim bus 'dul ba de la bu'i gzugs kyi dang /
28b2(mdo sde): du sprul par byed de/ de byol song du gtogs pa rnams kyi nang du ni byol song gi gzugs su sprul par byed do// sems cand dpral ba pa rnams kyi nang dun sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzug
28b3(mdo sde): su sprul par byed pa nas/ gshon rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed do// kha cig la ni mngon sum du sprul pa sprul par byed/ kha cig
28b4(mdo sde): ni mi lam du sprul par byed/ kha cig la sdig pa'i las sprug pa'i phyir/ ngan song las bsgral ba'i phyir/ mtho ris la dgod pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ 'chi 'pho ba'i
28b5(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe/ rnam par shes pa tha ma rgyu ba'i tshe/ gzugs sna tshogs su sprul par byed de/ de dag de la thog mar skyabs su song zhing mthong ste/ bde ba thob nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnas
28b6(mdo sde): pa'i bde bathob pa'i bar du 'gyur bar/ ro'i phyir sus kyang de'i sprul pa thams cad kyis tshad gzung bar mi nus so// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' snga
28b7(mdo sde): po 'di ni thabs dang / ye shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no// de bas na rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog
29a1(mdo sde): mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor du rin po che 'dug par snang ngo // de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
29a2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po la ngo mtshar thob/ rmad du byung ba thob/ bla ma la bkur sti dang / bsti stang du bya ba thob par gyur nas/ thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
29a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la mchod pa dang / bkur sti sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed/ me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgya
29a4(mdo sde): mtshan dang / kha dan dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / stong pa dang / glu dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po des kyang
29a5(mdo sde): dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa// rnyog
29a6(mdo sde): pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rigs pa'i mun pa chen pos rmongs pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyis don ji ltar bgyi bar nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
29a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba/ nyon ma mongs pa/ ma rmongs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o// nam mkha' 'a rlung gi rkyen gyis na/ thu
29b1(mdo sde): ba'i phul gyis dkrigs shing yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste/ chus ni zhi bar byed/ dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gang na skar ma dang / gza' dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i bye
29b2(mdo sde): brag mi mngon na ni/ skad cig dang thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / nyen mo dang / mtshan mo dang / dus dang lo rnams kyi bgrang ba yang mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
29b3(mdo sde): pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba/ yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi/ sems can rnams kyi blo bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis/
29b4(mdo sde): sems rtse bar nyon mongs par byas te/ de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad do// sems nyon mongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi
29b5(mdo sde): sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang / de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas/ ye shes 'od zer gyis tshim
29b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
29b7(mdo sde): pa'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying rje ba la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag las kyang
30a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
30a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems nam mas mig la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
30a3(mdo sde): de ma lags so// ci mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// ci mig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// gang yang na
30a4(mdo sde): du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus la
30a5(mdo sde): brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha' yid la gnas pa nas/ yid kyis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/
30a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ri ma lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems cananam mkha' la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems
30a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de skad ces dka' spel nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpamasam
30b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po na ma mkha'i snying po 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gcig la gcig mi rten to// gcig la gcig spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams can/
30b2(mdo sde): rtog pa ma mchis pa stong pa nyid de/ sgom btags pa yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ni 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa/ ri /
30b3(mdo sde): pa/ rnam par ma rtog pa/ mi g.yo ba/ gsob lags te/ myu gu ma mchis pa/ sa bon ma mchis pa/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa/ yi gem mchis pa/ rnam
30b4(mdo sde): sems ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//
30b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba rA dza/ man takrA ya/ dzi na dzA ya/ dza na ni/ ma mu ni ha ra/ An ya pha la/ gu na gar b+ha/ ni ya ma bi nA ya/ pu pa yA/ sha ta sha pa/ shA ma sha na/ ta thA ga ma/
30b6(mdo sde): sha mang gu/ ma du shi sha/ sha ma dze ta nA ya/ kle shan ta/ sang sho sha ne swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mig las rgyal bar
30b7(mdo sde): byed pa/ seng ge'i 'gros kyis phyir bsgyings pa'i gzugs 'dis sems can dga'achi ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i tha ma la/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi
31a1(mdo sde): sgrib pa sprug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'ang yongs su dag par gtong nus so// khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med par 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams snying rje'i
31a2(mdo sde): dbang gis grong dang / grong byer dang / grong 'arab dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du/ gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyong lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde sna tshos
31a3(mdo sde): 'chad pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar pa nas/ dge sbyong gi phyag dar ba'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las sbyang ba dang / thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par
31a4(mdo sde): nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzhan dag kyang sa
31a5(mdo sde): bcul ye shes skyes par gyur to// srog chags khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can dag gis gang dag rjor 'gyur ba/ de dag gi ni gzhi yo rtsa ba spongs// myur du ma /
31a6(mdo sde): bar gyur ba dag gi ni// rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'gyur bar bris// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / 'khor de thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lham yi/
31a7(mdo sde): dang ni dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen por
31b1(mdo sde): mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA badz+ra mun Ta nA ma d+hA ra Ni mahA yAn swAngaH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pardo rje'i snying po
31b2(mdo sde): gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grangs kyi ro dang
31b3(mdo sde): nye ba sna tshogs kyi grong gi rtswa'i spyil po na/ dge slong stong du tshangs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms kyi zas phyis len pa
31b4(mdo sde): spangs te/ rtswa'i spyil por skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du gzhag nas bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la mnyam
31b5(mdo sde): panyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das da lta/
31b6(mdo sde): ga la bzhugs pa'i sku ma mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha
31b7(mdo sde): bu sum khri nyis stong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'ad
32a1(mdo sde): da ltar gang na bzhugs snyam sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i spyil po'i nang na ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag gis mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan
32a2(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cang mi smra ba skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de
32a3(mdo sde): nyid du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon pa
32a4(mdo sde): 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/
32a5(mdo sde): pa la yang dag par zhugs nas/ ring du lon pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'am/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yang rung ste/ ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtswa'i spyil po/
32a6(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi gang tsam gyis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khor do// de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sa
32a7(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
32b1(mdo sde): mthag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad sems rab tu dga' ba dang sems mgu ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems shin tu tshim pa skyes so// de nas de'i tshe byang chub
32b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pas chos thams cad rab tu zhi bar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma
32b3(mdo sde): zag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyi dbang po rnams rab tu zhi bar gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' drug tu
32b4(mdo sde): nyis stong dang lhan cig tu/ sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtsa'i skyil po ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu/ bdag nyid steng ga ni ma mkha'i bar snang la 'dug pa snyam du shes te/ de steng gi nam
32b5(mdo sde): mkha' de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gi bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
32b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bar snang thams cad me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma
32b7(mdo sde): dkar pos kun tu khebs nas/ nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chu sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byang/
33a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha' las sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu byang
33a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs la 'dug ma nus nas/ de byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma de dag dang lhan cig tu steng gi bar snang la nam mkha' la skyil mo krung bcas
