90a1(mdo sde): bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po shugs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rjes su cher chags zhes bya ba me tog dang / spos thams cad dang lhan cig ldan zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga
90a2(mdo sde): bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgra'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// sprin gyi rgyal po chen po 'bum phrag dum yang glu dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs shing // nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi charang bebs/
90a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo khro bar byed do// yang de'i tshe seng ge dpa' ba la sogs pa dang pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag la nga pa'i rgyal po rir yang 'khor dang pa 'dum zag/
90a4(mdo sde): ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ngang pa'i skad dpe med pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ngang pa'i rgyal po de dag thams
90a5(mdo sde): cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe rma bya'i rgyal po legs mthong la sogs pa/ ma bya'i rgyal po 'dum phrag grangs med pal rma bya'i rgyal po re re
90a6(mdo sde): ya nga khor mabya dum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste rnams nas/ ma bya'i sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya 'tshal te/ phyogs
90a7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// ma bu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tong nge 'dzin tha dang pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe lu byug gi rgyal po sde la sogs pa// bu zug gi rgyal po 'dum thas
90b1(mdo sde): grangs med pa la khwa thug gi rgyal po re ro lab du thug 'bum pa gagrangs med pa dag dang / bcom 'das pal ba der dong ste lpags nas/ khu thug gi gang snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ phyogs gcig su 'khod do// bu drug gi rtswa 'o//
90b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtseb sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe ka la rina'i rgyal po pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig la sogs pa ka la birdo'i
90b3(mdo sde): rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ ka la nga de'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka la ring+ka'i 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag/ ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad snyan pa 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa yang
90b4(mdo sde): dag pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ka la 'di'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe shang shang
90b5(mdo sde): 'u'i rgyal po rgyal ba la sogs pa/ shang shang te'u'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ shang shang te'u'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor shang shang te'u'i 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/
90b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i sgra sad snyan pas bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shang shang te'u'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b7(mdo sde): po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go yang de'i tshe bya'i rigs 'dres pa la sogs pa tha dad pa grangs med pa la bya'i rigs 'dres pa re re la bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa yod de/ bya'i rgyal
91a1(mdo sde): po'i ri yang gakhor bye bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ soso bya skad kyi rol mo'i sgra deng med pa'i gangs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i spod pa dag gis bcom
91a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge dzin tha dang bdag
91a3(mdo sde): rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe seng ge'i rgyal po rin po che pad+ma la sogs pa/ seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la seng ge'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor seng ge'i 'bum phrag grangs med pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste
91a4(mdo sde): lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra skad kyi rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// seng ge'i
91a5(mdo sde): rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po rgyal po'i ri ki'i nabun lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po 'bum
91a6(mdo sde): phrag grangs med pa la spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po rir yang khor spos kyi glang po 'bum phragagrangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste rmugs nas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod /
91a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bas la mgonas phrag 'tshal nas/ lan ga sum 'askor byas te/ thogs gcig tu long so// spos kyi gang pongs thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po ting 'dzi pa dang pa dag la rnam par
91b1(mdo sde): rag sdug go// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / stag dang / ririgs rigs tha dad pa 'dres pa thams pad bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gabyas la mgongos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu gdod do// sprul dang
91b2(mdo sde): stag dang / ri dgas de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe sha
91b3(mdo sde): sbrang dang / sbrang du mchu rings dang / spang ma dang / bi shu ka dang / nya dang / ru swa la dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / se sar dang / lug pa dang / sdig pa dang / srin gyi rigs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa dag dang / sdig sbrul ba dang 'dres pa gnas
91b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang / phag dang / khyi dang / wa dang / gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams/ com ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs/
91b5(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / myur du gdug pa dang / sbrul gzi gu dang / sbrul mi bzad pa'i gdug pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grangs med pa dang // bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs/
91b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon ngan yang dag pa dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe spun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang drug
91b7(mdo sde): chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dag dang / 'i gzhan dag gi lha rnams ra ba khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tam yang drag pa dag gis mngon par
92a1(mdo sde): bstod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin pa dang pa dag la rnam par rtse ba/
92a2(mdo sde): stag go// yang de'i tshe sman dang / nags kyi lha thams cad rang rang gi khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de//
92a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/
92a4(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen snying po'i 'khor rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig gcig la bskal pa brgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/
92a5(mdo sde): grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug par mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung / bcom ldan
92a6(mdo sde): 'das rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba phrag ni ji snyed/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu ni/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi
92a7(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / bdags pa dang /
92b1(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bdag gis/ sems can rgya mamo ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad cig gusam mo//
92b2(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ mi 'jigs pa thog pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po dag ni
92b3(mdo sde): sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs
92b4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
92b5(mdo sde): kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na gzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs lo sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po'i sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs
92b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
92b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la
93a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su ma phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
93a2(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i
93a3(mdo sde): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum li ni'i skyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par bzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sna
93a4(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi no'o skyed mos tshal nas/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
93a5(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang phyug chen po'irimagro byed du 'ong ba rnam par ba
93a6(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin/
93a7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byis pa'i rtser mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi/
93b1(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge slob pa'i bla gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
93b2(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge dang / bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / brtsi ba dang /
93b3(mdo sde): shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sbyin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shAkya'i bu mo sa
93b4(mdo sde): 'tshom dam bcas pa thob par bya ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs/
93b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol de bzhin/
93b6(mdo sde): bshegs pa rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/
93b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba dang / rab tu byung ba la gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
94a1(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par 'byung ba rnams par gzhag pa'i byin/
94a2(mdo sde): gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi na bza' ngur smrig bzhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
94a3(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod cing bzhugs pa rnams par gzhag pa'i/
94a4(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang bsgo yod do// sbyin chen song po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' baspyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par ga/
94a5(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rgya
94a6(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
94a7(mdo sde): kyi chochos la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
94b1(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen sdong po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa rnam par bzhag pa'i
94b2(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
94b3(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la
94b4(mdo sde): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos rnam pa'i sgo yod // sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi
94b5(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs
94b6(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis
94b7(mdo sde): su bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me'i 'od dang /
95a1(mdo sde): glog gi 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor bu'i 'o dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor/
95a2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal po'i bka' rnam par bzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
95a3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
95a4(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
95a5(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba
95a6(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i skrod yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su
95a7(mdo sde): skye ba rnam par gzhag pa byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge bcu'i las kyi
95b1(mdo sde): lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i
95b2(mdo sde): dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po smi'i chen ba'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa
95b3(mdo sde): dang kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs byed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sbyin chen snying po sprin chen po'i ma
95b4(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dug brgya cu rtsa bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po spar
95b5(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying
95b6(mdo sde): po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sor mo'i phreng ba'i nad kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
95b7(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
96a1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi/
96a2(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
96a3(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chom rkun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byon gyi/
96a4(mdo sde): brlabs kyi bstobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mings kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
96a5(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bar ba
96a6(mdo sde): kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
96a7(mdo sde): klu'i gnas dag tu nam mkha' lding kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
96b1(mdo sde): po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi dben kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sIr
96b2(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zag 'phen pa dang / 'jog pa kun tu 'a khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snga
96b3(mdo sde): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glang po che nor gyi 'jug pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i/
96b4(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bram ze'i bu mo slu byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
96b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag
96b6(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shAkya gsod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
96b7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par
97a1(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen skyong po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rang gi lus la las/
97a2(mdo sde): su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yo do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i
97a3(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
97a4(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stongs
97a5(mdo sde): la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
97a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi las su bsgo ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba
97a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi blangs pa dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la
97b1(mdo sde): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'deg pa dang 'jog pa rnam par bzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la/
97b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dus byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
97b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya/
97b4(mdo sde): ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
97b5(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
97b6(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
97b7(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos/
98a1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
98a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
98a3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
98a4(mdo sde): sbyin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i rkyen gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen gyis
98a5(mdo sde): po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brjod du med rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po
98a6(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod
98a7(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
98b1(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
98b2(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yod pa rnams par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
98b3(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ming rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
98b4(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i rkyen gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
98b5(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sna ba'i sgo yod do//
98b6(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'o sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po
98b7(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
99a1(mdo sde): po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
99a2(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// de la
99a3(mdo sde): sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba'i sgo bye ba khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spunas 'od zer chags pa med pa/
99a4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dag kyang byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ bdud rtsi
99a5(mdo sde): gnas thams cad mgo mog par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par
99a6(mdo sde): byas nas/ phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan grangs med par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la phog par gyur to// de
99a7(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
99b1(mdo sde): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam/
99b2(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bar/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
99b3(mdo sde): 'dirab sdu bar gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
99b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
99b5(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo//
99b6(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom//
99b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang
100a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed/
100a2(mdo sde): mos tshal du sku bltam pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
100a3(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum ri ni'o skyed mos tshal du gom pa 'dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
100a4(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum po ni'o skyed mos tshal du phyogs su
100a5(mdo sde): gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan
100a6(mdo sde): babadas kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs sbyor bas/
100a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum
100b1(mdo sde): bi ni'i skyed mos tshal nas grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
100b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po rim gro bgyid du mchi ba rnam par gzhag pa'i
100b3(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/
100b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkor bar
100b5(mdo sde): ngagra bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa'i rtsed mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
100b6(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam
100b7(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
101a1(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / brtsi ba dang / shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba/
101a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i dri mos 'tsham
101a3(mdo sde): dam bcas pa thob par bgyi ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
101a4(mdo sde): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gso la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/
101a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer
101a6(mdo sde): chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ bskyer mos tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med
101a7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shing ba dang /
101b1(mdo sde): tu byung ba gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan
101b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung bar mngon par phyogs te/ grong khyer chen po sar skya'i gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
101b3(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/
101b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' ngur smrig pa zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
101b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
101b6(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems pa'i gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan
101b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis dka' thub spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
102a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la/
102a2(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas la longs
102a3(mdo sde): spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
102a4(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byon gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/
102a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa/ rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs
102a6(mdo sde): la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
102a7(mdo sde): bdu da 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan
102b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'dral ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
102b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stos/
102b3(mdo sde): la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mos kyi 'a
102b4(mdo sde): lobaskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
102b5(mdo sde): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
102b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhugs kyi 'od dang / glog gi
102b7(mdo sde): 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor bu'i 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems
103a1(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i bka'
103a2(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
103a3(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs bzhirnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
103a4(mdo sde): de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la
103a5(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems
103a6(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i'i jig rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
103a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu
103b1(mdo sde): ji khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de nga//
103b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa
103b3(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po rnam pa
103b4(mdo sde): tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
103b5(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
103b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dug brgyad cu rtsa
103b7(mdo sde): bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom
104a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
104a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' grang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam
104a3(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir/
104a4(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'phrogs gnas kun tu la drug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
104a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i rgyal po srog ma med kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
104a6(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
104a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom
104b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na meng pa
104b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi ngas kun du 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
104b3(mdo sde): bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu
104b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag gi klu'i gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bar ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
104b5(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i/
104b6(mdo sde): gnas dag tu nam mkha' lding kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi spobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phying chus tu bkod pa de dag
104b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi dben kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
105a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thag
105a2(mdo sde): 'phen pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das
105a3(mdo sde): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che nor gyis 'jug kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan
105a4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo slu byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
105a5(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
105a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas slob tags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
105a7(mdo sde): dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shwakya gsod pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis
105b1(mdo sde): brlabyas kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chu sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol
105b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
105b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gis lus la las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stongs
105b4(mdo sde): la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
105b5(mdo sde): bgrod pa ni gcig pu ra bas te/ gnyis sam gsum ma mchis la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na yang / bgrod pa ni gcig pu rabs te/ gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis pa 'di ni
105b6(mdo sde): chos nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyo/ mongs pa can dag tu theg pa gsum rnam pa gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang
105b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni
106a1(mdo sde): 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'jig pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'jig
106a2(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin las 'jig pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa ma mchis pa shes pa des
106a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
106a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong pa ste lta bar gyur pa rnam par dag pa lags so//
106a5(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid
106a6(mdo sde): lags te/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid shes pa des chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lta bar gyur pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la
106a7(mdo sde): sbyor bar/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das chos thams
106b1(mdo sde): bang na slob tags pa ma mchis pa ste/ sgo btags pa'i rnam par dag pa lags so// de kyo'i slang du zhe na/ sprobatags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i sad du n+te//
106b2(mdo sde): btags pa'i rang bzhin las/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ sgro btags pa'i/
106b3(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad sgro btags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
106b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
106b5(mdo sde): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni las su bskob ma mchis pa ste/ las su bsko ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ las
106b6(mdo sde): su bsko ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin las/ las su bsko ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin nyid//
106b7(mdo sde): las su bsko ba ma mchis pa lags te/ las su bsko ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ las su bsko ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad las su bsko ba ma mchis pa lags na/
107a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis las su bsko ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
107a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad na blang ba dang / dor ba ma mchis pa ste/ blang ba dang dor ba rnam par
107a3(mdo sde): dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa gzhan
107a4(mdo sde): ma lags kyi blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos
107a5(mdo sde): thams cad byung ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis blang ba dang dorang rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa
107a6(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'deg pa dang /
107a7(mdo sde): 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'degs pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'deg pa dang 'jogs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i sla
107b1(mdo sde): 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa/
107b2(mdo sde): lags te/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom
107b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'deg pa dang / 'jogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
107b4(mdo sde): chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 'dus byas rnam par dag pa lags so//
107b5(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'o slad du ste/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin
107b6(mdo sde): nyid 'dus ma byas lags te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ 'dus ma byas shes pa des chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas
107b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
108a1(mdo sde): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos gzho ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du
108a2(mdo sde): zhen/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin nyid dngos gzhi
108a3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin gyis/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos gzhi rnam/
108a4(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba sra/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
108a5(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa ste/ gnas rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma
108a6(mdo sde): lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ gnas kyi rang bzhin nyid gnas ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis
108a7(mdo sde): gnas ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad gnas ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang
108b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni/
108b2(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las
108b3(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad
108b4(mdo sde): dngos po ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
108b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis rnam
108b6(mdo sde): par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ chos thams
108b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid/ gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnyis su ma mchis pa shes pa des/ thams cad gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na//
109a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
109a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid rnam par dag/
109a3(mdo sde): pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi//
109a4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ mtshan nyid mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags na/
109a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/
109a6(mdo sde): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ dmigs pa rnam par dag pa lags so//
109a7(mdo sde): ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin las/ dmigs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dmigs pa'i rang
109b1(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'a/
109b2(mdo sde): kyis dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom
109b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha' rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtha'i rang
109b4(mdo sde): bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu ma'i lam shes pa des//
109b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad dbu ma'i lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha'i rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag tan med pa
109b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus
109b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lus kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin las/ lus ma mchis pa nyid gzhan ma
110a1(mdo sde): lags kyi/ lus kyi rang bzhin nyid/ lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus kyi rang bzhin gyis lus ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad lus
110a2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par//
110a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'kho
110a4(mdo sde): ba rnam par dag pa lag so// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin las 'khor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags
110a5(mdo sde): kyi 'khor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags na/
110a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub su bkod pa
110a7(mdo sde): de dgabacom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du med pa rnam parang sa/
110b1(mdo sde): pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i srang du ste/ brjod rje med pa'i rang bzhin las/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa/
110b2(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags kyi/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ brjod du med pa ma mchis pa shes
110b3(mdo sde): pa des chos thams cad brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs la sbyor bas/
110b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams/
110b5(mdo sde): cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe nA/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma
110b6(mdo sde): lags pa'i slad du ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ kun
110b7(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa
111a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
111a2(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chags pa ma mchis/
111a3(mdo sde): pa lags te/ chags pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ chags pa'i rang bzhin las/ chags
111a4(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ chags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/
111a5(mdo sde): thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
111a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rtsom sems ma mchis pa lags
111a7(mdo sde): te/ rlom sems rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las/ rlom
111b1(mdo sde): sems ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rlom sems ma mchis pa//
111b2(mdo sde): shes pa des/ chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas//
111b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos
111b4(mdo sde): thams cad chos thams cad ni yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yod pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/
111b5(mdo sde): yod pa'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yod pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa'i rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma mchis pa shes pa des// /
111b6(mdo sde): chos thams cad yod pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med/
111b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa lags te/ ming
112a1(mdo sde): rnam par dab ljags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ ming gi rang bzhin las ming ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags
112a2(mdo sde): ming gi rang bzhin nyid/ ming ma mchis pa lags te/ ming gi rang bzhin gyis ming ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad ming ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ming
112a3(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a/
112a4(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags
112a5(mdo sde): pa'i slad du ste/ bdug gi rang bzhin las/ bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma lags kyi/ bdag gi rang bzhin cing bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag gi rang bzhin gyis/
112a6(mdo sde): bdag ma mchis pa shes pa nges/ chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/
112a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das chos thams
112b1(mdo sde): cad ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste ga rgyu
112b2(mdo sde): dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya
112b3(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i
112b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
112b5(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las
112b6(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slar du ste/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las 'dres pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags te//
112b7(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'dres pa ma mchis pa shes pa des thams cad 'dres pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
113a1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlab kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
113a2(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las
113a3(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ yi ge ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi// yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid/ yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis/ yi ge
113a4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yi ge ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa
113a5(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nga rgyal meng pa ma mchis pa lags/
113a6(mdo sde): te nga rgyal med pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ nga rgyal med pa'o rang bzhin las/ nga rgyal med pa ma
113a7(mdo sde): mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ ngargyal med pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa lags na/
113b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa /
113b2(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags te/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa
113b3(mdo sde): lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ yul bsam
113b4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis
113b5(mdo sde): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
113b6(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
113b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi sgor 'jug pa grang med pa dag la/ phan tshun gnyen por gyur pa
114a1(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i tshul dag gis 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la
114a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / bdagra
114a3(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ sems can rgya mtsho ji skyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i byang chub/
114a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhags pa'i bsam pa
114a5(mdo sde): thugs su chud de/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyen nas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcu/
114a6(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhabs gnyis kyi sathil nus/ 'od gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs
114a7(mdo sde): med pa snyed phyung ngo // de bzhin du zhabs kyi sor mo'i tshigs re re dang / de bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang / de bzhin du pus mo'i ljang gnyis dang / de bzhin du brla gnyis dang / de bzhin du sta zur dang / de
114b1(mdo sde): bzhin du rtsib logs gnyis dang / de bzhin du lte ba khung dang / de bzhin du zag pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung mgo gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du lag mthil gnyis
114b2(mdo sde): dang de bzhin du phyag sor gyi tshigs re re dang / de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / de bzhin mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du dbu'i sgra nyag ma re re dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad
114b3(mdo sde): bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re nas/ 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
114b4(mdo sde): grangs med pa sbed phyung ste/ shar phyogs su 'phros so// de la sa 'od zer gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
114b5(mdo sde): grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'od zer gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do//
114b6(mdo sde): shar phyogs ji ltar ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub
114b7(mdo sde): kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su yang 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag thams cad 'phros so// de las 'od zer
115a1(mdo sde): gcigagis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog d+ha'i klung rdza bcu'i byem snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag skyes zag khrig grangs med bsnyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
115a2(mdo sde): mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do// yang de'i tsho shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa/ 5/
115a3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag byeg khrag khrig grangs med
115a4(mdo sde): pa snyed lags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog ng+ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grang/
115a5(mdo sde): med pa snyed lhags na/ 'khor drang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho tsho shurtsa lnga'i rdul phrarab gyi rdul 'bum phrag byeb zag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta tsa smos/ 'khor
115a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs meng pa skyed lta ci ste/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye
115a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos// 'khor 'dzag /
115b1(mdo sde): gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lnga ci spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams ni shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta tsa spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lnga ci smos/
115b2(mdo sde): 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lnga ci smos/ 'khor pang+gA'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung rdzab
115b3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gad+hA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed lha
115b4(mdo sde): smos/ 'khor gad+hA'i klung bye ma'o bzhi cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i brgyad cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung go bye ma'i bcu drug cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma'i cha nyi shu snyed/
115b5(mdo sde): lnga ci spros/ 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lnga ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lnga ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag ci shurtsa lnga lnga ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lnga ci spos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta tse smos/ 'khor byang chubs /
115b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
115b7(mdo sde): re re kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'o sprin bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam
116a1(mdo sde): mkha' khyab par labanas/ bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste lpags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re kyang nor bu ri po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ye shes kyi choH/
116a2(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor ro// gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan grangs med par bskor ba
116a3(mdo sde): byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / chub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtsham su yang ded nga 'dra'o// lho nub kyi mtshams sul/
116a4(mdo sde): dedang 'dra'o// nu byang gi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// steng du yang de dang 'dra'o// 'og go phyogs su yang de dang 'dre ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od zer de dag
116a5(mdo sde): gos snang bar byas pa de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i byem snye kyi rdul 'bum phrag byeg khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lpags so// byang chub sems
116a6(mdo sde): dpa' re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchog d+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i byem stong kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag byeg khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyis 'khor bskor na/ 'khor
116a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi
116b1(mdo sde): khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul bsnyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi sted rtswaci spros// 'tsho/
116b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lnga'i spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul steng ltaci smos/ 'khor ga ng+gA'i klung gcig gi byem snyed kyi bar du lho ci spos/ 'khor bye grags
116b3(mdo sde): lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
116b4(mdo sde): chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags
116b5(mdo sde): pa med cing / sgrib pa med la/ ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lpags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin sa rgya mtsho
116b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
116b7(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs cha re rer 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchogad+hA'i klung rdza
117a1(mdo sde): bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'dum phrag byel khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re ro'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul re rel byang chub sems/
117a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag byeg khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang sems can su la yang gnod pa'am sgrib pa med do//
117a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / gangs chen po dang / khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po rnams dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho
117a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang / lha'i gnas rnams dang / klung dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong brdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang / gnod pa'am/ sgrib pa med do /
117a5(mdo sde): ji lta ba de bzhin du phyis kyang bya ba la 'jug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba rdzi lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du zhugs par mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
117a6(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu
117a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang /
117b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bdag gis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad/
117b2(mdo sde): pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam/ 'on te gzhan yang dag par mi 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam zhig gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
117b3(mdo sde): sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu babang po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen po rgya mtsho rje
117b4(mdo sde): 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga d+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bur phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed yod par gyur la/ nyan thos
