117b5(mdo sde): chen po de dag re res kyang / se gol gtogs pa re re la sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed bskyedade/
117b6(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po re res kyang / sems skyed pa re res gom pa 'dor ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga d+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed so
117b7(mdo sde): lan gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gad+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba zag khrog grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho da' bar byed de/
118a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gang du can thos chen po gcig 'gro bder gnyis mi 'gro bde lta chu'i tshul gyis/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga d+ha'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul/
118a2(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig phrag grangs med pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/ shar phyogs ji lnga ba de bzhin du lho dang / nung dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de
118a3(mdo sde): bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs song zhing / nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba der / gnyis mi 'grol/ de nas mi la la zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi
118a4(mdo sde): khams rgya mchod dag thams cad grob byer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs kun nas bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/
118a5(mdo sde): mas bkang ste/ byur bur byas la de nas mi des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas/ bye ma 'brur re nas blang la/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod pade snyed kyi char bsres te/ brtsi ba'i thabs 'das bye ma'i 'bru
118a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad char bsres la/ de nas mau dbye ma'i 'bru cha rab sres pa de dag thams cad shar phyogs su khyer te/ rtse ma'i 'bru cha rab sres pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
118a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho 'das shing bye ma'i 'bru ma rab ses pa gcig bor te/ brtsi bo'i thabs 'odas bye ma'i 'bru char rab sres pa de dag thams cad bor te/ shar phyogs su rdzi lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de ni
118b1(mdo sde): du byung dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho rud kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byung gi mtshams dang / de bzhon du byang shar gyi mtshams su bor la/ de nas mings 'jig
118b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char bsres pa de dag bor ba dang / gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs
118b3(mdo sde): kun nas bkor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni
118b4(mdo sde): rgya ma grong khyer de las/ bye ma'i 'bru gcig tsam du bang ngo // nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni/ grong khyer do'i nang go bye ma lhag ma ji snyed pa tsam mo// de'i lhag ma'i bye ba snyed kyi/ byang chub sems
118b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang ming 'thun la/ rus gcig pa sha stag yin na/ ming tha dad pa dang / rus tha dad pa lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /
118b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa la bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa du mar sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon
118b7(mdo sde): mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i
119a1(mdo sde): 'khor de dag 'di snyams du sems te/ bdab cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nang nas/ kha cig gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur ba mthong ba na ci ma rung
119a2(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor de'i nang du bsdu ba dang / de dag gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur nga bstan pa'i phyir/ se gol gyi
119a3(mdo sde): sgra mdzad do// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshod dgag 'dab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga
119a4(mdo sde): pade dag gi ches pha rol 'jog rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i rtsed ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'dzum phrag byeg khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams 'bul/ rab tu
119a5(mdo sde): 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo// rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo// ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu che mchem/ kun tu rab tu chemachem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu
119a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'jug/ 'ur 'ur rab tu'u ra 'ur/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'o 'jig rten gyi khams re ren/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs ma
119a7(mdo sde): lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho// byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho// lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dmapa// byang shar mtshams/
119b1(mdo sde): kyi phyogs mtho// shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho// nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma'am/ shar rdzo mtshams kyi phyogs mtho// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho// dbus dma'
119b2(mdo sde): na mtha' mtho ste/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// nung phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// byang phyog kyang deng 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams nub byang gi mtshams dang /
119b3(mdo sde): shar gyi mtshams kyang de dang 'dra'o// steng dang 'og gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi
119b4(mdo sde): khams rgya mtshod dag gi 'dab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho ga d+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag byed
119b5(mdo sde): khrag zig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gul/ ra tu 'gug/ kun 'a tu 'gug g.yo// rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che mchem/ rab tu chemachem/ kun tu rang
119b6(mdo sde): tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang / shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho
119b7(mdo sde): nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho// lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho// byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho// lho nub
120a1(mdo sde): mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ bung shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho// shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ nu byung mtshams kyi phyogs mgo// nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs ngam 'am/
120a2(mdo sde): shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun nas phyog
120a3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ba snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams brgya re re nas/ rdul phra rab
120a4(mdo sde): kyi rdul riri la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bang+gA'i lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba zag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi stegs bu rin
120a5(mdo sde): po ches spras pas ni bskor/ rin po che'i tshe tsong gis ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan ni bsgreng / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla res ni bris/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni thugs/ nor
120a6(mdo sde): rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas ni bkab/ rin po che 'thom pa chen po ni mig mangs ris su bris/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i phyogs re re ga nas kyang mu tig rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog dum dang ldan pa/
120a7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang /
120b1(mdo sde): ngo dar gyi lnga ldi kho dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // ras kyi rdza lnga kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog dum dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag
120b2(mdo sde): thig dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar gyi chun kos ba dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba zag khrig grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag 'phyang dril bu g.yer ka'i drab pa dog snga
120b3(mdo sde): tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum zag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng de dag la/ rlung gis phogs na yang lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag
120b4(mdo sde): 'byung ste/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ sil snyan gyi yan lag depe med pa 'bum phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dpon gyis brdungs pa las
120b5(mdo sde): kyang / de lta bu'i sgra snyan pa mi 'byung ngo // dril bu g.yer ka'i 'phreng ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha yul pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ gser gyi snod 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam brdung ba las kyang de
120b6(mdo sde): lnga bu'i sgra zab cing yid 'ong ba mi 'byung ngo // mig mangs ris re re la yang rin po rmam shing ljon pa re re yod de/ rin po che'i sngags bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang / mu ti ga dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes par bya
120b7(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyan mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas ni brgyan dpag tu me grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// ras kyi lnga ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa/
121a1(mdo sde): dang me tog gi lda ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// rin po che'i shing ljon pa/
121a2(mdo sde): re re'i drung na yang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri 'phang dpag tshad lnga brgya pa yod de/ rin po che'i stegs dus ni bskor/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs
121a3(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bla res ni bres/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni thugs/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha dang / man 'dzug
121a4(mdo sde): ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / sna ma dang / bar shi ka dang / ta ru ni dang / bal la dang / go ta ra ni dang / rab tu dri zhim pa dang / da ni ska'i dang /
121a5(mdo sde): lha'i sna ma dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu drA dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams ni bkram nor bu rin po che chen po glog gi sgron ma'i rgyan phreng gi brgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa
121a6(mdo sde): dang / nor bu rin po che nyi zla'i sgron ma'i rgyan phreng gyi rgyan dpag tu med dgrangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med pa dang / nor bu rin pos
121a7(mdo sde): dbang gi rgyal mo'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che ze ba can gyi rkyen 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba can gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan
121b1(mdo sde): rang nor bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan 'greng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che lnga thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyun 'phreng gi rgyan/
121b2(mdo sde): dang nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che pad+ma ral gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dag gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che
121b3(mdo sde): DUR+Ya'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che an sngal gyi rgya phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che rdo'o snying po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che dpal gyi/
121b4(mdo sde): snying po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig dkar po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig mthon
121b5(mdo sde): ka'i rgyun phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig ser po'i rkyen phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig dmar po'i rgyan phreng gi gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gser mdog gi rgyan 'phreng gi/
121b6(mdo sde): rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig nam mkha' 'dog gi rgyan phreng gyi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos re re dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad
121b7(mdo sde): cig re re la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dag byung ngo // de la 'od zer rgya
122a1(mdo sde): mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag 'byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sbom pa cig las ni/
122a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad
122a3(mdo sde): parabastan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig
122a4(mdo sde): las ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sdom kha cig las ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par
122a5(mdo sde): bstan pa brjod pa dag zung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i smon bcig las ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dpa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer
122a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i sprin khacig las ni mngon par shes pa pa dang ba rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i gyur par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin kha cig las ni sprin lam tha dang sa
122a7(mdo sde): grangs med ba'i khyad par bstan brjod pa gzung ngo // 'od bar rgya rtso'i sbom la ga las ni/ ba rtson 'grus rtsomapa pa dang po'i rgyamatsho grangs med pa'i khyad par gyu
122b1(mdo sde): rjod par gabyung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtshor sbon kha cig las ni/ dbugs 'byin pa thob pa tha ngapa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtshor/
122b2(mdo sde): sprin kha cig las ni byang chub sems la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni de bzhin gshegs pa
122b3(mdo sde): la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa/
122b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad
122b5(mdo sde): par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bskal pa la 'jug pa la tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa dag byung ngo // yang de'i
122b6(mdo sde): tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab tu ldeg
122b7(mdo sde): kun tu ra ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu che mchem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ura'u ra/
123a1(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor dag las 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'
123a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gad+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
123a3(mdo sde): rere'i 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lpags
123a4(mdo sde): so byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin zungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med
123a5(mdo sde): cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags na/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sgo/
123a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjod pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs
123a7(mdo sde): pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
123b1(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge'i khril 'khod do// shar phyogs ji ltang de bzhin lho dang / nung/
123b2(mdo sde): dang byang dang shar lho'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtsham dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
123b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag kyang 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem cheg
123b4(mdo sde): rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem che ma 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de
123b5(mdo sde): dag re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshog 'jig rten gyi kham sa gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lpags
123b6(mdo sde): so// byang chub sems dpa'i re re'i 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsha/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtsa mchogad+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag rtse
123b7(mdo sde): gakhrag khrig grangs med pa steng lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin rnams pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po
124a1(mdo sde): bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa mengal/ ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ byang
124a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin so sor yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtso
124a3(mdo sde): cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan
124a4(mdo sde): grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang /
124a5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung po re re nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gad+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed/
124a6(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi de bas rmes mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de dag thams cad kyang lus 'dzam bu chu bo'o gser gyi
124a7(mdo sde): mdog can gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag bye ba khrig grangs med pa bas lhags pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par rtse ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog yongs su grub mtha' yas
124b1(mdo sde): pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba/
124b2(mdo sde): pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa sha stag go// pad+ma re re yang rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa sdong bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i za ba can gser gyi 'dab ma bkod pa shin tu
124b3(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i gzugs can 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis// phyogs thams cad kyi sprin snang bar byed pa/ kun nas 'od zer bkod pa/
124b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas pa'i gsung rjod pa'i 'od zer/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rab tu 'gyed pas mdzes par byas shing / gdugs dang / rgyal
124b5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba sha stag go de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'od zer rgya mtsho 'bum phrag bye ba zag khrig grangs med pa btang nasapadra de
124b6(mdo sde): dag las babs te/ lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin dang / me tog gyi sprin dang / spos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i sprin dang / rol mo'i sgrab
124b7(mdo sde): sprin dang / rgyan gyi sprin dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sprin dang / lha'o sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sngon chags pa med cing sgrib pa med lam 'dres pa/ s+ho/
125a1(mdo sde): gsum tu sto mo 'i tshas ma gyis// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sa to song mngon par gtor la/ mngon pa tu gtor to// gtor tshang mngon par gtor la/ ma
125a2(mdo sde): rab tu gtor nas/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan grangs med par bskor bzlas te/ rang ra gi badz+ra'i stan la 'kho // byang chus
125a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chu'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis blan mang
125a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa sha stag go de nas 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi
125a5(mdo sde): khams rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bdag cag gis mthong tsam ru snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sems kyi yongs su rtog pa rdugs
125a6(mdo sde): kyis mkhyen nas/ gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer grangs med pa dag zung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jigs/
125a7(mdo sde): gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang bstan te/ sems can
125b1(mdo sde): gyi khams mtha' yas pa/ yongs su smin par byas nas yang phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ lan grangs med par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chu/
125b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gi lus la sogs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dag gi lus la 'od zer des phog ma thag tu yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis som ldan 'das kyi
125b3(mdo sde): mdzod spu dang / gtsug tor dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gad+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs mang ba
125b4(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag nams 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig pa dag
125b5(mdo sde): mthong ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pa'i rtse mor thugs
125b6(mdo sde): par rabs bskor te/ rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang drug tu mes 'jig pa dang /
125b7(mdo sde): chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig par mthong ba de dag ni ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta bur blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag las/ 'dzag
126a1(mdo sde): chen gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas pa na/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul lhag ma ji snyed yod pa tsam du blta bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ninor bu rin po che/
126a2(mdo sde): skar 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che
126a3(mdo sde): zla'i sgron ma las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor
126a4(mdo sde): bu rin chen dbang gi rgyal po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che ze ba can las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/
126a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rdo rje rtse mo las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la
126a6(mdo sde): la ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'o las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi
126a7(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams
126b1(mdo sde): rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che chu 'dag las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshul la ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams
126b2(mdo sde): mtshol la nI/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che a nad sti las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams
126b3(mdo sde): mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams
126b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la la ni// nor bu rin po ched dpal gyi snying po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams
126b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig dkar po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu tig gser mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ mu ti ga nam
126b6(mdo sde): mkha' mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig
126b7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la no// nor bu rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshoral la ni/ nor bu rin po che pha rol tu phyin
127a1(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po ches rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod/
127a2(mdo sde): pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin
127a3(mdo sde): po che rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che so so yang dag par rigs pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par
127a4(mdo sde): bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rte
127a5(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan parjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom
127a6(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad pa rabastan pa rjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbugs byin thob pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa
127a7(mdo sde): las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa brgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi kham
127b1(mdo sde): rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa brgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po
127b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che 'jig rten gyi kham
127b3(mdo sde): la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad
127b4(mdo sde): par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo re re la zhing bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed du sna tshogs
127b5(mdo sde): su gnas pa dag snang ngo // zhing re re na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag snang bar gyur te/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi kha dog du gnas pa dag snang ngo // sangs rgyas
127b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis byang chub tu sems skyed du gtsug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob tu
127b7(mdo sde): gtsug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'o spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug pa'i
128a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa phyi ma'i mthar thugs pa'i bar du bstan kyang /
128a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gcig na sa gcig tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstan par mi nus so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snang
128a3(mdo sde): ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs
128a4(mdo sde): par byang chub pa yang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs/
128a5(mdo sde): bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
128a6(mdo sde): gyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag kyang snang zhing thos so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs
128a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du bstan kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro//
128b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sku dang ye shes chags pa med pa brnyes pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos
128b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos par byed cing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'don tu 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / gdugs pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa
128b3(mdo sde): dang / rtse ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa de dag gi bsod nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/
128b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten
128b5(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho gad+hA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum zag bye ba khrag khrog grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi / de bas
128b6(mdo sde): ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba/ bskal pa dpag tu meng grangs med pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos
128b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpas tha na dud 'gro'o skye nas su gyur pa la zan chang gcig tsam yongs su btang bas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las
129a1(mdo sde): byung ba de zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tsha bcwo lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mtho ba dang mtshungs pa
129a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
129a3(mdo sde): 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mtho ba dang mtshungs pa med pa dang / ches byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba rnams zil
129a4(mdo sde): gyis gnon te/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams
129a5(mdo sde): cad dbyug pas bsnun nam/ mtshon gyis btab ste/ bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / thab
129a6(mdo sde): dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ bsdus pa'i sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'
129a7(mdo sde): la gnod sems dang / zab dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongs su
129b1(mdo sde): bzungs par 'gyur ro// chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung gcod par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas rnams mthung na/ rgyab chen bzhi'i wa'i ris rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
129b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'tha' bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar mi
129b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// zla ba dang / nyi ma thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stobs
129b4(mdo sde): kyis 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las
129b5(mdo sde): 'byung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
129b6(mdo sde): rnams la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur gyi byas na/ sangs
129b7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la/ lha'i zhal zasan
130a1(mdo sde): brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' phul te/ sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho ga d+ha'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du phul la/ byang chub sems
130a2(mdo sde): dpa' gzhan zhig gi sa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdug pa las dmigs pa 'am/ mar me las dmigs 'am/ me/
130a3(mdo sde): tog las dmigs pa'am/ spos las dmigs pa'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig las dmigs te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par gsod nams
130a4(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro// snga ma des ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa
130a5(mdo sde): 'di rgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong go char yang mi pod/ 'bum gyi cher yang mi po da/ bye ba'i char yang mi 'od/ bye ba rgya'i char yang mo phod/ bye ba stong go char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'bum gyi char yang mi
130a6(mdo sde): phod de/ dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhog ni stong
130a7(mdo sde): mthing la mos par gyur na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par gsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan mos pa skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni debs bsod nams ches
130b1(mdo sde): zangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong ga cher yang mi phod/ 'bum gyi char yang ma pos
130b2(mdo sde): rtse ba'i char yang mi phod/ bye ba brgya chir yang mi phod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi phod/ bye ba 'dum gyi char yang mi phong / de pe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las cung chu
130b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' than yang ngam/ khros te tha na byang chub sems dpa' glang po cher skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig bcar la 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ga sa
130b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten/
130b5(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan bcad de/ khros nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos med par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas na/ mi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i mi dge ba
130b6(mdo sde): de'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
130b7(mdo sde): bsnyen me de dag dang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
131a1(mdo sde): dang ta 'jig rten stong ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / phyogs tha dad pa nas lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med/ tshang med pa rnams yi 'angs
131a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mdo'i rgyal po chen po sprin chen po'o le'u re re la/ chos snang ba'o sgo stong phrag gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed yang dag par 'dub
131a3(mdo sde): snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal gyi glog gis gsal bar byas pa'i le'u chen po'i tshogs mtha' yas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs med pa
131a4(mdo sde): dang thun pacu 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthulas drung ngas dang byed dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chung sems dpa rgya mtsha 'dus pa'i dga' gon chen pol che bzhes bya mi mthu sa sum
131a5(mdo sde): pa rdzogs so// / rgya bar gyi mkhan po su ren tra ba d+hi dang / thu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bus te gtan la pab pa/
131a6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yas pa lo ka ni nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
131a7(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ga dbadag gis thos pa dus gcog na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khang na/ bya rgod daphung po'i rol/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems
131b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnams par dag pa la bka' stsal/
131b2(mdo sde): par blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su das pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// rngo zos rnam par dag pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang / bzod pa
131b3(mdo sde): su dag pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su sa
131b4(mdo sde): go blo gros rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ dga' nga yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su
131b5(mdo sde): dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/
131b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag po/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ stobs yongs su ngas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/
131b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
132a1(mdo sde): go/ blo zos rnam par dag pa/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
132a2(mdo sde): bdan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum la/ theg pa gang yang
132a3(mdo sde): rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thugs pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mtha' yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar
132a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
132a5(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med do// dpag tu med do// grangs med do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar
132a6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig/
132a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring po srel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang /
132b1(mdo sde): yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsting spang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa
132b2(mdo sde): dang mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur
132b3(mdo sde): dang te rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas
132b4(mdo sde): kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstanapa
132b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
132b6(mdo sde): su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rje
132b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rogs mtho zhing rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de/
133a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par ra 'gyur pa ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems
133a2(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldam 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcas pa 'di
133a3(mdo sde): dag bka' stsal to// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// su zhig bskor ba byed pa ni// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad
133a4(mdo sde): du byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// bsod nams ldan zhing 'jigs med 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/ lha dang
133a5(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams kyi sa mchod par 'gyur// ngas ni gang dag bstan pa yin// mi kho ma brgyad po de dag spong // sangs rgyas 'byung ba rang mdzes pa// mnyes par byed 'di
133a6(mdo sde): dal ba gcig/ mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang / mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// le lo can du de ma 'gyur// de ni phyug cing nor
133a7(mdo sde): cher 'gyur// bsod nams ldan zhing brdzi ba med// 'jig rten sgron ma mnyes byas nas/ yang dang yang du bsti stang byed// bdag med stong pa'i chos thos na// de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur
133b1(mdo sde): myur du dad pa thob 'gyur zhing // chos don ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur// tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang // phyug po rnams su skye bar gyur// dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gtong ba btang zhing /
133b2(mdo sde): sor sna mar// 'dzam bu'i gling na gang yang rung // khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa// der ni brtan pa de skye ste// dma' ba dag ni rnam par spangs// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// skye ba thams
133b3(mdo sde): cad kun tu yang // dbang cher grangs pa'i khyim bdag dang // dpal dang gzi brjid gzi ldan 'gyur// bram ze sA la tshe 'dra dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing mang thos dang // rgyal rigs sA la
133b4(mdo sde): chen 'dra dang // phyug cing nor chen ldan par 'gyur// ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi// sa kun la ni gang smon pa// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug bla// rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur/
133b5(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che// rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la// yang dang yang du bsti stang byed// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su//
133b6(mdo sde): song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang // lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug po// lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur// lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang // de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang // lha dbang
133b7(mdo sde): shin tu 'phrul pa dang // dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing // lha rnams bye bas mchod par
134a1(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mi gang bskor ba byed pa yi// bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang // brjod pas zad par bya mi nus// su zhig byang chub
134a2(mdo sde): sems bskyed nas// ston pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba// de ni bskal pa bye bar yang// nams kyang long zhing 'ther mi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mngon du bskor ba byed pa ni//
134a3(mdo sde): bung ba sngon po mdzes 'dra yi// rnam par dag pa'i mig thob 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// de ni nges par rtag tu yang // 'thun pa'i don kun thos 'gyur zhing // don min rnams na
134a4(mdo sde): spangs par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni le lo med 'gyur zhing // rtag tu bag yod ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// brtson
134a5(mdo sde): 'grus brten zhing mthu brtan la// brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang // de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis de// nams kyang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur// mkhas pa tshe ni
134a6(mdo sde): rdzogs rdzogs su// zad par byas nas 'chi dus byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor dang // grong brdal rnams su longs spyod ngab// gzugs kyi khyad par
134a7(mdo sde): 'phags par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// de ni 'dod pa mi bsten cing // lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing // gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// blo gros rnam
134b1(mdo sde): par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dang pa bskyed de// pus mo gnyis ka'i ldangs la btsu/
134b2(mdo sde): nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de// de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de khri 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig
134b3(mdo sde): ces de la mos pa bskyed na// blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro//
134b4(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas kyang zad par
134b5(mdo sde): bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag parigs kyi bu des bsod rnams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro// blo gros rnam par dag
134b6(mdo sde): pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du
134b7(mdo sde): 'jug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can lha 'am/
135a1(mdo sde): klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ lto phyed chen po'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sem/
135a2(mdo sde): can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing ngam/ ri'am/ khung bu 'am/ bu ga 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang /
135a3(mdo sde): kun tu 'dud myi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba tham cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong brda
135a4(mdo sde): lam yul 'khor ram/ pho zang 'khor na rgyu ba la/ sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
135a5(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jug rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis 'dzugs dang /
135a6(mdo sde): zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba// de 'gro chen 'jig rten gsum po 'dud pa byed// mi rnams gtso bo rang 'byung gang du 'gro byed pa// de logs su ni rtswa dang shing
135a7(mdo sde): dang sdong lcug dang // sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu 'dab ma dang // yid 'ong dri ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur// bcom ldan dadas mchod rten rnams la pus mo tsugs
135b1(mdo sde): pa ni/ de la mi yi dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lnga yi rgyal po dang // tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gtugs par byed// bcom ldan mchod na/
135b2(mdo sde): rnams la pus btsugs phyag byas na/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go char 'gyur// mthu chen bla mar bya zhing
135b3(mdo sde): thub par dka' bar 'gyur// de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyur pa// de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur// de la sems can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed de/ skye
135b4(mdo sde): tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// de la sems can kun gyi rgyal po bu 'dud// lha dang klu dang mi dang lto'i phye chen po 'du ba//
135b5(mdo sde): bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
135b6(mdo sde): rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba thob/ 'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni/ bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs
135b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grangs zad 'gyur na// de ni ring por mi thogs byang chub mtshungs med thob// gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong la// bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas dasdi
136a1(mdo sde): snang byed pa bas/ gang zhig phyi rus mi bzad bskal 'dil ni// mchod can phyag 'tshal de yi bsod nams ches mngo // sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs/
136a2(mdo sde): pa med gyur pa// spyod pa dam pa spyad nas khyad par brnyes gyur pa// mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na// rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur// byang chub tu ni
136a3(mdo sde): sems bsngo ste// me tog 'phreng ba byas nas su// mchod rten dag la su 'bul pa// de ni nams kyang phongs mi 'gyur// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur// der ni
136a4(mdo sde): rin chen sna tshogs kyi// gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'dir phul na// khang bzangs dag dang khang brtsegs pa// lha yi bu mos bsten pa rnams// sum cu gsum du spyod/
136a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing // gser gyi byas 'dal gyur la// bai DUR+Ya dang shel dag gi/ lha yi rdzing bu thob par 'gyur// der ni lha yi dga' spyad nas// mkhas pa tsho tshad rdzogs par/
136a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas// mi nang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i sa de nyid kyis// mkhas pa bag yod gyur nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te// rkang
136a7(mdo sde): gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs zhing // zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrog mi 'gyur// de ni nams kyang rmongs mi 'gyur// rkang
136b1(mdo sde): gnyis mchog la mchod byas na// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// chags pa med cing zhe sdang med// bkram pa med cing dbang po bsdams// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bral byed pa// tshe rabs rtse/
136b2(mdo sde): ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa// kun tu bkur stir byas par 'gyur// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug
136b3(mdo sde): 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na// lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi// don rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur//
136b4(mdo sde): dma' ba'i rigs ni rnam spangs te// der ni de skyed 'gyur ma yin// phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug de 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na// gzugs
136b5(mdo sde): dang don dang longs spyod dang // kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang // kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa
136b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi skyon shes shing // tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na// gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang // ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing //
136b7(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las ni byed mi 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa mchod byed na// de ni spos dang me tog gis// nams kyang 'phongs par mi 'gyur zhing // dran ldan shes rab ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin
137a1(mdo sde): gshegs la su mchod pa// de yi nor gyi phung po la// rgyal po dang ni chom kun dang // me dang chus kyang reg mi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la/ dang
137a2(mdo sde): gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba// de ni skam dang mya ngan dang / nang bu can du gzhar mi 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa// tshe rabs ngag ni thams cad du// mya ngan med cing gnod med dang //
137a3(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba 'byor chen 'gyur// 'dren la mchod pa byas na ni// rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing // yan lag rnam par dag 'gyur la// gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur// sdig
137a4(mdo sde): pa'i las ni rnam spangs te// byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed// gang dag 'jig rten rab dkon pa// rkang gnyis mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig
137a5(mdo sde): dag ni brgya bzangs par// mchod cing bde la shes rab ldan// byang chub dam pa 'tshang yang rtsa// 'jig rten mgon lo skyong pa la// 'phreng ba'i khang pazlas na mi// de ni g.yog 'khor ma gyi cing/
137a6(mdo sde): rgyal po 'byor pa chen por 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams kyis gang spangs pa// sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi// dge ba'i las la bsten par byed//
137a7(mdo sde): 'on te klu rnams sam// 'jig rten dag na gang mkhas pa// de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang // bsti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur// brten pa de ni gar skyes par// bsod nams gzi brjid shin tu
137b1(mdo sde): brjid// yul 'khor dag dang zong khyer dag/ rigs der ba sti stang byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang gnyis mchog la su mchod pa// de dag mthu stobs che ba dang /
137b2(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur// byang chub tu ni sems bsngos te// 'phreng ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang sngags pa'i// 'byor pa dag ni de thob bo//
137b3(mdo sde): de ni 'greng dang zhar ba dang // smad dang ma rungs mi 'gyur gnas// gang dang gang du skyes par yang // mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par 'gyur// sems can dbul po rnams mthong na//
137b4(mdo sde): ni nor gyis sdud par byed// de ni nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni byang chub spyod pa spyod// blo gros chen pos sa 'di kun// yongs su btang ba byas nas kyang // dman pa'i sems su
137b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhing // de ni nams kyang 'phongs mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa// de dag bu dang bu mo dang // chung ma dge zhing bzang mo dag/ gtang nas mya ngan byed mi 'gyur//
137b6(mdo sde): de ni sngon du 'gro 'gyur zhing // bkri ba med la mthong na dga'/ phrag dog dang ni nga rgyal gyis// nams kyang de la gnod mi 'gyur// gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa// de dag phrag
137b7(mdo sde): dog med cing des// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// phran pa 'dod cing yon tan ldan// gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa// 'jig rten kun na de rin chen// de dga' byung
138a1(mdo sde): pa shin tu dkon// sma pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur// sa 'di dag no ma gyis sa// bzang bar ba ny-ing dpag par nus// dI sna rnams kyi yon tan ma'/
138a2(mdo sde): gis bstan par mi nus so// sems can dag ni thams cad g-i// dus gsum sems ni shes par nus// de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'// tshig gis bstan par mi nus so//
138a3(mdo sde): mtsho chen po bzhi po dag/ sgra ni bye ba stong gshags pa'i// sgra yis zad par bya bar nus// de dag yon tan zad mi nus las rnams thams cad phyir rlags pa// rab tu pha rdul shes par
138a4(mdo sde): nus/ sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus// chu klung thams cad rab 'bab pa// rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro yang srid// sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi// yon
138a5(mdo sde): tan mtha' brjod de lha min// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// sngon gyi lus rnams ji snyed pa// bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dug yon tan zad mi 'gyur// sngon gyi lus rnas
138a6(mdo sde): thams cad la// spu 'phreng ji snyed yod pa rnams// bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur// 'gro ba lnga por 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi spu rnams ni/
138a7(mdo sde): bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur// sa 'ad ji snyed thams cad pa// chu yi phung por gnas gyur kyang // de ni bgrangs zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon tan
138b1(mdo sde): brjod mi nus// mar me mdzad nas bzung nas ni// ma 'ongs bskal pa ji snyed pa// de yi bar du shing ljon rnams// ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams// de dgazang /
138b2(mdo sde): par shes par nus// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// brtson pa zhig gis de dag gi/ bsngags 'phreng yid du 'ong brjod kyang // sangs rgyas sras po de dag
138b3(mdo sde): gi yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus// sangs rgyas sras po de dag la// mi gang mi dga' byed pa de// lha dang mi ni spangs nas su// de dag dmyal ba spyod yul 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
138b4(mdo sde): la ni/ tami gang la la gnod byed pa// mig med pa'am long ba dang // sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar mar 'gro// de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs skrag 'gyur// lus
138b5(mdo sde): ni chen por gyur nas kyang // sdug bsngal tsho ba myong bar 'gyur// tshe rabs de dang de dag tu// de lus dpag tshad tsam 'gyur te// de dag phrum ltar sbru ma gyur la// kun nas yongs su b.ra' bar 'gyur//
138b6(mdo sde): de tshe lus la mgo bo ni// lnga stong yod par 'gyur 'gyur zhig// mgo bo de dag re re las 'ang // lce ni lnga rgya zam pa yod// gcig la'ang thong shol brgya dag gis// lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i
138b7(mdo sde): las ni rnam smin gyis// mi bzad chen por gshegs par 'gyur// mnar med de nas shi 'phos nas// de ni tsha dang rab tsha bar// blo gros ngan pa tshor ba myong // de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin// byang chub
139a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// de la dud 'gro'o skye gnas dang // dmyal ba'i san dkon ma yin// tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag
139a2(mdo sde): khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // des ni bzang po rnams mi mthong // sangs rgyas sras po skyob rnams la// gnod pa dag ni byas 'gyur na// a la gartan 'jig
139a3(mdo sde): pa yi// shin tu gdug pa'i sbrul du skye// de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen// sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa 'gyur// de ni zas kyang mi rnyed de// nams kyang 'brangs par za mi myong // shi 'phos gshin/
139a4(mdo sde): rje'i 'jig rten du// de ni rtag par ga tun du rdung // dge slong dag la gnod byas pas// nams kyang skabs ni rnyed mo 'gyur// de nas shi'i phos dus byas te/ mi yi lus ni tho 'gyur na//
139a5(mdo sde): blo ngan de ni dmus longs 'gyur// gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa med// de ni nyes par smras byas te// 'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// ngan
139a6(mdo sde): song dag tu myur du 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu// nams kyang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur// rdzogs
139a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sra sa rnams la// gang zhig chos bzhin bsrung byed pa// des ni ngan 'gro kun spangs te// myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang /
139b1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan// bde zhing ngo tsha khrel ltas ldan// gang du 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ sangs rgyas mchod rten
139b2(mdo sde): mthong nas ni// yang dang yang dubasti stang byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi// 'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni// su zhig phyi phyir dang mi
139b3(mdo sde): byed/ gang gis sangs rgyas stong rnams dang // brgya dang bye ba bgrangs dag la// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// de snyed bskal par bkur ba bas// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi//
139b4(mdo sde): dam chos 'jig tshe gang zhig gis// nyin dang mtshan du 'dzin byed pa// de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags// chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
139b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa// ngal des ni mchod pa byas// dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// de ni
139b6(mdo sde): nams kyang rgud mi 'gyur// lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni nad kyis btab mi 'gyur// de ni yid du mi 'ong bas// nams kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro// ston pa'i bstan
139b7(mdo sde): pa bsrung byas na// bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // des dang gsal dang gnyen pa dang // sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung
140a1(mdo sde): bas/ bde dang dga' thob mdzod ni mang por 'gyur// sngon gyi rim gro bya ba thob 'gyur zhing // mi khom brgyad po ma lus zad par spong // 'jig tshe rgyal ba
140a2(mdo sde): mchog gi chos bzungs pas// dper na nam mkha' skar mas yongs gang ltar// rtag tu mtshan gyis go char byas pa dang // rab tu tshig stan yid 'ongs dbyangs ldan 'gyur// 'jig tshe rgyal
140a3(mdo sde): ba mchog gi chos bzungs pas// gang na yid bde med cing rab sdug pa// rigs dman de ni de yis spangs par 'gyur// phyug cing shin tu bde la longs spyod ldan// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog
140a4(mdo sde): gi chos bzungs pas// mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// mi dman sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// sangs rgyas rgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog
140a5(mdo sde): gi chos bzungs pas// mchog tu rab mdzes gzungs ldan shes rab ldan// mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur// rgyal po mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags//
140a6(mdo sde): 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// chog tu gzungs mdzes blda na sdug pa dang // skyed pa bud med lnga rnams dga' ba dang // bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan// ston/
140a7(mdo sde): pa stobs bcu mnga' ba lha yi lhas// gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshar pa// mo de'i lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshen thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs
140b1(mdo sde): byed pa// ras 'dri rtsigs ngos 'dri'am gser las byas// de yi chos kyi khyad par gang yin pa// de dag ma lus rab tu stan gyis nyon// de ni bsta min long bar gzhan mim 'gyur// sgur po
140b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur yan lag mi lcug min// de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha dog ldan// sum cu rtsa gnas mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// lus na rnam par dag cing khyad par thog stobs pa thob cing sgra
140b3(mdo sde): stasnyan yang du'ong // shes bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso// de mthong sems can bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur// sdig byer mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan// g.yo med mi rku rgyal po
140b4(mdo sde): 'khrug mi byed// mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grags par 'gyur// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs sku rab mdzes byas na// de ni mchog 'gyur skye ngo mang
140b5(mdo sde): mchod 'os// blo ldan phyug cing tshe nying rgya cher ldan// dbang ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'dren po'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa// lhun
140b6(mdo sde): popo'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur// bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal sring ston// de ni dran dang blo gros mi ldan min// de ni rtogs mos shes rab tshar bar 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na dbugs byon
140b7(mdo sde): thob 'gyur te// 'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs// sems can snying po mtshungs med mchod byas nas// dud 'gro'o skyes gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro// ngan 'gro gsum
141a1(mdo sde): po des ni rnams spang te// bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas nas// dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te// mi dman
141a2(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan la dad par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur// yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos ngad can//
141a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gser 'od byed dga' 'gyur ba'o// gzhal med khang mchog blta sdug thob par 'gyur// de ni ded dpon stobs bcu ldan pa po// sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra med pa thog
141a4(mdo sde): kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal// gser steng rin chen bai DUR+Ya dang mtshungs// su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog blangs// dad skyes 'jig rten mgon la char du gtor// de ni mi
141a5(mdo sde): yi 'jig rten bsod nams ldan// rgyal srid gnas nas rgyal ba mchog bskur 'gyur// mya ngan skam shing tha ba drir ldan lus// yan lag legs gnas mtshungs med thob par 'gyur// skye bo
141a6(mdo sde): mang pos blta ba'i 'os yin te// dmyal ba dgra rtsa 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur// spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe 'dod pa la// ngan skyubs khung ltar smad par shes par 'gyur// tshungs spyod dge ba khyad par
141a7(mdo sde): 'phags la spyod// dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod par 'gyur// bskal pa mtha' yas mang du de kha nas// rab mdzes ut+pal bsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing/
141b1(mdo sde): can danas ngur sri ni mngan kyang byung // spang ba rnam par spyod tshe khrob dang // thab ni skyon gti mug gnod pa byed// dman pa med pa'i sems kyis dbugs phyin ched/ khag yong na yi ran tu mang/
141b2(mdo sde): thob/ gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na// de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin// mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchog brgyal ba
141b3(mdo sde): mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe// rab tu dga' bas ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin// des ni chos mchog mdzes pa de spyang pas// gnod pas 'chis pa'i dus byed gapar mi 'gyur// gal te
141b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing // nyon mongs med pa gser mdog stobs bcur gyur// de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du// rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus//
141b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las spangs te// dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gi las byas shing // rlabs chen spyod tshe don ni legs byas nas// 'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// gang
141b6(mdo sde): gis spos chu yungs 'bru tsam blangs te// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdug byed pa// de yi phan yon brjod kyis sems dang zhing // rdul dang dri ma spongs la mnyan par gyis// do ni bsod nams ldan zhing
141b7(mdo sde): phyogs kun rgyu// nad mer gyur cing blo brtan bag yod la// spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong // rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur// mthu chen rab mkhas
142a1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur 'gyur te// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi go cha can// 'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri ldan thob// de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med// spyad pa spyod tshe longs
142a2(mdo sde): spyod nyams mi 'gyur// phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang // mya ngan med 'gyur 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags chos// tshi gar
142a3(mdo sde): brjod cing the tsom sel bar byed// chos thos yid bde slar yang smra bar byed// sdig pa'i las med blo rgya che dang ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phags pa// dga' bar 'gyur la rtag
142a4(mdo sde): tu mkhas byas te// mig kyang sbyor zhing mun pa sel bar byed// 'dod chags mi chen zhe sdang che ma yin// mi yi 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin// de ni tshangs spyad dag pa mchog 'di spyod// mi yi don ni
142a5(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa byed// bcom ldam mchod rten rnams la spos bdugs na// de la gnod par sems pa su yang med// de ni nams kyang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur// blta bar 'os shing nor chen
142a6(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnams su// sems ni rnam ngag sdig pa rnam dag cing // zhi zhing rab zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas// mi dman sems kyis byang chub mtshungs med thob// sems can
142a7(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas// mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing // 'khor lo mtshungs med 'jig rten kun bskor nas// phyi nas nyon mongs rdul med mya ngan 'das// su zhig dga' mgu sems kyis gro/
142b1(mdo sde): kyis ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mcho dbyer pa// de ni gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig brgya bgrangs mtha' yas rtag tu rnyed// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/
142b2(mdo sde): de ni btsas ma thag tu gos mchog thog/ lha yi khyad 'phags dang gos rab bzang rnyed// btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde// gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang // 'dren pa mtshungs med/
142b3(mdo sde): rnams la mchod byed pa// de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus thob ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// lag mthil nas ni mu tig
142b4(mdo sde): phreng mdzes pa// sna tshogs ngag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang // gser skung rab mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung // bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyi dkris byas na// lha'am klu'am mi'am lto phye
142b5(mdo sde): chesu yang de lam dang skyed mi byed// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te//
142b6(mdo sde): gling gser gyis gser ni zil mnan bzhin// skye dgu'i don ni dpag tu med pa byed// gal te rin chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis// stong gi zhing kun rab tu bkang pa yin// de 'dra'i dpal 'di
142b7(mdo sde): zad par bya nus kyi/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba min// nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od nams kyis// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ga/ de 'dra'i dpa' 'di zad par bya nus
143a1(mdo sde): kyi/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba min// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod rten padan phul byas na// de ni kye bo mang po'i mchod chom/
143a2(mdo sde): 'gyur// byang chub mchod spyod dam pa zhi pa spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na// dag cing mchog gi lus ni thob 'gyur te// dper na gser ltar shin tu dkar 'gyur zhing // lha yis bsngags
143a3(mdo sde): la mchod cing bla mar byed// de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur// ras kyi gos dpal ba bzang rab dang // du gu la dang ka shi pa rnams dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzam
143a4(mdo sde): bu'i gling na rigs mchog dam pa gang // phyug cing che nyid bdag dbang nor mngag/ de dag tu ni rtag tu de skye ste// dman shing mchog tu dbul ba rnam par spangs// de la sems can su yang zag dog
143a5(mdo sde): med// sems can gnod par sems pa gzhan mi 'byung // gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de smod de// rtag tu bag yod tshul khrims rnams ngag 'gyur// 'dzin pa med cing ser sna med
143a6(mdo sde): par 'ong // gtong ba rababatang mya ngan med pa thob// de ni srog phyir gzhan la sbyin mi byed// bong pa med byed rtag tu bag yod 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs bcud da pon mthong nas ni// dga' ba'i
143a7(mdo sde): sems kyis gzugs dang ba dan dang // mar me rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod// byang chub spyong mchog 'di na rtag par spyod// mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen dkur byed// lhan lha yi dag
143b1(mdo sde): dang mi yi gago// yid 'ong spos mdzes blta na sdug pa dang // nor bu shes 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa thob// ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal// wa kun slob mar gyur nas mngon du 'dud// chos kyis
143b2(mdo sde): de dag yi dbade skyed par byed// de la dang mchog gzhal gsang thob par 'gyur// de nas shi phos mi yi 'jig rten du// rgyal po dam pa stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur// de la sems
143b3(mdo sde): su yang sdig mi skye// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong 'gyur// rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul// ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas
143b4(mdo sde): mdzod ni mang ldan 'ong // sems chung mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur// longs spyod rnyed nas bgyed cing bdag kyang spyod// de ni 'jigs med yid mi bde ba med// rgyal po dga' nas grong dang yul//
143b5(mdo sde): 'khor bskyed// de la sems can su yang sde mi skye// gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzod mang zhing // khyim bdag rin chen sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur// rgyal po'i bu 'am re bzhin blon por 'ong // rgyal por
143b6(mdo sde): gyur na stobs ldan brdzi ba med// brnyes pa'i rigs dman thams cad yongs su thong // longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog rnyed nas mi// rtag tu bag yod sems ni zhum mi 'gyur// 'dod pa
143b7(mdo sde): rnams ni ngan skyugs khung ltar spong // khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams rab tu thog/ khya dang pags rigs dang de bzhin dbang phyug nyid// de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyed 'gyur// skye bo mang
144a1(mdo sde): pos mthun du bdar bar 'ong // de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed// sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan// de la ma rang drug dang mtshon mi tshugs// skye bo chog/
144a2(mdo sde): chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur// rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod// shes bzhin ldan nas yid bde skyed par byed// 'dzin pa med cing chags med sems dang ldan// chags med gyur
144a3(mdo sde): nas de la mi mthun med// de yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med// rnam dag sems ldan de ni bden par smra// 'jigs pas nyes pa rnamal yid bde skyed// sems can rnams kyi
144a4(mdo sde): skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur// de ni bdag don rgya chen byas nas su// gzhan yang sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god// shing dbang shing mchog dam pa'i drung song nas// mtshungs med//
144a5(mdo sde): mchog zhing byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na// 'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar// sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dzam gling gser gyis gang // de 'dra'i
144a6(mdo sde): dpal de zad par bya mi nus// bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na// de yi lus ni mdog ngan yod mi 'gyur// gzugs mchog sra zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra// snang ba thob nas 'jig rten
144a7(mdo sde): kun tu rgyu// gal te rgyal ba dam par byung gyur na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur// nye dur 'gyur ram yang na bur yang 'gyur// de ni ye shes phung po myur du thob// gal te khrag khrig brgya stong
144b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing // yungs 'drung ga gis byung bur gang gyur pa// bgrang ba dang ni gzhal zhing brjod par nus// bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lha yin// sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs med sbyin pa'i gnas/
144b2(mdo sde): spyod pa mchog spa khyad pas rjes gyur pa// mi mchog rmel mchod pa 'dir dras pa// rnam par smin pa dam gzhal yas 'gyur// gal tom mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun// nor du rin chen de rnams gang
144b3(mdo sde): ngaha tarbang par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zang mi 'gyur// kar sha pa Nas mi mjed 'jig rtem khams// 'og nas sring pa'i rtse mo bar gang ga/ zad par bya rus
144b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal re zad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan dan gyis// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang ba// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten
144b5(mdo sde): la/ mar me gcig phul dpa' de zang mi 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ras kyi// gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur pa// zad par bya rus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar
144b6(mdo sde): me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// klu dang lha min mi dang lto phye che// lha yi lha rdzas nor bu rin chen mang // zad par bu nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad
144b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yi spos// de dag mi mjed 'di kun gang gyur pa/ zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpa la de zar mi 'gyur//
145a1(mdo sde): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams cad ni shes par rus ka nam mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes par nus// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul ba'i// de 'ja'i
145a2(mdo sde): dpal re zad par bya mi rus// sangs rgyas dam pa mi mcho bzhud pa'i tshe// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med la dad byas te// ston pa'i skul nye zer mi 'bab par/ me tog ma li ka ba dugs bcom ldan phul/
145a3(mdo sde): des ni las mdzes dam pa gus byas pas// lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan 'bum gyur// 'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i dag por gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas// 'khor los sgyur ba'i//
145a4(mdo sde): rgyal po stobs ldan gyur// stong phrag bcu la dbang bar gyur te// nor chen rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur// khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog bye ba nyi
145a5(mdo sde): shud dag/ ngas ni mnyes byas gzims chan bza' yis// mo mchog dag la bla mar bsti stang byas// de dag gtsug lag khang la spos kyis bskus// nga yi kha dog ngan pa kun med gyur// ngas
145a6(mdo sde): ni cha dang grang dang ngal ba spangs// sangs rgyas spyan sngar dman med sems gyur cing // de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gdugs mdzes blta sdug pa/
145a7(mdo sde): su zhig bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa// de 'dir lus ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i sku ni rab 'bar zhing // khyad par 'phags
145b1(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs dang sems 'dra dang // 'dzam gling gser ltar rab mdzes ldan sdug pa mtshan gyis me tog rgyas pas mngon tu gang // mngon par shes pa thob tsong dbang cher zags// byang chub spyong
