145b2(mdo sde): mchog dam pa'i baspyod// de ni nams kyang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur// lhas kyang bsti snang bya zhing mchod par 'ong // brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dka'// rgyal thams rnamangs
145b3(mdo sde): rab mkhas tshangs par spyod// yid ma bcas nas nags dang na gas 'dab song // mngon shes thob cing khyad par thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'dul ga/ ji
145b4(mdo sde): lta bur yang byang chub sems mi 'dor// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyur// de yi shes pa rnams kyang nyams pa med// rol mo'o sgra yis mi mchog mcho dbus na//
145b5(mdo sde): mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong // mi yi 'jig rten yid 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur// de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par 'ong // bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// shes bzhin ldan
145b6(mdo sde): zhing mig ni rnam dag 'gyur// rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dga'// sna yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// de yi lce ni rab mdzes blta na sdug/ thob mar rab mnyen mdzes shing
145b7(mdo sde): sgra yid 'ong // dper ma lha yis rin chen bu ru 'dra// sgra skad yan lag bye ba dpag med 'byin// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur khri med
146a1(mdo sde): minas gzharang sgur po ya tsan+d+ra mi 'gyur// khrus ni khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lha 'am klu'am mi'am lto 'phye che/
146a2(mdo sde): su yang de la ma dang skye mi 'gyur// dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// do ni ma ning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur// nams kyang mdze dang sha bkra mi 'byung zhing /
146a3(mdo sde): bsngags par 'os pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i snga byas na// lce ring 'gyur zhing lus kyang che bar 'gyur// gser gyi gzugs ltar kha dog 'bar bar 'ong // ting 'dzin
146a4(mdo sde): brtan zhing shin tu rtogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lha nang bdag por 'gyur zhing dbang phyug 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes na dga' bar 'ong // brtson 'grus ldan zhing
146a5(mdo sde): bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// de la su yang yid mi bde mi skyed// de la su yang tshig rtsu ba spab med// phra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag
146a6(mdo sde): sma/ bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs te// bcom ldan mchod rten gus par 'phyag byed pa// de ni smad cing mi gtsang lus mi 'gyur// ba sbu khung nas tsan dan dri ngar 'byung // bcom
146a7(mdo sde): ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// bskal pa bye ba zag khrig brgya stong du// yan lag ma smad khyad 'phags lus thob cing // mdzes la mtshan gyis go char byas par 'gyur// bcom ldan
146b1(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// wA yi tsan dam byad 'phags rab mdzes pa'o// gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan thob// de ni de la gzhar yang sred mi skyed// bcom ldan mya ngan
146b2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i mchod rten phugs// yid 'ong rdo ldan mchog tu blta sngags pa'i// lha yi bu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing // de ni de la nams kyang chags mi skyed// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten
146b3(mdo sde): phyags// bskyed mos tshal mchog yod pa'i rdzing bu ni// yan lag brgyad ldan chu gtsang mdzes gyur pa// me tog ut+pa las ni rgyas pa thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phugs/
146b4(mdo sde): de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu 'thun 'gyur zhing // mi dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos// lha mo rnams kyi glu dbyangs snyan sgra thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// 'jig rten
146b5(mdo sde): kun du skyes tsha bdag nyid kyis// 'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar shes// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// de ni lha la snyan pa'i
146b6(mdo sde): gtam byas te// sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkod nas// shi ba'i dus byas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// btsas ma thag tu bskal pa
146b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas dran// sngon gyi sangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur ba dang // de dag mtshan dang yon tan chos kyang dran// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te// mos pa bskyed nas mchod//
147a1(mdo sde): rten rtswa skyes sel// de yi phan yon de dag ngas bshad kyis// thang dri sol dang ba'i sems kyis com// mthu chen skyes bu dam pa khyad 'phags pa// rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs
147a2(mdo sde): dus na mthong // de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// de ni gzha' gsang dad pa dam 'thog/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu de dpon nges mthong nas// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med pa mchod pa bye ba
147a3(mdo sde): mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas su// 'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag lung yang ston// grong khyer yangs pa nyams dga' mchog gnas shing // nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa//
147a4(mdo sde): de dag phyi dus rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshe// rgyal mchog mya ngan 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur// mchod rten rdza skyes sel bar byed pa ni// rgyal ba dam pa mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i// rgyu dang sa bon 'gyu
147a5(mdo sde): bab 'di yin no// 'dod dang dmyal dang dud 'gro'o skye gnas spong // byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mdo mchog 'di// phyi ma rab 'jig dus na 'dzin byed pa// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha yin// /
147a6(mdo sde): bsod nams khyad 'phags mtshungs med zhing du 'gyur// 'dib shar tshen gang dag 'dir mchod dang // tshul 'di ba shad pa gang dag thos pa dang // gang dag mdo mchog 'di ni 'dir bzung ga
147a7(mdo sde): de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dir 'di 'dzin// gang dag phyin chad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa// de dag rtag tung dang 'thun pa'i sras// sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags brjod kyang // de dag bsngags pa
147b1(mdo sde): mthang ni phyir mi 'gyur// gang dag nas rtul pa'i chos 'dzin ga// sangs rgyas rtseg zag thog brgyam par las// bskal pa bye bar ba zhugs ti dag gis/ bsngags pa brjo mtha' ma tshu/
147b2(mdo sde): mi nus// bri zhim yid 'ong thos kyis cho ga bzhin// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni su sku dang // don tho rnyed 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de ni sa 'dir snying po blangs parar gyur/ rgyal ba'i ma
147b3(mdo sde): chen spos byug phul byas na// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig 'gyur ro// 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // de ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos drug
147b4(mdo sde): phul byas na// dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang sprad pa rnams// rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas// de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'dir spyod// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug du
147b5(mdo sde): byas na// 'di nas shi'i phos mtho ris lha dbang 'gyur// ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog/ lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul
147b6(mdo sde): byas na// gang gi tshe na mi yi 'jig rten na// zhe sdang med sems 'jam zhing mnyen 'gyur pa// de tshe de na 'dzam bu'i glong du gnas// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na//
147b7(mdo sde): khyad 'phags tshig ldan sgra dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur// skye bo mang po yi 'ong dga' zhing bkur// de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na//
148a1(mdo sde): de ni ngan songs rnams ma lus spong // de bzhin gshegs dang nye bar thob par 'gyur// dadang thobacing rtag tu bde la dga'// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos phya ga jal/
148a2(mdo sde): byas na// rgyal po stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod nams ldan// chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// dga' ba'i sems kyis mgu
148a3(mdo sde): ba'i shugs bskyed da // bcom ldan mchod rten nor bu'i dra ba 'phrul// de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha can// mthu che bla ma 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ blta 'os mtshan gyi go cha ldan gyur na/
148a4(mdo sde): gzhal med khang chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa// kha dog sna tshogs dpag med ldan pa dang // rin che mkhang bzangs che 'os dag pa thog/ rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags gyur pa// skyes
148a5(mdo sde): pa bud me de dag gis gang ba dang // mnyam zhing legs byas rab mdzes blta sdug pa// dra bas sna tshogs bde byed de 'jug thog/ rgyal mtshan ba dan gsal bas mdzes byas shing // gdugs/
148a6(mdo sde): bres shin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang / mu tig dra ba phreng ba de 'dra ba'i// rgyal srid yon tan khyad 'phags gzhan yang thog/ de yi yul na gzhan nor 'jig byed pa// chom rkun
148a7(mdo sde): g.yo ldan g.yo can gnas mi 'gyur// sems can rgya che blo mchog ldan pa dang // phan byed byams sems ldan pa de na gnas// shi 'phos bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste// dkar
148b1(mdo sde): nag gang yin bdag cag ji ltar gnas// 'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar mir skye zhes// tho ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur// sangs rgyas sbyin gnas zur du mthong 'gyur te// mthong nas mchod cing
148b2(mdo sde): mtshungs me bsti stang byed// sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub mos skyed cing // rdul bral rnams la phyir zhing bsti stang byed// ye shes mtha' yas ldan dang mthu chen 'gyur// khyad paras
148b3(mdo sde): gnas 'phags pa'o sems can 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das la dang ba'i sems bskyed nas// 'di 'dra'i dpal 'di phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur// nga yi bya ba'i de ni brjod par bya// ngas
148b4(mdo sde): brjod 'di la the tsom ma skyed cig/ sangs rgyas dka' spangs mnar mer 'gror 'gyur zhing // phyin chad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re// 'jig rten sngon ma mtshungs med bsod nams
148b5(mdo sde): zhing de yi mchod rten brgya su sel ba// bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud brgya 'dral// dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong // rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral ba sti stang byed// rtag tu stobs
148b6(mdo sde): ldan 'khor lo sbyar bar 'gyur// mi yi'i 'jig rten skyes na bsod nams ldan// rgyal po kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// lha nang lha yi dbang po mchod gnas 'gyur// der ni myur
148b7(mdo sde): dulha yi tshe yang thob// dpal ldan gser gyi gzhal med khang pa rnyed// lha yi bde ba mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rab ro mchog dang // reg bya dpa' ldan lha yi 'jig rten
149a1(mdo sde): thog mthu chem ldan zhing blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// lha mo rnams la 'dod pa'i sred mi skyed// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// 'di na sa shi phos mi mi
149a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'gro// yan lag legs gnas khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur// nam yang bstan bcos mi nyung mang po thog/ bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong
149a3(mdo sde): zhing / de ni ngal 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'phags// de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs med mchod pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// bag yod blo gros brtan la dpa' bor 'gyur/
149a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skyed// mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya ba sal byas na// de ni nams kyang byang chub sems mi 'dor//
149a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur// rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos kyang thog/ bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// de yi mdog ngan dus rnams kun tu spong // 'chal
149a6(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong // shes rab brgya chen gyur nas spyod la gnas// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur la// khyad 'phags kha
149a7(mdo sde): ton ldan zhing blta sdug la// re ga dang ldan zhing rab mdzes gos rnams thog/ dad pa'i shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten la/ me tog skam po nya la nyil phyags byas na// 'dod pa
149b1(mdo sde): spang ba sdug bsngal byed pa spong // stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par byed// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyags pa// de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur// skye bo mang pos
149b2(mdo sde): mchod 'o sa blta 'os 'gyur// de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis// me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas na// ngan songs yi las ngan
149b3(mdo sde): thams cad gcod// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas// mchod rten me tog rnaMs pa su 'phyag pa// bag yod mya ngan rnams dang skyon rnams spong // nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam
149b4(mdo sde): par spong // bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thog// mchod rten me tog rtsis pa su 'phyag pa// sbyin gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong // tshungs med thob cing lha mis
149b5(mdo sde): mchod 'os 'gyur// rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur// lha yi me tog rab mdzes man+da ra// mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul dang // mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa/
149b6(mdo sde): de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchod dubral/ ma chon zhes thoganyis pa su 'dul // da lus dug gis mi tshugs mtshon mi n+yaiHsa// me 'a bar 'or 'phro phung po ches mi tshugs// nor gyi phung po rkun pos brku mi 'gyur/
149b7(mdo sde): mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i shugs bskyed dang // bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam lugs na// de yi bsod nams bzung bar gang gyur pa// grangs sam cha yang brjod par sla ma lani// mchod rten ma
150a1(mdo sde): tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten na ni rtag tu dga'// mthu dang ldan zhing yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung // mchod rten ma
150a2(mdo sde): tog skyes pa su 'phyag pa chos mchog rab mdzes yang dag spyod byed cing // de lus rnam par dag pa chen por 'ong // ring por mi thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs
150a3(mdo sde): rgyas 'gyur byar mos bskyed dade// ston pa'i mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/ 'jig rten dag na bla mar bkur sti bya// de ni mdzes shing brtan sdug par 'gyur// de 'dir rgyal srid thob nas
150a4(mdo sde): lha glu mi// lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur// dbang phyug nyid du dbang thob rgyal srid ston// de yi yul na sems can gang gnas
150a5(mdo sde): pa/ dkun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god// da ni ngan songs yang rnam par spongs// de dag rnams kyi don mchog dam pa byed// bsod nams blo gros rngam ldan mchod 'os 'gyur//
150a6(mdo sde): phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de yig yo 'khor yod 'ong sgra skad ldan// bsam pa ji bzhin deng ga dga' bskyed// sems can rnams la mi lhod zhi tshig ston// de la su yang dbang
150a7(mdo sde): phyag med mi byed// skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur// de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs yan lag dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// sbyin dang snyan par spa nga don spyang
150b1(mdo sde): dang / don 'thun pa dang skye bo mngal byed// spong shing bcad sang khro ba'i dngos mi skyed/ sangs rgyas mchod cen thal spar phyag 'tshal ba/ mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lga dbang 'gyub gamir gyur nadang /
150b2(mdo sde): mi yi rgyal por 'ong // de ni gzhar yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// de ni gzhar yang ngan song phyis mi lhung // 'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spos
150b3(mdo sde): nor can nang na phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur// yon tan ldan la tshig gcig su smag/ de ni mi rigs sngags la gzhar mi spyod// mi yi 'jig rten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur// de la sems can mi
150b4(mdo sde): ngoms dga' bar 'gyur// yid 'ong dbyangs ldan po bra 'khor gshegs shing // 'jig rten mgon po sgo gtan bzhugs pa'i tshe// su zhig shugs bskyed me tog blangs te gtor// de ni brgyan nas
150b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dam pa mthong // rang gi khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed// de yi bshos gsol chos bzang ston pa mdzad// dad pa skyes nas mi mchog bsnyen bkur byed// gos kyang thogs te//
150b6(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren la 'bul// sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med mchog thob nas// stobs bcu ldan zhing g.yo ba med gyur la// byang chub sangs rgyas sdug bsngal skye bo 'grol// 'jig rten kun
150b7(mdo sde): tu mtshungs med sangs rgyas shog/ de yi smon lam 'di 'dra 'ang dang ni// sangs rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyen nas// stobs bcu 'dzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du//
151a1(mdo sde): mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to// skyes bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas// bde gshegs mchog gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur te// bang ga ni rgyal ba mchog
151a2(mdo sde): 'gyur dogs med ces// dga' zhing mgu nas bar snang kun tu rgyu// 'jig rten lnga yi lhar gyur sangs rgyas su// khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas 'gyur ba dang // de sems spyod dang dga' bar
151a3(mdo sde): gnas mkhyen nas// de la stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes par 'gyur// ba gshegs mchog gis gos ni bzhes rig nas// de ni shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste// mtshungs med/
151a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon la bltas nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa skyed// skye shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya// grol nas skye bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol/ 'jig rten
151a5(mdo sde): kun na long ba'i mag bdag gyur// snang bathob nas mun pa rab rib bsal// de ltar phan yon dam po 'ang thos nas// me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang // rol mo spa dang gdugs dang thug
151a6(mdo sde): bdug gis// mgon po mchog la sangs rgyas 'gyur bas kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag dang / zo zos rnam par dag pa la sogs pa/
151a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dpeg dri thamasas pa'i 'jig rten yid ras bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la ngon par babyed do//
151b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa spun ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi ni mi dang / tra na shi la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes
151b2(mdo sde): bsgyur cing zhus te/ ska ga sar chad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rang nA lo ka nA ma d+ha ra Ni ma la
151b3(mdo sde): na sU tra/ bod skad du'aphags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam pa dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
151b4(mdo sde): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong stong du tshangs pa thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongs
151b5(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa// seng go'i sgra chen po sgrog pa// ye shes kyi tsho gas dpag tu med pa tshol ba la mkhas pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge dun chen po dang // thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems
151b6(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub
151b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams
152a1(mdo sde): mngon bsgrags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan bkod pa dang / byang chub/
152a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems
152a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa'
152a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi blo gros dang ga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
152a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo thos brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las na rdo rje
152a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song srong dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
152a7(mdo sde): chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
152b1(mdo sde): po mo len mi 'dor ba dang byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' che mo po tsan dam gyi mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tho gros rgya mtsho dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
152b2(mdo sde): chen po 'byung dka' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa
152b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa
152b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung ba dbyangs sgra thogs pa med pa
152b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa zil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs
152b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa khams gsum la ma chags pa g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las nges par skyes pa ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug
152b7(mdo sde): pa tsha de mang pa dang ldan pa re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud pa lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la mos pa
153a1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul ba
153a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du/ 'dus par gyur
153a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyibacom ldan 'das
153a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang spros pa med pa dang / ma spros padang
153a5(mdo sde): blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnas pa med pa ste/ de ltar rtogs par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
153a6(mdo sde): selags chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni
153a7(mdo sde): bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/ dngos po gang du yang brjod par bya ba ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o// byang chub
153b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa bcom ldan pa ngas byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal da rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi rnam pa ni ched med/
153b2(mdo sde): dede ni tshad dang ldan par bstan par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bdang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lagasachos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgying ngam
153b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi
153b4(mdo sde): dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni
153b5(mdo sde): rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
153b6(mdo sde): byang chub 'di ni zab lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bung de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad spros
153b7(mdo sde): pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
154a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog tal la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs pa shad du gsol/ bcom ldan/
154a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang 'dis khyod la ston/
154a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'jug nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das
154a4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu gang na
154a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyom su bzhugs so// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
154a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bung ni sems can gyis khams yal bar 'dor
154a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas 'jam dpal
154b1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog tal la zhes bgyi ba'i bzungs bshad du gsol co ba rdzun
154b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang 'dis khyed la ston par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu skyes
154b3(mdo sde): bu dam pa 'din ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la dgongs na / bdag gis skyes bung ma pa 'di la dri bar bgyi'o//
154b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thob pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gad ba ci dgos rigs kyi bu khyod ni
154b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun tu bstan pa dang / bsgoms
154b6(mdo sde): pa dang mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rigs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba rigs kyi bu legs so
154b7(mdo sde): legs so// khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras te/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis khyod byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dris
155a1(mdo sde): shig de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
155a2(mdo sde): bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
155a3(mdo sde): po yin gyis bdag la ma srung shig/ yang rigs kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ting nge 'dzin pasam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
155a4(mdo sde): gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sor mo bcu'i thul mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di ska ces smras so// kye rgyas
155a5(mdo sde): nga'i sras khyod kyis bdag la bskabs phyin// khyod la bdagayo ge 'bru gnyis shes 'dra'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu babang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes/
155a6(mdo sde): gson du gyu kyang chubs mam pa mams par pa ba 'dig sasmras
155a7(mdo sde): rgyams ma sa kya gzham na gang min/ byang chub sems dpa gran nga pos smras pa kyi rgyal nga'ams sangs rgyas byin pa'i dzi ni med pa'i ngan to// sangs
155b1(mdo sde): TI gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gaN+DI'i don ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni mi mnyas pa dang mnyam pa'i don to// sangs rgyas
155b2(mdo sde): kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni ma spros pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni blangs pa med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi bzhi'i don ni dor ba
155b3(mdo sde): med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don no bskyed du med pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
155b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes
155b5(mdo sde): ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di ni bstan tu med pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
155b6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan tu med na ci zhig bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa 'jam dpal bstan tu med pa ni btags te bstan to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
155b7(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras bsngags pas ci zhig 'dogs par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa 'jam dpal btags pas ni dngos po yang mi 'dogs
156a1(mdo sde): dam pa med pa yang mi 'dogs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rtse rgyal ba'i sras gal te btags pas dngos po yang mi 'dogs dngos po mdapa yang mi 'dogapa na/
156a2(mdo sde): theg pa gsum pa dag ji ltar bstan byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos spras pa 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi dbyings chags pa med pal chags par ma byed/ de so phyir zhe na/
156a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po lnga mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpa'
156a4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ byang chub spros pa dang bcas pa yin nam/ 'on te spros pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin//
156a5(mdo sde): spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub dang spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
156a6(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la/ rigs kyi thabs mgyi mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di legs so legs so zhes bya ba sbyin no// gtam 'di brjod pas lnga dang
156a7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'tshal bar mi rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
156b1(mdo sde): bkar stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad spras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
156b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no//
156b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par gyi bka' ba lags so// /
156b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mchos 'dis
156b5(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
156b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no// 'di na chos kyi char chen po yin no//
156b7(mdo sde): nas shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pacing bsam gyi mi khyab pa
157a1(mdo sde): lags te// de la yi ge mi dmigs/ tshig 'bru mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin tu/ chos kyi dbyings la tshig /
157a2(mdo sde): mi spang don kyang mi snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rapas 'di da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu dran pa gang lags
157a3(mdo sde): rnam pa gang lags ka rtags gang lags/ mtshan ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pA/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bskad du med
157a4(mdo sde): pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o// stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o// stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste
157a5(mdo sde): de'i phyir spong ba'id ces bya'o// rigs kyi du chos thams cad ni chos kyi batshad kyis spong / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gas
157a6(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/
157a7(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
157b1(mdo sde): rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas bso ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
157b2(mdo sde): cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na nyan thos kyis mi nyan thos kyi
157b3(mdo sde): chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu can thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la
157b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa'am/ spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i nus pa dang mthug la yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam
157b5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhi ga shegs papa shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na bas
157b6(mdo sde): pa 'jig la bstan pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsala'ajam dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni'i ldan pa med pa'o// de nas 'jam dpa
157b7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shwa ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad ces sbas so// gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thong dam/ spras mede ni ma yin no// 'jam
158a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ 'on ci spyongs so'i skye bo 'am/ smras par ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o ma khyod ci slob pa'am/ smras par/
158a2(mdo sde): nim yin no// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ 'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/ spras pa/ de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te btsun
158a3(mdo sde): ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na/ de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/
158a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed // 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod no rgan rabs thu bo mchog mi
158a5(mdo sde): gyis/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci yang thob par mi 'gyur/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/
158a6(mdo sde): ro// rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la da bu'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje ngan don gyis kyang ri zag chen po rnam par 'jig go// rigs kyi bu
158a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du khyod kyi spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni kho mo lnga bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/ rigs kyi ma don cad shes par bya /
158b1(mdo sde): phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bal glang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang / mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar byed do//
158b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo monyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo'i bye ga la nus/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shwa raH
158b3(mdo sde): ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dmus long gis ni shul du mchis pa'am/ grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thog na/ khyim nas khyim du
158b4(mdo sde): mchi ba'i rdo lta ga la thog ste de ni gnas ma yin no// de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'ang
158b5(mdo sde): ngag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ de ci bgyir yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa
158b6(mdo sde): ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis sems can ji snyed cig la regs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tho
158b7(mdo sde): pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na
159a1(mdo sde): lnga dang mi ljang gu las sems can dgu khro cos stong gos chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub
159a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog phal la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu phyogs
159a3(mdo sde): bcu'i phyogs re ro'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdulas/
159a4(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul srid kyis zhal mngon par bston to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshar rdo rje'i stong po zhes bya bar 'thun pa sa sug go// phyogs gcig dril par
159a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcurnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kyi blo thos khyod de ltar byang chub sems das
159a6(mdo sde): ti 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dibacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'ang
159a7(mdo sde): nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs dang khyod bod kyi dge ba'i rtsabs che bar brtan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bldan par byab dang
159b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang sems can gyi khams rnam
159b2(mdo sde): par dgrol bya ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad rjod par bya ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i
159b3(mdo sde): ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs
159b4(mdo sde): bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan 'thun pa 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis brlob kyis rigs kyi
159b5(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las rtsom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa
159b6(mdo sde): skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang sgrib pa med pa dang /
159b7(mdo sde): chod pa med pa dang brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid dang tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zil gyis mnon pa dang / zhum pa med pa dang / 'phrogs pa med pa'i
160a1(mdo sde): chos nyid dang brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas
160a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la nyug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub
160a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/ de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la spras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub se
160a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ltar byang chub
160a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba/
160a6(mdo sde): yin da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo
160a7(mdo sde): gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems
160b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang yin/ gang las bsams te de skad smras/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa
160b2(mdo sde): bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
160b3(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar
160b4(mdo sde): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
160b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang
160b6(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyal tshab dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems
160b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so//
161a1(mdo sde): gsung ngo / gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
161a2(mdo sde): 'di la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba'am mdzes pa'am/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa 'am rgya ches
161a3(mdo sde): 'am gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ kun rjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'am rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngamasems can sdug
161a4(mdo sde): bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod cing thog ma nyid du bla na
161a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
161a6(mdo sde): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba
161a7(mdo sde): lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang / mos pa rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang garnam par
161b1(mdo sde): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi shes pa/
161b2(mdo sde): dang zag pa zad pa'i shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dga' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzungs par 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
161b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo
161b4(mdo sde): byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang zad pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
161b5(mdo sde): la rnal 'byor du bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par
161b6(mdo sde): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis/ shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang
161b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o//
162a1(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub/
162a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang bde bar bya ba'i
162a3(mdo sde): sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang / gnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan bdags pa'i sems dang / kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i
162a4(mdo sde): sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te/ sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po par
162a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung mnod pa dang / kha ton la sbyor bar bya'o// mang du thos nas rab tu dben pa
162a6(mdo sde): la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i shes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la
162a7(mdo sde): sbyor bar bya'o// bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// dus shes par gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar/
162b1(mdo sde): bya'o// don shes par gyur nas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas/ brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// rmongs pa med par
162b2(mdo sde): gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed
162b3(mdo sde): cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi drang la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub
162b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag rnal
162b5(mdo sde): 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa
162b6(mdo sde): dang chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par
162b7(mdo sde): rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa'i phyir sbyor ba yang mi byed/ mi sbyor ba yang mi byed//
163a1(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rtsal ba'i lus dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can/
163a2(mdo sde): khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chu'i khams dang /
163a3(mdo sde): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas
163a4(mdo sde): cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas re ngag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras da/
163a5(mdo sde): 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
163a6(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyang ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
163a7(mdo sde): chos nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can lanas
163b1(mdo sde): par dpyod pa dang / zhing la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyad pa dang / las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyor pa dang
163b2(mdo sde): 'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis srung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/
163b3(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i
163b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs
163b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpung pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
163b6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnams par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
163b7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyo chos yongs su 'grub
164a1(mdo sde): pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i/
164a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar rgya'o/
164a3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing / gong du gnas gang dag zos pa'i de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jogs
164a4(mdo sde): thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
164a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal po'i sras dag/ 'od la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i las gang ci rtsom yang de thams
164a6(mdo sde): cad sems can thams cad yongs su bslab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba dang sems can thams cad la skye
164a7(mdo sde): brtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can
164b1(mdo sde): thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dka' di na/
164b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcug
164b3(mdo sde): non 'di rje ste/ sems can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu mang po dang / sems can grangs med pa dang sems can pasam gyis mi khyab pa dang sems can
164b4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa dang / sems can gzhal du med pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can meng pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin
164b5(mdo sde): med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan
164b6(mdo sde): dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag de la
164b7(mdo sde): bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
165a1(mdo sde): bcu thob pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa'am/
165a2(mdo sde): bsngags pa ma yin pa' chad kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa'i chad kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa'
165a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags
165a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa'am/ sems can gyi khams rgya che'o zhe 'am/ sems can//
165a5(mdo sde): gyis khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe 'am/ sems kyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul bla zhe'am/ sems can gyi khams
165a6(mdo sde): gdul dka' zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings chung zhe bam/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams ngag 'jig ce'am/ mi 'jig ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am/ chos
165a7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kying rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o//
165b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga/
165b2(mdo sde): chosathams cad mtshan ma meng pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan cing med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / med pa nyid dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa cing dang /
165b3(mdo sde): nyid med pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher
165b4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/
165b5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
165b6(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa bcu thos na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog sa
165b7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang chos yod don/
166a1(mdo sde): 'am meng ngo zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub/
166a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe'am nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am ma'ang so zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin
166a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag ma byon to zhe'am mabyon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa drug da ltar byung ba'o zhe'am du ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
166a4(mdo sde): zad do zhe'am mi zad do zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum po drag mtshan nyid gcig ces 'am mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste/
166a5(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'din phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu
166a6(mdo sde): yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// mang ba dang gcig pa nyid dang /
166a7(mdo sde): ge la don sgro btags pa dang / don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma/
166b1(mdo sde): med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma slobatags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid slobatags pa yang
166b2(mdo sde): dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par byung zhing / gong du gnas gang dag zos pa'i gnas de ngas
166b3(mdo sde): la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i
166b4(mdo sde): sras dag/ de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang
166b5(mdo sde): ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod
166b6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sem
166b7(mdo sde): can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ 'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin// gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu
167a1(mdo sde): shes pa yin/ rgyas 'i ma pazhin du 'thobar phyi mngon pa shes pa smra ba yin/ la mas na/ 'don g.yong du ts+tsha n+tu
167a2(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa
167a3(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang
167a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang / zibagrangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra srad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs
167a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas
167a6(mdo sde): gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
167a7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la rgyal
167b1(mdo sde): tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'a di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yir/ nyon mongs/
167b2(mdo sde): pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin spyod yul la sbyor brtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ ros
167b3(mdo sde): nying rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar srud pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sbyin
167b4(mdo sde): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ don dam
167b5(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems
167b6(mdo sde): dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho zung 'khor du/
167b7(mdo sde): kun tu ltung ba dang / rgyal ba'o la zang 'khor du 'jug pa dang / rgyal ba'i ba zang 'khor drarnam par dpung ba dang / chos po rgyam po'i dbang bsu pa dang / chos kyi rgyam mo 'byon gyis
168a1(mdo sde): brlabs dang / chos kyi rgyam pam rol spyod dang / chos brgyal po'i gnas dang / chosas kyi 'o pa las sa sa pa / ma mad/
168a2(mdo sde): ma lags tshor chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bsgrub la 'jug cing gong gnas gang dag thos pa gnas de dgal yang bdag cing thung gyi gzhan gyi la mi 'jig pa rjod pa'i
168a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i mas dag/ 'din rgyal tsha gyi kyang chub sems dpa' rnam par ga'agapa'o// de rtul ba sas // 'dis dbang 'brur bsod pa chung chungasas sa pa na
168a4(mdo sde): par gzhag pa gang zhen/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes pa mngon par sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
168a5(mdo sde): lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlob pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyis kham
168a6(mdo sde): grangs med pa sems gcig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyar ba byed pa mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems ga
168a7(mdo sde): gis rnam par rig par byed ma mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pal rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems
168b1(mdo sde): gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yinasems can grangs med pa 'dug
168b2(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin sems can mangs me sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rjid kyi sems la 'dzud pa lta mkhas pa yin no// sde rgyal ba'i sras du/ rgyal ma ts+tsha/
168b3(mdo sde): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man can grang gis kyang dbang bskur bathob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ro'i yul kyilas shes par mi nus dag ni las shes par mi nus

169a3(mdo sde): chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa brjod par mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la

169a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu

169a7(mdo sde): 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem
169b1(mdo sde): 'i bdag pa'i ra byung mang sa / ma pa yang mngan par ba so// 'ikhyim ma dang 'i rjes dang
169b2(mdo sde): cha dang / rtsotshigs kyi ma nam ma/ rgyun nga / ldan 'g-i Sh+Na n+d+ha dang / ra
169b3(mdo sde): bo/ lha'i sil ldan rnams kyangs krol bar mazung ngo // lha'i snang nga yang rab tu byung // 'aldi ro yang bag so// gling bzhi pa 'dir mo ma tshwa dab po'i khang ra 'i
169b4(mdo sde): du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byang ste lhag chad med do// tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs
169b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags
169b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu rgyas par bka' nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so// legs so//
170a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag pa myi sa kyi tho gros shes rgya g+sas gaste/ 'dug chos kyi sus kya nas/ ra bzhin ga shegs
170a2(mdo sde): mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi zang nas 'dir phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta du dag
170a3(mdo sde): gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te lhag chad med do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig can gyi
170a4(mdo sde): khams 'dir phyin to// bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad ngu ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang
170a5(mdo sde): khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed phyin par gyur to// / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs
170a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi blo gros kyi sa phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas/ rol
170a7(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga' ba/ mdzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan 'gyur ba/ rnyed dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/
170b1(mdo sde): byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// do rje med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / kun rdzong bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang // sdug bsngal bzang chub 'jig cen 'gro mthong nas/ kyang /
170b2(mdo sde): chu bdon du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas// nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi//
170b3(mdo sde): byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang // gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtog/
170b4(mdo sde): bya'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang sa 'ongs pathar dus dag na// dge dang mi dag las rnam gang yong pa// de dag rgya rnams rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
170b5(mdo sde): byang chub don du bcan pa sems 'jog byed// ting nge 'dzin pasam gtan rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnamangag mapar thug pa/ de dag gnas skabs chogs
170b6(mdo sde): par zla ba'i phyir// byang chubo don du bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/ ci 'dra ni 'bring yi dang der/ rim pa dag
170b7(mdo sde): tshogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten kun gyi mos bco bra dang // lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dadang rnam gsum nas/
171a1(mdo sde): bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don bu snyan pa sems 'jog byed// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma khams// gang dag 'jig rten
171a2(mdo sde): gsum 'dir yong kun gyi// khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems de 'jog/ chos 'dir kun tu 'gro bar gang gyur cing // dge ba'i
171a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa// yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang //
171a4(mdo sde): sems can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags med mig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung du sa na/
171a5(mdo sde): sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa/
171a6(mdo sde): kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du gtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum na tha snyad gang btags dang // ngag la ma sngags
171a7(mdo sde): tshul spyod gang yod pa/ brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste// stong pa mig yor rang bzhin ngo bo/
171b1(mdo sde): cing/ don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jogs byed// zhing rnams ngag tus g.yo bstan pa dang / rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang /
171b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs kyi sa rdzu 'phrul brtan pa'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'od zer rtse mo re las 'od zer rnams/ de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'gyed/
171b3(mdo sde): dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa// de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te/ sgyu ma'i tshul de
171b4(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun// gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas/ chos rnams
171b5(mdo sde): srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa// sA rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed// ma lus
171b6(mdo sde): mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag/ gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing // phra rab rdul grangs
171b7(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten 'di na 'das dang de bzhin du// ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pas 'jig pa rnams// bskal pa//
172a1(mdo sde): zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ dus gsum ngag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // ston pa rang rgyal thos las
172a2(mdo sde): byung rnams kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la
172a3(mdo sde): 'debs// dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// spra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs/
172a4(mdo sde): rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed/
172a5(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'drab// skad cig gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing //
172a6(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun gyis rab tu rnam par shes
172a7(mdo sde): lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang // skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed/
172b1(mdo sde): rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhig rang byung gi
172b2(mdo sde): chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rdul phran tha dadang lta bur 'jig rten khams// rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul byed cing //
172b3(mdo sde): yid las byung ba de dag rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams// ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog
172b4(mdo sde): sems kyis skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med//
172b5(mdo sde): cho ga rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba// sems kyi
172b6(mdo sde): skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// phyogs par rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam// ngag gam yid kyis gang du'ang chags pa med//
172b7(mdo sde): dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin// gzhal yas bskal par phyogs su
173a1(mdo sde): rgyu byed cing // sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig rten tha dad par// 'jig rten bdag/
173a2(mdo sde): por rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur ba// gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrog par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// byang chub don tu srid par spyad spyod tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i bde
173a3(mdo sde): sbyar gang yin pa// de yi bsngags pa rtag tu rjod par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul tu phyin pa dang // khyab par 'phags
173a4(mdo sde): chos bla med gang yod pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// che nyid 'di ni
173a5(mdo sde): yod kyi gzhan med pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas
173a6(mdo sde): rnams dang phrad 'gyur ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang // de bzhin ting
173a7(mdo sde): 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams// de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang // dam pa'i
173b1(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/ 'jig rten kun gyis cag tu ma bskor ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya// shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad dang // ngan songs rnams/
173b2(mdo sde): dag tu gnod gyur pa'i// gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya// gang zhig byang chub don tu sems 'jog pa// de ni dang po'i byang chub sems
173b3(mdo sde): dpar bstan// bslabs pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas pa// ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin// nang bral rnams kyis bstan pa ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun la phan pa bya
173b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir// de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa// 'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no// phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde// gnyen dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang // kun
173b5(mdo sde): tu bsrung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa sems// de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyur pa de// lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya//
173b6(mdo sde): mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug/ dben par gyur nas dge ba shes bsten du gzhug/ dge ba shes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya// dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya// dus
173b7(mdo sde): shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya// 'jigs pa med nas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya// chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya// tho zla med par byung nas rgya'ala'i sras/
174a1(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya// 'don dang po'i las can brjod pa ste// byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin// 'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan//
174a2(mdo sde): pa ste// 'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras// byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor// mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang // bdag med
174a3(mdo sde): pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang // de bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang // mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar/
174a4(mdo sde): rtog par byed// sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang // brtag par bu phyir de ni gzengs yang bstod// 'jig rten ni mtha' yas mu med ces// de ltar de ni dpyod du gzhug
174a5(mdo sde): par bya// 'di na sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang // phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa// de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug
174a6(mdo sde): rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi// rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba// de ni sangs rgyas sras po sbyor byed la// phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin// byang
174a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa// bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed// blo ldan de ni dngos me dngos po rtogs// dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par
174b1(mdo sde): skyes// den rang gis sa las yod mi ldog/ sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa ste// rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan// sems can rang bzhin ci 'jar rnam par
174b2(mdo sde): dpyod// las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang // rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rnam par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes// de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub
174b3(mdo sde): sems dpar brjod// thams cad mkhyen pa'adas dang byung rnams dang // ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas// grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang // rang byung rnams
174b4(mdo sde): kyi grub pa ci 'drag/ sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni// dus gsum mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes// nam yang mnyam nyid byed brag 'byed mi byed// de ni dus gsum tha dad /
174b5(mdo sde): med par 'jug/ gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste// 'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub don du nges par 'byung bar
174b6(mdo sde): 'gyur// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin// thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste// bsod nams las dag bcoms pas mthar
174b7(mdo sde): phyibyiphyin byed// de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang // 'jog rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang // phan par 'dod dang bde ba thob byed dang // snying brtse ba dang skye dgu 'grol 'gyur byed// 'jig rten gnod
175a1(mdo sde): gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren par byed cing rab tu rang pa byed// sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che
175a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad tha ma med pa dang // de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang // mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang // stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes/
175a3(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang snying brgyar ldan// de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste// yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan// don sems can mtha' yas
175a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang // chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa med// shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
175a5(mdo sde): spyod pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang // sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam las nub pa med// sems can nyon mongs can nam rnam dag gam/
175a6(mdo sde): gdul bla zhe'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am/ chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe 'am// 'jig par 'gyur zhe'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe'am// chos dbyings yod ce'am med ces
175a7(mdo sde): thos byar kyang/ dus gsum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos 'dir bas mas shin tu ngas// mtshan ma medang
175b1(mdo sde): mtshan ci de meng pa dang // dngos med rang bzhin drun zhing dben pa dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig yor 'dra ba yi// chos mchog zhi pa 'di 'dra nyan par byed// de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems
175b2(mdo sde): dpa' mi// sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // spyod ba yod dam med ces nges par dpyod// 'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das te
175b3(mdo sde): 'am ma 'das zhe 'am// ma byon ce'am ma byon ma yin zhe'am// byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad ngam// de bzhin mtshan chid gcig gam mtshan nyid med// gcig dang ba dang rnam pa mang po
175b4(mdo sde): dang // don dang tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa// thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du// mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' yin ces byed// mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang /
175b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang // rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams// zos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed// gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// lus dang /
175b6(mdo sde): ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // 'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba sngon// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byed cing // de dag rnams kyi mos
175b7(mdo sde): pa dpyod par byed// sems can sprod dang rjes su 'thun chos dang // zhing rnams 'jig dpar chags pa rnams kyang shes// ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shes thob// phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug
176a1(mdo sde): par byed// bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang // de la dri ni nu rabar 'gyu ba med// yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang // de bzhin byin gyis brlabs dang /
176a2(mdo sde): rnam dpyod dang // ji ltar skad cing grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba// zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya// de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed// lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston// de la sgra skang sbyor ba
