176a3(mdo sde): 'jam klas dang // sems gcig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba gang yin pa// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes// de dag nyon mongs rgyu dadang
176a4(mdo sde): bag chags dang // spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang // tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang // 'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang // brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag/ ma lus rtogs
176a5(mdo sde): par bya la mkhas pa yin// pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshar 'byin te// de yang ji ltar kun tu spyad pa dang // gnas dang de bzhin 'jug par dang // pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra pyad pa dang // dam
176a6(mdo sde): chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur ci 'dra dang // byin gyi brlabs dang gzhan gnod ci 'dra dang // chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste// 'di ni rgyal tshabs la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gyis na de yi mthar
176a7(mdo sde): thug ste// ji skad bstan bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba med// tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na// tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs// dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs su gcig ste//
176b1(mdo sde): thu bo khyad 'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can// skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung // 'di ni bsam pa bgrangs pas rtogs ma yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste// 'di ni/
176b2(mdo sde): sems can la las zhing rnams kun// phra rab rdul du drags nas ma lus bgrang // grangs med 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed pa// de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' shes// 'das
176b3(mdo sde): dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi// sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems de skye// thog mar byang
176b4(mdo sde): chub sems zhes gang brjod pa// de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de// 'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na// de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod// de nas byang chub
176b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smraso//
176b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin na//
176b7(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang // klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang // de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang cing dgos te// de dag nges par sangs rgyas su
177a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// chos kyi blo gros kyis spras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rangab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin/
177a2(mdo sde): gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par rigs par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di
177a3(mdo sde): dag grag par 'gyur ba'i skye bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/
177a4(mdo sde): de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol bdag gis 'di lta
177a5(mdo sde): bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur pa yang ma lags kyi bcom ldan 'das
177a6(mdo sde): sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan de de bzhin
177a7(mdo sde): te/ ji skad sbas pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
177b1(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad bskul cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bka' yang sgrogs shig/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa/
177b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'od yang 'khor der rdzogs shigade nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin ga shes pa'i bka' thos nas/ dkon mchog
177b3(mdo sde): ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su sgom pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba dang ga la don 'di skabs brjod dachos can pa thams cad 'dra bar gyis shig/ de bzhin
177b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs 'chang cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig/ khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin
177b5(mdo sde): na 'dis thadag 'jig rten su gyu na gi ma nyan par bya'o// danas gang cig cing lasan dang / tshangs padang / 'jig pas gyi sa thams cad 'dus mas
177b6(mdo sde): 'das ldan pa sam sa/ bcom ldam das pazhun sngar 'khong nas/ ma ldan pangs la gsol ma leg/ sos rnas das kyis na
177b7(mdo sde): mchog ta la la'i gzungs shad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs par gyur pas gnang pa mdzad do// byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong brnams
178a1(mdo sde): sa kyis lan gnyis la na gsum drug sol babatab na yang bcom ldan 'das cang ma gsung bar gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la che nga ldan pa/
178a2(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bus 'di ka ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa kon mchog tal la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs pa shang dru gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcomadzan
178a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ rigs kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog tal lo'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de/
178a4(mdo sde): ngag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do//
178a5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod song la/ 'jam dpal gzhen dur gyur pa la gsol /
178a6(mdo sde): thob shig/ de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ shing khrag sha dang sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na/ skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug ste/ nyi mabye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa'i
178a7(mdo sde): kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/ gse
178b1(mdo sde): gyi kha dog rta bur lus dang dpal gyi lham ma ldan na wang nger 'dug go de nas tshe nga ldan pa shAr ba ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la bder song ste byin nas/ 'das
178b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
178b3(mdo sde): pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bral 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi don 'di gang yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod nig
178b4(mdo sde): rab zab pa ste/ kho bo ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nus so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ khyod snying las chung ngur 'jug shig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o//
178b5(mdo sde): shwa ran ti'i dus sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis khyod kyis gong shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ srog sum gyi stong chen po'i 'a
178b6(mdo sde): rkyen gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de nas ro'i tshe song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig can gyi khams na/ gnas bcang ma'i ris kyi ma'i bug nas 'og min gyis
178b7(mdo sde): gyi lha'i bu ji gleng 'khor pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur te// rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba bum dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// nga khyen dang/
179a1(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// chos 'dod pa rnams dang / chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang cag rnams kyang 'dus partsar to// /
179a2(mdo sde): bu mo mang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dge slong gi 'khor dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du sam cu rtsa gsum
179a3(mdo sde): pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang / 'thab rdal gyi 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor dang /
179a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang //
179a5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma
179a6(mdo sde): 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga la 'od bsrungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang tshe dang ldan pa lam phran brtan dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang tshe dang ldan pa chu klung
179a7(mdo sde): 'od srungs dang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang tsho ba ldan/
179b1(mdo sde): brlangs pa dang / mo dang pa kun dga' bo dang de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to// khams kyi rgyal po//
179b2(mdo sde): dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur te// rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to/ de nas tsho dbarngan
179b3(mdo sde): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags de ji ltar 'tshal
179b4(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
179b5(mdo sde): 'das dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems
179b6(mdo sde): dpa' kum du bzang po la gsol brdzob shig de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
179b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog tal la 'di shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog nyal la'i gzungs 'di chen par 'gyur ba su yin/
180a1(mdo sde): su lu
180a2(mdo sde): ma ma#
180b1(mdo sde): pa yin no// denas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten stong par dag kyang rab tung ga' nas/ mdzig
180b2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do// zhes legs so zhes byab byin no//
180b3(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs ji ltar
180b4(mdo sde): gzung bar bya// klag par bya/ kun chub par bya// gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor gzungs 'di ni skye ba med par yid la
180b5(mdo sde): bya'o// dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / dror med par yid la bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshadapa/
180b6(mdo sde): na/ 'khor ngo'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// zhwa dang ma drig cu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
180b7(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te/ thogos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mi sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
181a1(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i man po rnams kyi snyi n+do ji 'dra ba zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
181a2(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad la sangs
181a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po ni yin no// gang sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di/
181a4(mdo sde): nisnying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang
181a5(mdo sde): dag par rjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no// rigs
181a6(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya'o// 'dre ba med pa mang du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
181a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi
181b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog tal la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /
181b2(mdo sde): thugs rtse ba mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces
181b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag pa rab tu ston par spob su yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
181b4(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems
181b5(mdo sde): dpa' ngan song spong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub
181b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 'ong dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can nga
181b7(mdo sde): bying chub sems dpa' rnam par sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsngar mi mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' chag tum dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na dorje dang / byang chum sems dpa' ni chen phur yong /
182a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sem dpa' tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor dpal dang /
182a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub
182a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis rgyan dang / byang
182a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rtag tu dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdol pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mkhas dang / byang
182a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub
182a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi gdugs snying po dang / byang
182a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa dpa' ba dang /
182b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi phrin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan/
182b2(mdo sde): 'das slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshwa/ bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog tal la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang
182b3(mdo sde): dag par bshad par spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni byA dka' ba ste/ go cha 'di 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu
182b4(mdo sde): dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
182b5(mdo sde): bde bar 'gyur pa dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs te sngags bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
182b6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ oM maM/ b+ha ra Te b+ha ra Te/ d+ha ra d+ha ran te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi a la la chos a la la/
182b7(mdo sde): chos a la la chos shes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces
183a1(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos shes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi bzhi'i
183a2(mdo sde): don ni gzhi'i med pa'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha' gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gso'i don ni
183a3(mdo sde): blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das /
183a4(mdo sde): na ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang /
183a5(mdo sde): bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni bzod ma
183a6(mdo sde): nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dkon mchog tu
183a7(mdo sde): la la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
183b1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
183b2(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs 'di
183b3(mdo sde): gzung ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / rnam par dbyed pa dang / gsal bar bya ba
183b4(mdo sde): ni 'di'adra ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par bcag pa'i don to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dus/ 'jam dpa
183b5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grang 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa shA ra dwa ga
183b6(mdo sde): bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
183b7(mdo sde): rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra da ti'i bu'i sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa sring ngo // shwa ra da ti'i dus smras pa rigs kyi
184a1(mdo sde): bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs pa dang sa rig pa yun ji srid cig nus grags pa med /
184a2(mdo sde): ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rig pa dang ma rigs pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// gA ra
184a3(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig
184a4(mdo sde): nas zhugs pa srid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus
184a5(mdo sde): pa ga la yod/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi dbyil thams cad dam/ wa thams cad kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du shA ra dwa ti'i bu'/
184a6(mdo sde): ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa gcig gi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lnga smos/ de nas
184a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bzhung la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos spram
184b1(mdo sde): deng ga la kun du bsrung ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba mdzad par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol bathob shig de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las langs
184b2(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par
184b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ chos smras pa de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smrab
184b4(mdo sde): de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro// de dag la bdud dang bdud rtsi
184b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smras pa'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams pa'i sems bskyed/
184b6(mdo sde): pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la sa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams
184b7(mdo sde): la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag na so thags ngan par 'gyur/ lce dang sna med par 'gyur/ rkang lag phyi phyogs su 'gyur/ lus nang bu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur ro// shes ra
185a1(mdo sde): 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni mi gti mug pa de dag gi skyon du 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal mdor ba shad na//
185a2(mdo sde): dedaga' rmi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go// gal te mir skyes na yang cag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par
185a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze can du 'gyur/ mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ lus zhom par
185a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'gyur/ lus skam por 'gyur/ yi dgas 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni/ nges sangs rgyas kyi
185a5(mdo sde): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol bcom ldan/
185a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsa pa/ 'jam dpal kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ 'di lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro//
185a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas/ slan cad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom
185b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dbul ba yod pa'i mngal 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig
185b2(mdo sde): nag dang / kun tu 'bar dang / rab tu 'bar dang / reg dka' dang / drag po dang mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi phu lum dang / lcags kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bstod dang / spyiru tshugs dang
185b3(mdo sde): spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab 'bar dang / rul ba dang / rtag tu dri nga dang / rab 'joms dang / nges 'jom dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de gang du skye bar
185b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'di dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos
185b5(mdo sde): smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhu ba de legs par zhus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am/
185b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye
185b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro//
186a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med/ dpag tu ma da/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzung
186a2(mdo sde): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang ngo po//
186a3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ba ste ga 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan dang gas sbyar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
186a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin no// 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos so zhes 'dzer cing de dag chos kyi rnams grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro// spangs nas kyang 'thol zhing
186a5(mdo sde): 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los mi gti mug pa de dag gi ma
186a6(mdo sde): bcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das
186a7(mdo sde): nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe rabs thams cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / lhag skur dang / mjing ba nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi
186b1(mdo sde): skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres shing snyoms pas nyen pa dang / lus skams pa dang / kha mnam pa dang sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ zos na yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro//
186b2(mdo sde): de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la khros pa'i sems
186b3(mdo sde): kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la rmongs par 'chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar shes rab 'chal par gyur pa dang /
186b4(mdo sde): ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chabs shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ de nas can thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang
186b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag sngangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos
186b6(mdo sde): nas rab tu sngangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so// grogs po dgang thams
186b7(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsnyes pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/ gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'am/
187a1(mdo sde): 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ zi ba 'am/ sras kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag gis lha ga la nus te ci smos rigs/
187a2(mdo sde): kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag dper na/ dkon mchog za ma tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin
187a3(mdo sde): du blta bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni legs par gsungs pa legs so//
187a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
187a5(mdo sde): 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig ga ma/ se gol gtogs pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa 'am/ tha na dge/
187a6(mdo sde): 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal cig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
187a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dben ba lags sam ring ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu kha 'og de skad ma 'dri shig
187b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga po dag ni za'i/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams
187b2(mdo sde): med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir skye bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan
187b3(mdo sde): yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// e ma 'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems
187b4(mdo sde): can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma gyur cig// bam po gsum pa/
187b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam ma sems shig/ ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba
187b6(mdo sde): dang bcas pa yin na/ 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal
187b7(mdo sde): gyis tshor ba myong gi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jig pa med par 'gro ba dang /
188a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par
188a2(mdo sde): spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang / log par lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig
188a3(mdo sde): nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/
188a4(mdo sde): ngas sems can gcig gi don du yang bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i/ sems can gcig po ni yongs su btang bar mi bya'o snyam ste/
188a5(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
188a6(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhig yid mi bde bar gyur te du zhing smre sngags 'don to//
188a7(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu sdig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin
188b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang / lhan cig gnas pa ni ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bung bzhin du /
188b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye
188b3(mdo sde): bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te/ bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gags shing 'gags par mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
188b4(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// dper na
188b5(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// 'on kyang sems can rnams
188b6(mdo sde): dang 'thun par de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par 'jug go// shA ra dwa
188b7(mdo sde): ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba mi mnga'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni lha dang bcas
189a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog dang ga phul dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i/
189a2(mdo sde): bu tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'o// rab tu byung ba 'am ka khyim pa'ang rung ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug
189a3(mdo sde): bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
189a4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do// gang dag chos kyis rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba
189a5(mdo sde): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshang 'bum par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong ga shol 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar
189a6(mdo sde): bkun tu rab tu mched cing 'brar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nga sa ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor mi gti/
189a7(mdo sde): mug pa de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ngas de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni/
189b1(mdo sde): mang tu bar pa lags sa ya bcod pa ma du 'arjod na/ de nas bcom mar 'dasal wa'i dang po sa can gyim 'di sa cas masor to// somalan 'a
189b2(mdo sde): bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang bdug pa dang / smyos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o// gdus
189b3(mdo sde): lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag rtsi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// bsti sdang coM'o// tha mar brgya'o// ri mor bgyiro// mchod par gyi'o// brjed par bgyi'o// kha so
189b4(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// bsti stang bgyi dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges par
189b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bur gyur pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na
189b6(mdo sde): sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag
189b7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis bu lba'i dbang
190a1(mdo sde): pobargya byin gyis chos smra ba'i dge slong dag snying las chung ngur bya bdung / yongs su bskyang ba dang kun tu bsrung ba dang bslab pa'i phyir tshi ba 'di
190a2(mdo sde): legs par smras so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kun tu bsrung
190a3(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o//
190a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang po la rigs kyi bu tshig 'di legs pa smras pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom
190a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gzhan la phan dang bde ba byed pa bsags pa po// rnam pa sna tshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshig ldan pa/
190a6(mdo sde): shin tu dri mang bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog/ yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs sbas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
190a7(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ dkon mchog tal la'i
190b1(mdo sde): gzungs thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldanan
190b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog tal la'o gzungs thob bo// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la kho khrob med pa'o// kun tu bzang po byang chub sems
190b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zag dog med pa dang / rlom sems med pa ste/ kun du bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa
190b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dag go chos gnyis so// kun tu bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la dbang po gnod par mi 'gyur ro//
190b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yod tan brjod pa
190b6(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa dang / dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa bshad pa na/ lha dang ma'i skye dgu las sems can dpag tu med pas gzungs thob
190b7(mdo sde): par gyur to// dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan langs langs
191a1(mdo sde): te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
191a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zib lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i
191a3(mdo sde): phyir zab po// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir zab bo// stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo// nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo//
191a4(mdo sde): kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam
191a5(mdo sde): yang mazlos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no// kun dga' bos gsol pa slad mchi
191a6(mdo sde): spyad mA'i dus lnga brgyab ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi sems can mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
191a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin
191b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pangs chos smra ba de dag kyang byin gyis brlabs so// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba de ni migan bar mi 'gyur/ len par mi 'gyur/
191b2(mdo sde): na par mi 'gyung / son par mi 'gyur/ lag pa dang rkang pan par mi 'jur/ grang ba na par mi rAn+tar/ rnaban par mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyuralus
191b3(mdo sde): zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa mas
191b4(mdo sde): cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud
191b5(mdo sde): bar chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus /
191b6(mdo sde): kun dga' bo gang gi tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs 'chang ba la bar char byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun
191b7(mdo sde): tu 'bar bar mthong ste/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo// kun dga' bo sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod du 'gyur//
192a1(mdo sde): phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa gal te de bzhin gshegs pa sa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi
192a2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad du mchis shing mchis nas kyang sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis
192a3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bkol
192a4(mdo sde): te nga la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyid nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang
192a5(mdo sde): dam pa yin mod kyi kun dga' bo ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bos gsol pa
192a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin chen dkon mchog tal la bstan pa 'di gsan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong na su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
192a7(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo mo'i 'jig rten dang lha'i 'jig rten dang dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang medade/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod
192b1(mdo sde): na ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa med pa'i snying po gser bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lte ba rgyas pa las mngon du thos te/ kun
192b2(mdo sde): dga' bo bya dka' ba chen po bye ba zag zag brgya stong du ma myong nas/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa desang lung bstan to// kun dga' bo de lta
192b3(mdo sde): na khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la phyis nga la phyag tshol cig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis
192b4(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// a la la chos/ a la la chos chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la la'o// sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
192b5(mdo sde): thos pa de dag kyang phyag bya ba'i 'o sa yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te
192b6(mdo sde): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong bde dag la kye grogs po dag khyod kyis tshig 'ang
192b7(mdo sde): legs par smras pa legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong
193a1(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ca/
193a2(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus long gis nyi ma'i snang ba mi mthong ba dang / ji ltar tshong pa thabs mi shes pa dang ji ltar mi dbul po gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra/
193a3(mdo sde): de dag gi don du ngas dpe 'di dag byas na ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang / sems can thams
193a4(mdo sde): cad kyi don tung khyod la gsol ba 'debs na rigs kyi bu khyod spro'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
193a5(mdo sde): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan
193a6(mdo sde): las langs ma thag tude nas de'i mo la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/
193a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'u ma 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// che mchemarab tu ches
193b1(mdo sde): ches kun tu rab tu che mche ma mo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs / kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ de nas kya /
193b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar tedra zhing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag spo lags so// bde bar gshegs
193b3(mdo sde): pa bdag spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi steng du/ bdag ni de
193b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka'
193b5(mdo sde): lags na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag la ga la mchis bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ba lags kyi sa byas
193b6(mdo sde): pa mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so
193b7(mdo sde): legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa dang / phul yin te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do// 'di ni nga'i
194a1(mdo sde): ston pa yin te de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o// dus dus su bsti stang gyis shig/ rin po che'i snod du chug la phrag la thogs shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus/
194a2(mdo sde): na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de
194a3(mdo sde): dag 'byung ba 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu kha ro ga de skad ma 'dri shig/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ sems can mang po la sman
194a4(mdo sde): par bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po
194a5(mdo sde): ba shar kyis nyon cig/ 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu 'di dang / 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med
194a6(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan thong la/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba ci'i dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyon cig de nas bcom ldan
194a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu bzang po rab tu byung ba/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa
194b1(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang la chags pa/ gnas la chags pa/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ de dag 'byung ste/ kun
194b2(mdo sde): bzang po mi gti mug pa de lta bu dag gi don thungs mdo 'ang yongs su gtad kyis mdo 'di chung par 'gyur ta re/ de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang driza
194b3(mdo sde): thams cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ji srid
194b4(mdo sde): gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsti stang du bgyi'o// btsun par bgyi'o// rim gro bgyi'o//
194b5(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyi'o// brjed par bgyi'o// gsol ba bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba
194b6(mdo sde): phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi/ yon tan kun ba shad thams cad nga las 'on//
194b7(mdo sde): nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// ma ga d+ha 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung // rang byung mi yi seng ge bzhugs shes grags//
195a1(mdo sde): ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas// shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul steng dang de thabs cig/ skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis
195a2(mdo sde): dpa' bo bskor// sangs rgyas phal chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin// ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas// mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nu shar/
195a3(mdo sde): gyi phyogs logs nas// sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul ster lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs// de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas// sangs rgyas sras po
195a4(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba kun// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul ster dang lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lpags par gyur// der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa// 'jam dpal
195a5(mdo sde): grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la// sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal gyis dris// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ci// de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ga
195a6(mdo sde): pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang // bde na yangs yon tan ldan gyi spyod yul gtsang // sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpa' la dris/ sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang /
195a7(mdo sde): rgyal bas bstan pa bdag gis 'dir smras kyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan dang // spyod pa gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis// bzang po'i dpal gyis smras pa rgyal sras nyon//
195b1(mdo sde): yon tan mthar yas ldan de'i yon tan las/ dang tshul chung bar tsam zhig brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i thogs pa bzhin du shin tu chung // byang chub gzhir 'gyur ba yi rang byung sems thog ma/
195b2(mdo sde): nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa// de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te// mtshungs med kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod// pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams// bskal pa mang
195b3(mdo sde): por spyad pa ci smos te// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi/ yon tan chu bo zad par mdzod mi spyod// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las dpe tshul cung zad tsa
195b4(mdo sde): zhig brjod pa ste/ mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang // sa chen rnams las rdul phran gcig dang mtshungs// byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba// rgyu med ma yin gyi nam
195b5(mdo sde): yin gyi// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la// dad dang dang ba bskyed nas sems skye ste// de ni 'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang // bdag la bde dang stan dang grags
195b6(mdo sde): phyir min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus ni bya'i phyir// 'jig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems skye'o// rtag tu sems can phan pa bu phyir dang // zhing rnams sbyong dang sangs rgyas
195b7(mdo sde): mchod pa dang // chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang // ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems de skye// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du// 'phags pa'i tshogs la
196a1(mdo sde): rtag tu ngang pa dang // dang zhing mo sa dang gus pa rab bskyed nas// bla mgus par mchod phyir sems de skye// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dang gyur cing // sangs rgyas sras/
196a2(mdo sde): kyi spyod la dang byed la// byang chub bla na mengal dang gyur nas// skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams// bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod//
196a3(mdo sde): byas shing // chos dang de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la// bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'dren ma ltar skyed pa des// yon tan thams cad bsrung zhing 'phel
196a4(mdo sde): bar byed// dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams la sa sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin// dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed// nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin// dad pa gter
196a5(mdo sde): dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog/ lag pa bzhin du dge sdung rtsa ba yin// dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed// dang pa rgyal ba'i cho sA la rab dga' skyed// dad pa yon tan ye shes khyab par byed
196a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gong 'phang ston cing thob par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed// dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi brdzi zhing // nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin// dad pa rang //
196a7(mdo sde): 'byung yon tan rnams kyang tshol// dad pa chags pa'i sgro la chags pa med// mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin// dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing // thar pa'i
196b1(mdo sde): lam mchog ston par byed pa yin/ yon tan zhing gis bon ma rul ba// dang pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed// ye shes khyab par yon tan 'phel bar byed// dang pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa 'i//
196b2(mdo sde): dad pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi// de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya// 'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te// rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin// gang dag rtag tu sa
196b3(mdo sde): rgyas dang gus pa// de dag tshul khrims bslab pa yod mi 'dor// gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'do ga/ yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod// tshul khrims byang chub sems ston byed
196b4(mdo sde): pa ste// slob pa'i sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyor// tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa// de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa// de dag
196b5(mdo sde): rgyal la mchod pa rgya chen byed// gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas dad pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rtag tu chos la dang gus pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyon ngoms pa med//
196b6(mdo sde): gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa// de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dang gus pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin// gang dag ma ldog dge 'dun rab
196b7(mdo sde): dad pa// de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur// gang dag dad pa'i stob kyis mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal// gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsalag/ de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam
197a1(mdo sde): 'das gang dag rdzog pa'i tshogs po rnam grangs pa// dadag chos rnga tshogs kyis yongs su bajug/ shAng mchos la rdzogs kyis yongs parlug/ den
197a2(mdo sde): dge ba rgya chen sogs par byed// gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa/ bdag nyid chen po dngag rgya stobs ldam// bdag nyid chen po rgyu spobs gang ldan pa// da dag mos pa'i khyang bar chen
197a3(mdo sde): 'gyur// gang dag mos pa'i khyab par rgya cheg/ de dag rgyal bkun gyis rtag b+hin chu bas// gang dag rgyal bkun gyis byin brlabs pa// de dag byang chub don tu sems cad ste// gang dag byang chub
197a4(mdo sde): don tu sems skye ba// de dag zang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson// zang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa// de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs su skye// gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs/
197a5(mdo sde): skyes pa// de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs// mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa// de dag dang dang bsam pa rnam par dag gang dag dang dang bsam pa rnam dag pa/
197a6(mdo sde): dag zhug pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog/ grang dag lhagabs ma dam pa mchog ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa spyod// gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa// de dag theg pa
197a7(mdo sde): chen po 'di la zhugs// gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir bzhugs pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub pas mchod/ gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa// dngan
197b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi byed// gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa// de dag cag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong // gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas nag mthong ba/ ngag/
197b2(mdo sde): nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi zhugs min// de dag par skabs chos las rnams mi 'gyur// gang dag par skabs chos las mi rnams pa/
197b3(mdo sde): de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur// gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa mer gyur pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur// gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'grol/
197b4(mdo sde): byams shing phan par 'dod// gang dag 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa// de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i
197b5(mdo sde): dbang por 'gyur// gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can// de dag 'a dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor// gang dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bor ga/ de dag nga rgyal rgyags med
197b6(mdo sde): bag med min// gang dag nga rgyal rgya gas ma dpag med min// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson pa// de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba med//
197b7(mdo sde): gang dag 'khor bar yongs su mi skyob/ de dag rtun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan// gang dag rkun pa dam pa chog ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam par dag pa skyes// gang dag mngon shes rnam pas/
198a1(mdo sde): ngag skyes pa// de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs// gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su smin byed/
198a2(mdo sde): gang mkhas pa// de dag 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas// 'gro ba sdud shes chog su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir brtson pa// de dag
198a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed// gang dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa// de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin// gang dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur pa// dpa' bo de dag bla
198a4(mdo sde): med lam la gnas// dpa' bo gang dag bla me nga la ma gnas pa// de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs// gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa// de dag bdud kyi
198a5(mdo sde): lam las rab tu 'das// gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa// de dag mi ldog sa ni rjes su thob// gang dag mi ldogs ni thob gyur pa// de dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin// gang dag mi skyo
198a6(mdo sde): bzod pa thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung ba ston to// 'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas
198a7(mdo sde): pa// de dag rgyal gsang rnams 'phrul cho ga mkhas// rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs pa yin// gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa/
198b1(mdo sde): de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan// gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams dam pas lus kyang sbyangs// bsod nams mchog gis gang lus rnam
198b2(mdo sde): sbyangs pa// de dag gser gyi ro bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams rdzogs// gang dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa
198b3(mdo sde): de dag lus rnams dpe byang bzang pos smras// gang dag lus rnams rab byad bzang sbas pa// de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so// gang dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa// de dga'o/
198b4(mdo sde): zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag 'od bkor bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag 'ong las pad+ma rnams kyang 'byung // gang dag 'od las pad+ma rnams byung ba// de dag rgyal gzugs
198b5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul bar byed// gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par//
198b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// gang dag mngon shes rnam 'grub
198b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing // bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed// sems can bsam gyi mi khyab tshim par byed// gang dag bsam
199a1(mdo sde): cis mi thar chos sngon cing // sems cacwa bsam gyis mi zab che mabyed pa// de dgas so rigs shes stobs rnam chis// bsam pa 'i bzhin 'jug
199a2(mdo sde): sems can 'dul// gang dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du
199a3(mdo sde): 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang // gang dag rtag lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du 'gro zhe rjes 'brangab/ de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud ma gzugs ni ston par
199a4(mdo sde): byed// gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston byed pa// de dag tshim rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bas ma ya sa sgra 'byung ngo // /
199a5(mdo sde): gang dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba// de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyis sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam par
199a6(mdo sde): ges// gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa// de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ma
199a7(mdo sde): yin// gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing / nyon mongs rgyu ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab tu phye bas 'jig rten rgya
199b1(mdo sde): gang g.yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa// de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la gnas// gang da /
199b2(mdo sde): bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa// de dag dbang skur bkod dang ma 'phrul dang // ting nge 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes su thog/ gang dag
199b3(mdo sde): dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang // ting nge 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed/
199b4(mdo sde): gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang
199b5(mdo sde): bskur to// gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba/ mthu brtan de dag nam mkha' lnga bur ni/ ma lus khyab byas
199b6(mdo sde): phyogs rnams kun na gnas// mthu ba can gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni// ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun gnas pa// mtshungs med de dag spyong yul ltar bcas
199b7(mdo sde): 'jog rten rnams kyis shes par yongs mi nus// mtshungs med gang dag spyod yul lhar bcas so// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa// de rig rgyun pa kun dang ma
200a1(mdo sde): dang / mi chos pa dang thobs padun ma / 'ang gnas dun yos pa gam mos pa dang thongs bdo song pa/ skyes che da skyon pa rjod byed /
200a2(mdo sde): pa thams cad don yod 'gyur ba yin// skyes bungs pa de dag rnams kyi mthus// chos kyang gnas shing byams pa 'ams mi 'gyur// dge ba'i las lam rab tu spyod 'gyur// da
200a3(mdo sde): mchog mthu yang dam pa mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje 'khrig pa'i rin chen mchog yod pa// de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams// mi zad mi 'grib 'phel bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin
200a4(mdo sde): yon tan mtha' yas yon tan chu// gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur pa// der ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang ni chos kyang med gyur pa// phyogs
200a5(mdo sde): der chos kyi gter ni ston par byed// de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtogs cing // de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu// zla ba lta bur snang ba rab ston cing // thabs stong dag gis
200a6(mdo sde): sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya ngan 'das zhing dang // ring bsrel rab tu rgyas par/
200a7(mdo sde): dpa' bo stom// mkhas pade dag tan thos rang rgyalas// sangs rgyas bkor pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par sngon byed cing // zeg gsum sgo nas
200b1(mdo sde): mams na 'dum par zeng/ ma pasan kyi sgru pa shes pa rnams// zhes dang du mo dung ma lus rnams dang // lha myi mams pa dang ga na dang// dra su ra nga/
200b2(mdo sde): gzugs rnams so// / rgyamA mna'i phyag rgya 'dzin gyi thos// dpa' ba dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang // chags dang spyod dang srid 'jug pa / phreng bsas ngas
200b3(mdo sde): ston par byed// de dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchong par byed// gang dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu
200b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa// de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing // sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas so// gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam lus shing /
200b5(mdo sde): sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas pa// de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang // yid kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dag
200b6(mdo sde): yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam
200b7(mdo sde): 'phrul dang // bzod brtson rnam 'phrul bsam gyi mi khyab pa// de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos// bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dang shes rab dang // thabs
201a1(mdo sde): dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag phra rab rdul 'jug ting nge 'dzin// rdul rnams kun la mngon par sgrub byed
201a2(mdo sde): cing // rdul gcig steng na zhing rnams bsam mi khyab// ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul de'i steng du sangs rgyas bcas zhing dang // sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang kha cig ston// nyon mongs rnam
201a3(mdo sde): ngag dog pa kha cig dang // yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang // la la steng g.yogs med dang 'thun pa dang // la la tshol pa smig rgyu lta bu dang /
201a4(mdo sde): la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams// ji ltar rdul gcig steng du sngon byed pa// de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// grags pa mtha' yas
201a5(mdo sde): rnam thar 'di 'dra'o// de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par grub byed cing // lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas bkang ste// skyes bu chen po
201a6(mdo sde): rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu dag na me tog 'phreng ba dang // spos byug rin chen rin chen ji snyed pa// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi// rgyal rnams mchod phyir log pa'i mthil
201a7(mdo sde): nas byin// gos dang phya ma rin chen ji snyed dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdug mchog sna tshogs dang // gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla ra rnams// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'badra/
201b1(mdo sde): phyogs bsru dag na yo byangad mtha' yas gang // drang srong chen po rnams la mcho 'os pa/ de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing / byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod// phyogs
201b2(mdo sde): rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa// rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi rang dang // sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams// de dgra lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs// phyogs bcu kun gyis rape zla mang
201b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi// yang dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcang bsgrub pa sna tshogs pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs// 'od zer gang dag las dgas
201b4(mdo sde): yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyang byed cing // spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du// 'debs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod// 'od zer bkod
201b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyan 'phreng bsam yas rab 'chang ba// pad+ma mtshan rang gzugs can du ma dag/ lag nas rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/ me tog phal chen me tog du
201b6(mdo sde): raM dang // me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// bdug pa phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang // bdug
201b7(mdo sde): pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// bdug pa sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phal chen spos dang spos kyi bla re dang // spos kyi bkod pa
202a1(mdo sde): 'od zer rab bkye ste// sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'phreng ba phal chen 'phreng ba'i bla re dang // 'phreng ba
202a2(mdo sde): bkod pa'i 'od zer rab dkye ste// 'phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla ra dang // phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab
202a3(mdo sde): bkye ste// phye ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// na bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re dang // na bza'i bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// nu bza' sna
202a4(mdo sde): tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phal chen gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re dang // gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// sna tshogs gdugs
202a5(mdo sde): rnams kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rin chen phul chen rin chen bla re dang // rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu
202a6(mdo sde): bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dug rgyal ba mchod// pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang // pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// pad+ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag
202a7(mdo sde): nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rgyan 'phreng phal chen rgyan 'phreng bla re dang // rgyan 'phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de
202b1(mdo sde): ngag rtul ba mdzod// rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab bkye ste/ de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dam ser po dang // sngo dang rtul mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/ dums sprul ba'i zhing
202b2(mdo sde): rnams brgyan pa byed// nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdug/ dar gyi lda ldi ba dan rab sbyangs shing // dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi dbul de dag
202b3(mdo sde): 'dzin// lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams// rgyal ba gcig la de dag byed pa ltar// rnal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o//
202b4(mdo sde): de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing // bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur gyi sgo dang // thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// kha
202b5(mdo sde): cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod sgo dang // sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang // sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang // bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang // kha cig
202b6(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang // bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang // don la rnams nges shes rab sgo rnams dang // spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i
202b7(mdo sde): gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang // bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang // bdon dang brtan dang rnam par thar sgo dang // kha cig stobs
203a1(mdo sde): dang dbang po lam sgo dang // nyan thos theg pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang / rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgro dang // theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang /
203a2(mdo sde): cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo// kha cig bdag meng srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdu 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang // zhi 'grog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul// 'gro ba'i spyod
203a3(mdo sde): pa'i sgo rnams ji skad pa// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs ste// de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag
203a4(mdo sde): nas// bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba bkod pa'i ting 'dzin
203a5(mdo sde): mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin 'thun byed pa// dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas// bsams pa bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// gang du lo nyas 'jig rten yo byad
203a6(mdo sde): gang / bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa// der ni kun gyis bsams bzhin bya ba yis// sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang /
203a7(mdo sde): gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed// brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing //
203b1(mdo sde): gos rang tan mchog bgos shing bad+man byas te// 'phreng bas skud cing spos kyis bskus pa yi// gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na dga' nis rab tu
203b2(mdo sde): dgar rnams la// blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba// gzugs kyi ngam pa yongs su ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed// nga dag ka la
203b3(mdo sde): bida'i sgra snyan dang / khru byug kun la dang ba'i sgra skad dung // rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci yi sbas// mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa ba ni gang yin pas/
203b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don
203b5(mdo sde): dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed// bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed// sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams/
203b6(mdo sde): grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed kyang // 'gro ba kun la phan ngon pade don du// de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len// gang na mngon 'byung med cing chos med de// dgon par 'gro dang
203b7(mdo sde): thar pa mi dmigs pa// der ni rgyal srid 'byor pa rab spangs te// zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim dang 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs
204a1(mdo sde): su dgrol ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par// mngon par 'byung zhing thar pa rab tu rjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing // skyes chen
204a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang // drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par// yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// gang na sems can dpag mang tshe ldan zhing // bde dang ldan la
204a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs chung yod pa// 'dir ni rga bas nyen cing nang pu can// bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la// 'jig rten gti mug ma chen
204a4(mdo sde): rab 'bar zhing // rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i// 'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang // chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad
204a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas// gzugs kyi byin
204a6(mdo sde): rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi//
204a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// 'jig rten mi chags tshu la pad+ma bzhin// dga' zhing dang par byed la rnam par rgyu// de dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dang gas sbyor
204b1(mdo sde): gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan// gzhags mdzes rgyan 'phreng thogs shing gar byed dang // sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs med kun tu ston// grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba 'gyur// de bzhin
204b2(mdo sde): ded dpon tsheng dpon khyim bdag 'gyur// rgyal po blon po mdun 'don po nya dang // sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos cho ga mkhas// de dgra dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin
204b3(mdo sde): chen mi zang gter rnams dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin sdong po dang // lam gol dong pa rnams la lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can
204b4(mdo sde): las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa// de dag kun la rmongs chos tshong thabs dang // sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten brjod par byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang // sems can/
204b5(mdo sde): bad byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa// rig stobs sman dang bcos sna tshogs kun// drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// gang la lhur bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba// drang srong
204b6(mdo sde): spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang // brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang // mkhas pa de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// de dag spyod can rgyu mu stegs can// gdung ba
204b7(mdo sde): go'u ta ma dang mi spar spyod// cer bu gos mang lhur len dge sbyong la// mu stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston// de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang // bla na yod dang bla na med
205a1(mdo sde): rnams dang // ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i rtul zhugs can// de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// nyi ma'i rjes lha dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang
205a2(mdo sde): ba grang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// gle'u can dag dang mu stegs sum cu pa// de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// lha yi shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang // mu stegs te reg
205a3(mdo sde): yul du rgyu rnams su// ru ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang // bsam yas chos la de dag dam pa mchog/ cog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba dang // tsher ma rtsa dang thal bar nyal ba
205a4(mdo sde): dang / gang dag gtun shin mal can gnos pa dang // de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// pha rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa// de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing //
205a5(mdo sde): bstan bka' mi bzang drag shul dka' thub kyis// mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul// 'jig rten lta bsdu 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stebs can/
205a6(mdo sde): kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis// de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed// la lar 'gro sdig pa yi sngags kyi gzhi// shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal/
205a7(mdo sde): zhing drang tshig gis// la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang // don la rnams ngas rdo rje'i tshig rnams dang // rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang /
205b1(mdo sde): bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang // kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig rnams kyis/ las dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang / klu yi nges/
205b2(mdo sde): tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis// la la srin po 'byung po sha za dang // dri za grul bum lto 'phye tshon tshig dang // mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis// bden pa bstan cig thar par 'dren
205b3(mdo sde): pa byed// de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsdam yas tshig lam shes pas ston// de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de
205b4(mdo sde): 'dra'o// / bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // 'od zer bsam
205b5(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can ji skad 'od zer de shes pa// de dag mthong
205b6(mdo sde): legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing // chos kyang yongs su bstan te lam bstan cing // rgyal ba'i sku
205b7(mdo sde): gzugs mchod rten bstan byas pas// des na mthong lags 'od zer grub par 'gyur// lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yin// 'od zer 'ong byed ces bya rab gtong zhing // rdul dang
206a1(mdo sde): mun pa thams cad bsal byas te// 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzi/
206a2(mdo sde): de dgra rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron bzung bas// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang // rtsa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang // spos dang bcud
