421b7(mdo sde): mchod pa bla na med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i
422a1(mdo sde): bar du yang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad 'og min gyi gnas
422a2(mdo sde): man chad du mngon par phyung ste slar log go// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spu'i
422a3(mdo sde): khung thams cad du nub bo// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa phyung ba de dag na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo// de nas byang chub
422a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ zla gos zag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
422a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kye ma mi rnams kyi ni 'dren pa
422a6(mdo sde): yis sngon chad ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di// skye dgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa// de yis bdud sde thams cad mog mog bgyis// phan tshun dag tu tshig tu
422a7(mdo sde): smra bgyid pa// kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi// bdag cag ci zhig phyir 'dir lhags so// bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi// dka' thub can
422b1(mdo sde): bdag dka' thub can min gyur// nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las// bdag 'khogs bdag skams bde ba rnams las nyams// bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob
422b2(mdo sde): bar gyur ma yin// yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul sum rnams kyis// bstan pa'i dgra rnams mog mog gyur pa mdzad// bstan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni/ sangs
422b3(mdo sde): rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste// gang zhig gnas nas la tshogs
422b4(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang // 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas gyur cig mchis 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas sras po mtha' yas rnams
422b5(mdo sde): kyis bskor// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis// cho'aphrul rnam pa phye ste bstan du gsol// 'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig lags// thub pa chos ni gleng
422b6(mdo sde): zhig gsung bar bzhed// 'khor 'di thams cad 'gyod cing mchis lags na/ sems can thugs brtse slad du bdag la gsungs// de nas sangs rgyas kyis
422b7(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyis// 'khor de ni nang nas/ drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba gcig gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye
423a1(mdo sde): gzhon nu re shig kha rog shig/ kho bo'i dri ba dri bar bya'o// gal te kho bo'i dri ba khong du chub par byed na ni/ de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i/
423a2(mdo sde): ming dang yang 'thun no// 'on te sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul pa byed du zad na ni/ 'dir ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ skyes bung/
423a3(mdo sde): pa dang / sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis ni 'di grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis drang srong gi tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas/ drang
423a4(mdo sde): srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po ci nus kyis dri ba dris shig dang / rnam par byang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
423a5(mdo sde): drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung ci'i slad du bskal pas sregs par 'gyur/ sems can
423a6(mdo sde): rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/ nang na sems can phra ba khru gang tsam 'am/ mtho gang tsam mam/ mdzub mo tsam ma ma mthe bong tsam ma mnas dang / gro dang
423a7(mdo sde): mon sran sde'u dang / mo na sran gre'u dang / til dang / yungs 'bru tsam 'am/ sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stso la cig de nas
423b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me smon la/ drang srong chen po legs so legs so zhes/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// drang srong chen po che bskal pa drug bcu pa'i drib
423b2(mdo sde): 'bri 'di ni 'thun pa'o// de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ drang srong chen po me sngor gyi tshe tshad mi ma rjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas gnas gnas pa rnam
423b3(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma shes na 'dis ji ltar shes snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do//
423b4(mdo sde): drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni/ yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang /
423b5(mdo sde): shi'i bar du byung ba'o// drang srong chen po yang rgyu rkyen las sems can skye ste/ rgyu rkyen ni pha ma'o// drang srong chen po yang pha ma 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o// gang gi tshe yongs su
423b6(mdo sde): rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med 'grong du 'jug pa de ni de'i rkyen to// drang srong chen po yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun
423b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no// nye bar len pa phung po lnga dang / khams bco brgyar
424a1(mdo sde): ni sems can no// drang srong chen po sems can yang gzhan la las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang gzhan la sems can yang gzhan ma yin no//
424a2(mdo sde): drang srong chen po sems can ni 'grib pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// zang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma gal te sems can la 'grib pa ma mchis 'phel
424a3(mdo sde): ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te/ dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smras
424a4(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du ma yin no// gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni/ dbang med par 'chi ba'i mi rigs so// drang srong chen po gang rang gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa ji ltar
424a5(mdo sde): dbang sgyur du 'gyur drang srong chen po 'di lta ste per na srin po me khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar bya'o snyam du sems dpa'i rkyen gyis srin bu me khyer gyis
424a6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/ sems ma dul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no// drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar gyur na ni ga khyi la nyon
424a7(mdo sde): mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag khyi la yang yod cing / dbang sgyur la yang yod pa de'i tshe/ sems can la 'grib pa yang mi dmigs
424b1(mdo sde): 'phel ba yang mi dmigs so// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ go'u nyams nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong
424b2(mdo sde): chen po ngas phyin cig log dag bzlog pa gang yang med/ 'grib par byas pa yang med do// drang srong chen pos gsol pa gal te de ltar na khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags
424b3(mdo sde): sobacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/ ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma yin no// drang srong chen pos gsol pa
424b4(mdo sde): go'u ta ma bka' mchid 'di re shig zhog/ go'u ta ma'i sras kyi sa pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o zhes gsungs nas/ sems can mang du 'grogs
424b5(mdo sde): las sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'ad ji lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta dper na/ sa bon
424b6(mdo sde): gcig las shing skyo bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// de las res 'ga' ni gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi lcug ma sa ngon/
424b7(mdo sde): gyis 'os su mi 'gyur ba de ji lta bu drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma rlung dang nyi mas shing tog rnams ma rungs par gyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
425a1(mdo sde): 5sh+ma/ rang pa t+ma/ s+yA spyang sas sa sa nas sa sa /
425a2(mdo sde): cig ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ skyer du rnams kyi thos so// kha cig ni lus kyi rlung rnams kyis kye mar byas so// drad srong chen po shing gnyis pani nA
425a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi zhes pa ni mang ngo // drang srong chen po yang sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas spang ba ste drang srong chen po sems can rnams kyi sems
425a4(mdo sde): dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmigs te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o//
425a5(mdo sde): zhes ra smra'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma de de bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag go/ ci'i slad du de bskal bas bsreg par 'gyur pa bkag
425a6(mdo sde): stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po
425a7(mdo sde): gal te bskal pas bsregs par mi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyangs gnyis su 'gyur te/ la la mi rtag la/ la la rtag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden/
425b1(mdo sde): par smra bar mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gang gi spyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin/ bcan bla ma yin/ dbugs phyin pa ma sbyin pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
425b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob bo// drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol pa ni 'thun no// bcom ldan 'das
425b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gal te bkal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ 'di ni dus bzang po'i/ 'di ni dus ngan pa'o zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro//
425b4(mdo sde): drang srong chen po gal te yang bskul pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa tha dad pa med par 'gyur/
425b5(mdo sde): ro/ drang srong chen po yang 'di sa ste bskal pas bsregs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ zang srong chen po sems can ji snyed ba rgal
425b6(mdo sde): bsregs par 'gyur ba zos nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de sbed de bzhin gshegs pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud par 'gyur ro// zang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/
425b7(mdo sde): kha chu ba ldag pa'i sbrul rnamig gis kyang chub/ rnab dang lnga dang / kha'i sgo nas kyang rngub bo// drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de ltar la ste/ sbyin las kyang skur
426a1(mdo sde): sman par sra bar nga spyad/ drod sdong pas kyang sgru/ don rnams grus/ gnang po man po 'di rdzu bye pa nga/ gsal gA parnyan d+hang /
426a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa ma yin gyi gser dul ma ma yin pa 'di ji ltar na dul mar 'gyur snyam nas/ de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/ shin tu bsregs pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'os su 'gyur ro//
426a3(mdo sde): rin po ches sbas pa de'i rin thang med par gyur te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir gser brdung ba dang / bsregs pas rnam par sbyong ngo // drang srong chen po de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom
426a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyang rgyu med par bsregs pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/ 'dir sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
426a5(mdo sde): drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskal pas sregs pa'i me phyung yang sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar to//
426a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ sems can gang la yang gnod par mi mdzad do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste
426a7(mdo sde): dper na/ phyogs bcu rnams su char phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa re ngas na/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa
426b1(mdo sde): rnamasas bar ga sa 'angagi lag pas sems cad par bar byung pa ma mang po rang rmong rnam tha'ang tshasems can du bzhin gshegs ba dang / byang chung sa gyu/
426b2(mdo sde): de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong / kha rog mdzes pa yang mthod/ bskal bsdu bsregs pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid sgrol bar snang mthong nas dga' ba dang / mchogs
426b3(mdo sde): dga' ba skyes te/ 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol ba por gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur cig/ bdag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes
426b4(mdo sde): par gyur cig ces 'dzer to// kha cig ni yid byung nas sems rnam par grol to// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon su du byed/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
426b5(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kha cig ni rang byang chub/ kha cig ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
426b6(mdo sde): rab tu thob/ kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi nang lha rnams kyi nang du skye/ kha cig ni sum cu rtsa gsum du/ kha cig ni man/
426b7(mdo sde): mar kha cig ni dga' ldan dukha cig ni 'phrul dga'akha cig ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// drang srong chen po rnam grangs
427a1(mdo sde): lta bura'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams/
427a2(mdo sde): dang khams kyi rgyal po rnams su 'gyur to// drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi rab tu yang 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po
427a3(mdo sde): rnam grang 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing / bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las sgrol bar mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas
427a4(mdo sde): pa gzog zhing byas pa shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid zos nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro// thabs 'di ngan song du /
427a5(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de bas ni/ sems can gyi
427a6(mdo sde): khams gang 'khor ba la skyon chags par shes nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ches mang ste/ drang srong
427a7(mdo sde): chen po de'i phyir bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po me sgron gyis rang gi yid kyis rnam par dpyad nas tshig tu smras pa kye
427b1(mdo sde): ma'o gang dag la drang srong chen po zhes 'bod pa/ shAkya'i sras 'di'i che ba nyid ni rgya che'o// bdag gis 'di la bgam pas kyang chog ste/ 'di ni thams cad maldan pa/
427b2(mdo sde): mngon gyis bdag gis kyang 'di la yang dag pa'i ming gis bod par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces
427b3(mdo sde): gsol to// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tu ma mchis pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/ sems can gnas gang du 'du/
427b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gnas med pa la sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ro// mnyam
427b5(mdo sde): pa nyid la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po theg pa gcig gis 'byung ba la sems can 'du bar gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar
427b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na chu klung
427b7(mdo sde): chen po tha dad pa dang / klung phran dang / klung chen po dag rgya mtsho chen por ba nas/ ro gcig tu 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji
428a1(mdo sde): snyed zag pa zad pa byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du gyur pas 'du bar 'gyur ro// zang srong chen po 'khor bar 'du bas
428a2(mdo sde): sems can 'du bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gis bdas nas phye ma leb phyi phyi zhwa la 'du bar 'gyur te/ rlung
428a3(mdo sde): mengar so so 'gyes so// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bas phan tshun las 'brel pa'i sems can gyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyur
428a4(mdo sde): ro// drang srong chen po rnams zangs 'di lta bu phan tshun las kyis 'brel pa dag yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur te/ der de dag tu 'du bar
428a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po lha dang mi rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa
428a6(mdo sde): mir skyes pa 'dri sems can che ge mo zhes bgyis pa zhig dang 'dus par gyur to// dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas yi dgas su skyes pa 'di dus par
428a7(mdo sde): gyur to zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po sems can gang zhig sems
428b1(mdo sde): can gang dang lhan cig tu sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid mi bde bar 'gyur/ de zhe sdang bar yang 'gyur/ des de mthong nas/
428b2(mdo sde): gal te nA de glad pa na bar yang 'gyur/ bshang ba dang / gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i
428b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do// gang la la de ltar gyur pa des kyang / bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o//
428b4(mdo sde): drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ rigs gsal bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa dud 'gro dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ji lta bu
428b5(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rim skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe/ phan tshun mthong ba na 'khor du 'arud par 'dzin cing 'di las bdag gis skyon
428b6(mdo sde): ji ltar snyed snyam du skyon tshol ba 'di ni/ drang srong chen po dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de/ bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu dud 'gro
428b7(mdo sde): nang na gnas gnas par mngon no// zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po yi dgas su skyes pa rnams ni dri nga ba 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu sred par 'gyur ro//
429a1(mdo sde): pha rol la sbyin par bsams kyang chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag de yi dgas su skyes nas lhan cig rus par 'gyur ba de'i dbang phyug
429a2(mdo sde): mthong nas phrag dog skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi nor la 'dod par 'gyur te/ 'di ni yi rags su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bdag dang 'di
429a3(mdo sde): lhan cig tu yi dgas kyi nang na gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po mir skyes pa gang la la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag la 'dus
429a4(mdo sde): par gyur pa ni des de mthong na/ 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po ni mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do//
429a5(mdo sde): la bdag dpa' di mi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// dra srong chen pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag lhar/
429a6(mdo sde): skyes te/ 'dus par gyur pa las mir skyes pa de dag gi ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gang dag lhar skyes te 'dus
429a7(mdo sde): par gyur pa de dag ni phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/ des na bdag dang 'di lhar skyes te/ lhan cig 'dus par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o//
429b1(mdo sde): drang srong chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po me sgron dga' mgu phyi rangs nas/ bcom ldan
429b2(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ston par mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bsdus pa'o zhes padagu 'am
429b3(mdo sde): dode nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zang srong chen po me smon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po nang na sems can zhes bya ba phra ba ji tsam
429b4(mdo sde): zhig yod ces dral de skad ces zer ba ni/ drang srong chen po gang sems can su dmig pa de sems can phra mor rnam par byed do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dang
429b5(mdo sde): la la zhig gis dmus long zhig la 'di skad du kye skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba ci 'dra ba zhes smras na/ drang srong chen po 'di ji snyam du sems
429b6(mdo sde): ma mthong ba'i phyir kha dog dkar po 'di 'dra'o zhes de smra bar nus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa 'brel pa ga la mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis
429b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa drang srong chen po de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus long ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir/ sems can zhes bya ba ni phra mo 'di lta bu zhig go zhes sems can brjod
430a1(mdo sde): par mi nus so// drang srong chen po yang mig las sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid la sems can zhes bya/
430a2(mdo sde): bab mi rnyed do// drang sro ba chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po khams bco brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
430a3(mdo sde): ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba ma rnyed/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// dras
430a4(mdo sde): srong chen po mig ni ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pan
430a5(mdo sde): skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po mi gtsang ba'i rdzas
430a6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa drug kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba yang med/ gzugs kyang med de/ drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa ni
430a7(mdo sde): sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// yongs su rtog pa pa gang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang /
430b1(mdo sde): shed las skyes dang / shed bu mi dmigs so// drang sro chen po gal te sems can yod du zin nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis/
430b2(mdo sde): shin tu chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ drang srong chen po gang gi phyir/ sems can med pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thob ste/ de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar
430b3(mdo sde): yang dag par sgrub par byed de lta de ltar yang dag par 'grub po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol
430b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad drang srong chen po me sbron bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bskal pa mu ma mchis par
430b5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i zhugs kyi 'o bas su gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ ri rab 'og min gyi gnas tsam du gyur pa mthon po'i kha de nas bdag gis bdag 'dor bar
430b6(mdo sde): 'gyu ba 'am gdung ba lnga bskal pas bsregs pa lta bur 'gyur ba 'am/ nyi ma bskal par gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ bskal pa sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu spyad
430b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spro ste 'dun gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi slad du ni brtson 'grus nyams par mi bgyid pa'o//
431a1(mdo sde): chung srong mngon par shes pa rnga dang ldan pa nga / bcom ldan 'das kyi kun du 'grus par dag rgya na la /
431a2(mdo sde): 'das la 'di gang ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ston par bgyi'o// rdo ba thog gis brjon
431a3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// drang srong chen po rnams kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis sprin mtshams nas 'dul bcan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
431a4(mdo sde): phyung phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag gi mthus sa chen po 'di
431a5(mdo sde): rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos 'gu la rab tu 'gul ldeg rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na/ lho phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs drama' na/ d+ya
431a6(mdo sde): phyogs mtho// shar phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho// nub phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs
431a7(mdo sde): pa'i steng du me tog gi char phab rnga bo che rnams brdungs so// dri za'i bdag po yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga'i sil snyan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
431b1(mdo sde): mngon par brjod do// lha'i 'dug sa ni rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gi dang bslang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dang ldang bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sem/
431b2(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shul dang / se mo do rnams mthor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs/ me tog
431b3(mdo sde): dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod
431b4(mdo sde): pa byed do// lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas/ me tog rdza rab dang / man+dar ba chen po'i char 'bebs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang dga' mthu/
431b5(mdo sde): yi rang te/ ji ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to// de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas man chad
431b6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba rgyas nas rmar log te/ bcom ldan 'das
431b7(mdo sde): dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyu ma mchis par shAkya thub de ring 'dir/
432a1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong ste// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom gyur lags na// thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston/
432a2(mdo sde): mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dga' bar gyur cing spo ba che gyur te// rab tu dga' bsra lhag par bstod bgyis nas/ kha cig 'di na bcom ldan
432a3(mdo sde): legs shes mchi/ brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// nam mkhar gnas 'byung po'i tshogs dang bstod// mkha' las lha'i me tog char du 'bebs/
432a4(mdo sde): ma brdung rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod kyis drang srong
432a5(mdo sde): me sgron mthong ngam rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor drang srong chen po me sgron
432a6(mdo sde): 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
432a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par
432b1(mdo sde): dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor drung srong chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rjes su rdob ste/ rab tun
432b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab las bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
432b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gi kyang chos/
432b4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ skad dang skad ma yin pa shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba'i ting
432b5(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo zas rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin da/
432b6(mdo sde): mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rab 'byor lha bye ba phrag pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
432b7(mdo sde): dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag tshad med pa dag gis dgra bcom
433a1(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas so// rab 'byor lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am/
433a2(mdo sde): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gan+d+ha'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rab 'byor de
433a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags kyi dbang pos
433a4(mdo sde): zhal khebs par mdzad de/ ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog du ma/ kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po
433a5(mdo sde): dang le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu mngon par byung nas slar log ste/
433a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/
433a7(mdo sde): po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te bla gos zag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das bal ba de logs su thal mo
433b1(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na bcom ldan
433b2(mdo sde): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo zos mi zad pa la 'di skad
433b3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams kyi don du lcags 'di lta bu ni brdzun mi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir/ ljags kyi dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do//
433b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las zan
433b5(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
433b6(mdo sde): pa rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du gang zhig
433b7(mdo sde): gis bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam
434a1(mdo sde): grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na 'di ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs
434a2(mdo sde): 'di 'chad pa na/ gang zhig rang ba'i sems kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di la rim/
434a3(mdo sde): gro byas pa nges nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gzigs nas 'di skad
434a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag pa ni bden par smra ba ste/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags pa'i sa phyogs de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgon
434a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam du gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du gyur par 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan
434a6(mdo sde): gsum brjod dam brjod du bcug na/ des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi
434a7(mdo sde): ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde ba de ba dang bcas bzhin du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// des
434b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnams blangs 'di ni sems can rnams kyi rgyu lam du zag par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag
434b2(mdo sde): mi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang gis
434b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi
434b4(mdo sde): rnam grangs radri thos nas dang dam 'chung ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed ram/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu
434b5(mdo sde): byang chub song ngo zhes bshad do// des mig lnga thob par 'gyur/ dbang po mtshang bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa brjed pa med par 'chi ba'i dusra byed par 'gyur/ sangs
434b6(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtsug
434b7(mdo sde): gi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur/ yi ge med pa'i
435a1(mdo sde): za ma tog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs dang / the tsom rnam par spong ba'i gzungs dang
435a2(mdo sde): don dam pa rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro//
435a3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsams bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
435a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur byas pa khyod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
435a5(mdo sde): yongs su gtad kyis yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shod cig/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsti stang byas pa dang / btsun pa
435a6(mdo sde): byas pa dang rim thor byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa de ji snyam du sems 'jam dpal dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mtha' 'am/ mu yod dam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
435a7(mdo sde): de dpag par nus sam 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bcom ldan
435b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis snyig ma lnga'i dus na chos kyi rnam zangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir rgyas par byed par
435b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mang po de snyed cig la na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
435b3(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / sman gsos kyi spyar dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi cho sta rnam grangs 'di ston par mi byed na khyod dadung du yang de bzhin gshes/
435b4(mdo sde): pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phrag mi byed kyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed
435b5(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
435b6(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / zang srong chen po me sgron dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das
435b7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
436a1(mdo sde): khyab kyim pa mtsha ma nga saphyu
436a2(mdo sde): nas gtan la mab pa// rtsa gar gad du/ An du ni de shan nam pahA A nA smAH
436a3(mdo sde): sang+ya 'phags pa chos bzhi bskrun pa zhes ca myig pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas dang zung chubasems dpa' thams cadul skyeg la la/
436a4(mdo sde): 'di skang bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cun gsum lha'i nang 'i 'dunas chos bzungs na/ dge slong rdzu brtsabam pa'
436a5(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byams pa dang 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
436a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/
436a7(mdo sde): po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sdig pa chen po byas shing bsags pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par sun 'byin pa kun/
436b1(mdo sde): tu spong ba dang gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang / stor chud par byed pa'i spongs dang / rgyun gyi stobs so// de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa/
436b2(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i las spyad na de la 'gyor pa mang ba yin no// de la gzhan po kun tu spyod pa ni mo dge ba'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las la shin tu
436b3(mdo sde): pa'o/ de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'o// de la rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang
436b4(mdo sde): dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/ de stobs dang ldan pa la rten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so//
436b5(mdo sde): byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// byang
436b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'di rtag tu bklag par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// bsam par bya'o// sgom par bya'o// ma
436b7(mdo sde): bya'o// des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
437a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa/
437a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos bzhi
437a3(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo rje dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes brgya
437a4(mdo sde): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rtsa gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tu ra d+ha ma kan nA maN+Da yAn sUtra/
437a5(mdo sde): skar du 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
437a6(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
437a7(mdo sde): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs
437b1(mdo sde): cig go// de nas bcom 'angs kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems 'apa' sems dpa' chen pos
437b2(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
437b3(mdo sde): chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ byang chub kyi sems srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
437b4(mdo sde): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge sbyong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
437b5(mdo sde): srid 'tsho'i bar du bzod pa dang nges pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong pa dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji
437b6(mdo sde): srid 'tsho'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ste/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid
437b7(mdo sde): 'tsho'i bar du/ chos bzhi po 'di dag srog gi phyir yang yongs su gtong bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar
438a1(mdo sde): gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to// thams cad mkhyen nyid sems ni
438a2(mdo sde): mi gtong zhing // mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cig/ bzod dang nges pa'i stobs la rab gnas te// dge ba'i
438a3(mdo sde): bshes gnyen yongs su gtong mi bya// ri dgas rtul po bzhin du 'jigs spangs te// mkhas pas dgon gnas rtag tu bsten par bya/
438a4(mdo sde): chos 'di dag la rtag tu rang gnas nas// bdud rnams bcom nas byang chub de 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ri skad ces bka' stsa
438a5(mdo sde): nas dge slong de dag dang // byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rang te/ bcom ldan
438a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
